story:
Segway Dirt eBike is an eco-friendly electric-powered dirt bike that has superior off-road performance. Built to be a performance dirt bike for all user, Segway Dirt eBike is compact, lightweight, easy to master and low maintenance. The Segway Dirt eBike makes it possible for more people than ever to participate in exciting off-road adventures that they could only dream of before.

 

Important Payment Information

From now until the end of the campaign, you will still be able to place the deposit on Indiegogo and complete your final purchase via the Segway Official Store. After you contribute on Indiegogo, we will contact you by email and send you the final payment link.  

 

*Please note, sales taxes will be applied during checkout, and specific rates will vary by states.

*Please be advised, the deposit on Indiegogo is tax-included.

We make financing your Segway Dirt eBike as easy as riding one. Simply provide your basic information to get an instant financing approval from Affirm, Segway’s trusted financing partner. With Affirm, you will enjoy special financing for up to 12 months, with rates starting from 0% APR.

*Note: Affirm is only available to U.S. customers. Learn more about Affirm at https://store.segway.com/segway-buy-now-pay-later-0-apr

 

Highlights

Segway's Exclusive Partner

 

Contact: info@longhamtec.com

Press kit is available for download here

 

Ride With Segway

Credit to: darrius.anderson 

 

Quick-Swap Battery for Limitless Range

Segway Dirt eBike Battery is swappable and can be exchanged for a new fully charged battery in seconds. From now on, it is time to say goodbye to those regular time-consuming charging methods. Segway presents swappable batteries to take you further through your journeys. 

 

Super Lightweight

Segway Dirt eBike is built with a sturdy lightweight aluminum alloy frame refined with premium design. Different from most traditional dirt bikes, Segway Dirt eBike weighs only 105.8 lbs (X160) / 121.3 lbs (X260).

Being lightweight, it is made to accompany fearless riders to power through more tough terrains unknown.

 

Easy-to-master

Crossing from forest creek to rugged mountain trails?  All good. Want to ride on tight and twisty trails, fire trails, steep rock or steep hill? No problems. Confidently explore all off-road terrains when you have Field Oriented Controls (FOC) that stabilize and adapt to users' riding habits. With an IP67 grade waterproof level for controller and IP65 for battery, a build made of aluminum alloy that incorporates heat dissipation, this bike is made for all off-road terrains.

 

Top Speed and Range

Because your adventure has no limits, here is the Segway Dirt eBike that can keep up. Featuring a top speed of 46.6 mph, the eBike awaits you to experience its high-speed stability, agility, and its responsive communication between road and rider. Partnering with Panasonic, the battery provider of Tesla, Segway Dirt eBike secures an optimal level of battery power to deliver 74.6 miles in one single charge (X260 model).

 

Extraordinary Acceleration 

Ride to unleash your full capacity with peak torque of 23.6 ft*lb and a maximum of 5400 rpm that operates up to 356°F. Segway Dirt eBike is ready to sprint from 0 to 31 mph in just 4.02 seconds.

 

Superior Shock Reduction

Multi-link hydraulic spring central rear suspension (TR suspension) coupled with the double-shoulder inverted front fork, Segway's latest in-house developed suspension system is designed to make off-roading powerful yet comfortable. 

 

"Turn-Key" Data Connection

What makes Segway Dirt eBike smart is that it can be paired with the Segway-Ninebot App for riders to track their riding stats and route. Two riding modes are available to suit the needs of riders at different levels. Sport Mode is for those craving for speed and EP Mode for those need for range. 

 

Low Maintenance and Fully Electric 

We naturally perceive off-road bikes as energy-consuming and high-maintenance, but Segway sweeps out all that obstacles by creating a fully electric-powered dirt bike. Forget about all the money and greasiness you have to bear in maintaining any gas-powered bikes. Segway Dirt eBike will never ask you to buy gas, replace filter, spark plugs, engine oil or timing belt. 

 

Wheelie with Ease

With the perfect level of traction, 184.6 ft*lbs of torque and a 49.8-inch wide wheelbase (X260), Segway Dirt eBike is well prepared to support riders perform challenging tricks effortlessly. The vigorous rear wheel, featuring 48 rear sprocket teeth and a climbing slope of 45°(X260), allows riders to wheelie or climb stairs with ease. 

 

Highly Customizable

Compatible with almost all bike parts, the eBike can be easily refitted to your individual needs with endless possibilities. Riders can modify and rebuild to create the eBike that best fits their demands. The length of the frame and the seat height is also adjustable to fit users of different heights and sizes. 

 

Dual Drive System

Both models of Segway Dirt eBike are equipped with a dual-drive system that is made up of a Primary Drive System and a Secondary Drive System. The Primary Drive System includes an HTD 8M belt of 22 inches, and the Secondary Drive System includes a 420 chain with 106 sections. The dual-drive system can enhance the overall torque power of wheels, and can prevent the chain from dropping out.

 

Fast Charge

Segway is working with the market-leading battery partner, Panasonic, to provide eBike with a high-quality battery of optimal capacity. Renowned for the safety and durability, Panasonic also serves as the battery provider for high-end electric car brands, such as Tesla. The eBike battery, fully charged in 3-4 hours, can deliver 74.6 miles range (X260) in one single charge.






 

 

All About Details

Shipping in Action

Currently, we are working hard to prepare for shipping! We are only Days Away to distribute the first batch of the Segway Dirt eBike to the global warehouse around mid-January. If you want to secure the first shipment of the Segway Dirt eBike, grab this Last Chance to make your final payment now! 

All orders will be shipped out BEFORE the estimated shipping time by our most trusted shipping partners, such as UPS and FedEx. If your order doesn’t arrive by the delivery date as indicated by the courier, let us know, and we’ll make it right.

*Note: Once the production is completed, orders are shipped out in sequence of when contributions are made. This campaign is currently available for US and Canada only.

For the past two decades, Segway focuses on developing world-class self-balancing personal transporters and electric scooters. These products have been widely used in different industries all over the world. With the addition of this electric dirk bike to our product line, Segway is now making a new move expanding into a new market segment - Powersports.

Join the Segway Family

Together, we are unstoppable. Find your Segway Family!

                                                  

                         

                       

                        

 

Partnered with

Frequently Asked Questions​

 

1. What is Segway Dirt eBike?

Segway Dirt eBike is a hybrid between a dirt bike and a mountain bike. Segway Dirt eBike is an eco-friendly electric-powered dirt bike that has superior off-road performance. Built to be a performance electric dirt bike for all user types, Segway Dirt eBike is compact, lightweight, affordable, easy to maintain, learn and master.

2. Where do you ship to?

We are currently available to US and Canada only.

3. What is the payment policy?

During our 30-day campaign here on Indiegogo, you can select the perk to make a deposit(not refundable) which will grant you up to $1298 off the retail price as you complete your final payment on the Segway Store. After you make the deposit, we will send you an email with a Segway Store payment link before Dec. 18th, 2019. You will have a week to make your final payment with your Indiegogo contribution number.

4. How soon can I get my Segway Dirt eBike?

We will ship to our global warehouse in late-January and deliver to our valuable customers in February with our shipping partners, UPS and FedEx. Specific dates will be indicated by the courier.

5. What is the campaign's refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

You can find indiegogo’s refund policy here https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds. Before we ship out your order, if you want to cancel your Indiegogo contributions more than 10 days after it was placed, we will charge an administrative fee of 50% of your pledge and refund the rest. However, we do not refund after your order has been shipped. 

6. Do I need to pay any duty to get the MAX?

We provide tax-free for the US backers, backer from other areas may face paying VAT or other duties from local customs. Most of the backers from our previous campaigns have been exempt from any duties and tax. Please check with the local authority for confirmation.

7. Does Segway Dirt eBike come in different colors and sizes?

Each model comes with 4 different colors: Red, Blue, Black, and Silver.

8. Is it true that I can go up to 74.6 miles on a single charge?

In ideal conditions and in EP mode, this can be done.

Keep in mind, though, that other factors, such as speed, terrain, total bike/rider weight, weather and riding style, can all influence the range.

9. How much does the swappable battery weigh?

The battery weights 17.6lbs (X160) / 24lbs (X260). So it can be easily packed, unpacked, and carried around with your bare hands.

10. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

The battery can be fully charged in 3-4 hours (X260)/ 4-5 hours (X160).

11. How much weight can Segway Dirt eBike handle?

The max payload for X160 is 176lbs (80KG), and for X260 is 220lbs (100KG).

12. Can I use the Segway-Ninebot App to change my vehicle settings?

Yes! What makes Segway Dirt eBike smart is that it can be paired with the Segway-Ninebot App for riders to track their riding stats and route. Two riding modes are available to suit the needs of riders at different levels. Sport Mode is for those craving for speed and EP Mode for those need for range.

story:
The Great Sharpy campaign on Kickstarter was an extraordinary success. We couldn't believe our eyes when we saw that our goal was achieved in only two hours, raising a total amount of money of £25,375. This motivated us to continue the wonderful journey of The Great Sharpy and send this awesome folding knife to more adventurous people.

This is what Knife Informer tells us about Damascus steel: "Hence, Damascus steel is not pure. In fact, this uniqueness is its charm and its mystery. The material is characterized by multiple bands and mottling welded together in patterned fashion to create decorative blades of any shape and/or length with an inability to shatter. The identification of composites in original Damascus steel remains unknown today, as no records exist describing them. Yet modern Damascus steel-making follows the practice of combining pure metals, varying in terms of personal preference and need. Though metalworkers can choose and blend materials to form steel billets, iron is favored for its carbide-enhanced solidity and fortitude."

Have you ever noticed in your mountain trips that there were moments when you need something for cutting slivers for a fire or opening a can? If the answer is YES it means that you have to add a new item in your adventure backpack. You have to meet The Great Sharpy, a folding knife with a resistant Damascus blade.

Inspired by the well-known swords, our folding knife has a tough and resistant blade. As the swords, it is characterized by distinctive patterns of banding which reminds us of flowing water. The Damascus is created by hammering together 37 layers of steel with a strong core to make a powerful and handsome blade. Besides the authentic appearance The Great Sharpy is very comfortable in your hand because of his walnut wood handle. 

The main feature of The Great Sharpy is it's multi-functionality. Because of this you can use the folding knife in different situations. With it's durable handle you can split nuts or you can use the sharpness of the blade to cut the strings from the fishing rod.

 You can store it in the pocket of your jacket so you can find it when you are at the office and you just received a package. It can be used even in the kitchen to cut perfect slices for your favorite salad.   

The length blade is measured at 3.54 inch and it's made from Damascus steel. It is designed to turn the folding knife into a reliable cutting tool. The sharp edge is perfect for cutting perfect slices of cucumber, as well as resizing thick pieces of rope. 

Comparison of the costs

 

 In addition to durability features we choose the damascus steel because it reminds us of the knives our grandfathers had. Regarding that, we want to create a knife that is not only useful, but one that is meant to be special. 

Offered by the damascus blade we will include a leather cover which can be attached to your belt. The reason for which this cover is so unique is because of the braided edges and because of the special models that can be found on the leather. 

You can rest assured that the knife will not fall out of the support because it has a staple which you can use to secure the knife in it's place. 

Materials:  

Blade: Damascus Steel  

Handle: Walnut Wood  

Cover: Leather  

All the materials are selected to fit the purpose for which the folding knife was made. 

The Great Sharpy:

  • resistant blade
  • comfortable in your hand
  • durable handle
  • sharp edge
  • leather cover 

                                                                            Dimensions:

The reason for which this cover is so unique is because of the braided edges and because of the special models that can be found on the leather. You can rest assured that the knife will not fall out of the support because it has a staple which you can use to secure the knife in it's place. Materials:  Blade: Damascus Steel  Handle: Walnut Wood  Cover: Leather  All the materials are selected to fit the purpose for which the folding knife was made. The Great Sharpy:
resistant blade
comfortable in your hand
durable handle
sharp edge
leather cover 
                                                                            Dimensions:

story:
The Beartooth is our newest Tenkara rod.  Packing down to under 14 inches, it extends to 10 feet and is our new go to mini rod for adventures.

 

The founders of Tenkara Rod Co. are Drew and Tuna.  Drew spent 6 years of his life in Japan and has always had an affinity for Japanese culture, and Tuna had been an avid fly fisherman since he first discovered it.  When the two friends came together with this idea for a company built around the Japanese method of fly fishing it just made so much sense.

Tenkara Rod Co. was born on Kickstarter 7 years ago with our first project for the Teton and Sawtooth rods.  Since then, we have done multiple other kickstarter projects and shipped tens of thousands of Tenkara rods all over the world.  We definitely love to fish, but we also really enjoy helping other people to get outside and enjoy nature through Tenkara fishing.

story:
• 10.10oz Waxed Canvas that only gets better with age!  Waxed canvas color selections of Navy, Forest Green, Slate Gray, & Khaki Brown are available! 
  • Full-Grain Leather Bottom Panel, Carry Straps, Trim, and Accents 
  • Large "D" Lid and Top-End Load Functionality
  • Inherently Weatherproof 
  • Heavy Duty Construction with YKK Zippers
  • Daisy-Chain Gear Loops
  • Fully Adjustable and Removable Padded Backpack Straps
  • Backpack Carry at "top" panel of duffel (vs. the bottom) to avoid transporting your adventure's grime onto your jacket. 
  • Stow-Away Handles for a cleaner carry 
  • Solid Antique Brass Hardware 
  • Top- and Bottom-End Grab Handles 
  • Leather Piping ensures bag keeps its shape no matter how much gear you're hauling!
  • Zippered Pockets - so many pockets! (2 side panel, 2 end, 1 bottom end, & 1 interior) 
  • Exterior Dimensions: 22" x 12" x 12" - Perfect Carry-on Luggage 
  • Capacity: 40 Liters - Perfect for a weekend or week-long adventure, depending upon how heavily you like to pack!
  • Weight: ~5 lbs

 

 

 

 

Carry all of the weatherproof performance and function of our Migration Duffel in a smaller package. Our Duck Dopp Kit is modeled after an inherited shave kit from our Grandfather. It is purpose-built for your grooming needs on the go. Everything you need and nothing you don't. The full length/extended zipper gives clear and easy access to the entire shave kit. The waxed canvas naturally repels liquids and contains spills, while the leather end grab handle looks sharp and makes for easy carry when your hands are full.

 

  • 10.10oz Waxed Canvas that only gets better with age! Waxed canvas color selections of Navy, Forest Green, Slate Gray, & Khaki Brown are available! We will collect your preferred color choice(s) prior to manufacture.
  • Full-Grain Leather Carry Handle, Trim, and Accents 
  • Sophisticated Styling Inside and Out 
  • Full Length Zipper Gives Visibility for All Contents 
  • All-around Heavy Duty Construction 
  • YKK Zippers 
  • Zippered Exterior Pocket 
  • Zippered Interior Pocket & Pouches
  • Exterior Dimensions: 9"(L) x 6"(W) x 4.5"(H)

 

 

We use 10.10oz weight "army duck" waxed canvas as the primary fabric material for our products. Duck canvas refers to a type of tightly woven cotton canvas that is tougher and more resistant to tearing than standard canvas fabrics. When the canvas fibers are impregnated with wax, the canvas becomes highly weatherproof and even more capable of withstanding the harshest of environments with the longest of lifespans. What's more, waxed canvas patinas tastefully over time, meaning your bag will only look better with age, even after a lifetime of use. This is why waxed duck canvas has been deemed worthy of being the go-to naturally weatherproof and durable fabric of sailors, militaries, adventurers, and explorers since the 1800s. Because of its superiority, it only makes sense that we would use "duck" waxed canvas in our products.

Few products today are rugged enough, capable enough, and refined enough to consider themselves duck canvas worthy or, as we say, Duckworthy.

 

In order to bring the Migration Duffel to market, we have already raised the funds necessary for our first production run on Kickstarter! What's more, by achieving our goal, we are now able to offer multiple canvas colors! Because of a successful campaign on Kickstarter, canvas color selections of Navy, Forest Green, Slate Gray, & Khaki Brown are available! 

It goes without saying, if you select one of our perks, you will be one of the first ever to own these products and you will receive them at highly discounted prices! Discounts like this will never be seen again once the products go to market! You will be helping us continue to build a grass-roots campaign to make the Duckworthy dream an even greater reality!

By backing our campaign, you'll receive a perk that is the first of its kind and will last a lifetime.

 

 

 

Duckworthy Goods is a start-up based out of Wilmington, NC founded by two brothers, Brandon and Cody. We love outdoor adventuring, and all of the technical gear that comes with it. After spending time in the professional world in Banking Software and Civil Engineering, we found that although outdoor technical gear offered by the big name brands is functional, weatherproof, and all-around useful for our business travels, the gear often left us feeling "underdressed" for both professional and personal travel.

We created Duckworthy from our desire to bridge the gap between adventure gear and sophistication - because no matter the nature of the journey, you should always be outfitted to adventure well.

 

DOMESTIC SHIPMENTS

For all US domestic shipments, shipping has been included within the pricing provided. Within 24 hours of your order being shipped, you will receive tracking information. Domestic shipments may take 3-5 business days for delivery.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS

For international orders (outside the US), shipping is FOB Destination, Freight Collect. This means that you must pay all freight and required duties/taxes. Since orders can be placed all over the world, it is impossible to determine and account for the numerous duties, taxes, and shipping variances for every potential country/location. We hope you understand, and we will use our shipping services to ensure you get the best shipping rate available! When it comes time to deliver, we will contact you to collect the necessary shipping and taxes/duties.

Shipment estimates for your particular international location can be estimated using a carrier of your choice with shipment origination from Wilmington, NC, USA.  International shipments may take 7-21 business days for delivery.

You can estimate duties and taxes for your location here:

https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

 

 

 

Despite being a start-up, we have progressed very quickly through concept, design, and prototyping for the Migration Duffel and Dopp Kit. We have been able to accomplish all of this with very little cash forward.  Additionally, we have successfully raised enough funding on Kickstarter to move to production and even produce additional product "stock" beyond what is necessary to supply those who backed our Kickstarter!  As of now, production is underway and we are offering the Migration Duffel and Duck Dopp Kit on Indiegogo InDemand!  We have secured a highly reputable manufacturer, and based on manufacturing estimates, the first production run can be complete as early as mid-January 2019.  

Our hope is that by further selling these products on Indiegogo, it will assist in launching the Duckworthy brand and upcoming projects/products, which are already into prototyping. With our professional backgrounds in the schedule driven Infrastructure Project Management and results driven Fin-Tech sectors, we have worked aggressively to build Duckworthy up to this point and we don't have any intentions of slowing down or compromising our commitment to quality or on-time delivery!

At Duckworthy, we're not just attempting to fund a singular new product, but instead an entire brand culture focused on high quality, versatile gear with classic form and modern function - products that last and make a statement.

We hope you will join us in our endeavors and THANK YOU for your support!

story:
Your boys deserve the best. Fact. But traditional brands spend more time and money on models and resellers than they do on your comfort. We're here to change that with JoeyWears.

Our mandate has been to offer superior quality fabrics, the perfect fit and innovative designs to make underwear the most comfortable thing in your wardrobe. And it all begins with our pouch design:

 

We’ve spent 9 months crafting the perfect home for your package - more space and comfort, no more adjusting and most importantly, the end of sweaty balls as you know it. 

JoeyWears pouch design is a unique ergonomic design that treats your crown jewels like royalty. We've developed two styles: one casual everyday wear, and one for the more active or sporty guy. 

 

JoeyWears Pro is perfect for your everyday hustle. We enhanced the space for the front pouch. The extra space prevents you from awkward adjustments and helps reduce skin friction between your legs and boys.

 

JoeyWears Active is ideal for keeping you cool with an athletic cut. We invented the dual pouch design to separate your member and boys. 

 

The upper pouch functions as quick draw access. The lower pouch is made of high-performance mesh fabric to wick away sweat and create more air flow.

Regardless of whether you're doing extreme activity or chilling, our longer legs are designed to prevent bunching up. Together with JoeyWears, it guarantees you the extreme comfort that you won’t get from other underwear. 

We sampled over 1,000 fabrics before we found THE ONE - amazingly soft cellulosic fibre, Micro Modal Air. It is natural, high-performance fabric that is sustainably sourced from Austria. More importantly, it feels amazing as it's 3x softer than cotton!

This process of making beech trees into this wonderful fabric aims to reduce waste as much as possible - using 20x less water than cotton. 

 

Micro Modal feels soft like a feather but lasts longer. It's the Stretch Armstrong of the fabric world. After repeated washes, it remains absorbent, soft and supple compared to cotton, and retains its shape for longer!

The Fresh Feelin' Anti-Microbial properties help prevent body odor, and the quick drying fabric will make this your most comfortable summer yet!

Whilst cotton traps sweat and moisture, Micro Modal is incredibly absorbent, wicks away moisture, and is quick drying - keeping you fresh all day. 

JoeyWears also gives you a perfectly snug fit to help prevent riding up. The ultra soft fabric gives a compression-like feel and performance with all the quick-dry attributes demanded by today’s sports underwear. 

 

From sourcing to manufacturing, we seek the best from around the world to make our products. 

Sustainability, transparency, and ethical manufacturing processes are non-negotiable. That’s why we partnered with a family-run manufacturer with direct fabric supply from Europe.

We recycle the wasted products for better usage. 

The remaining wood left from the production process is recycled to heat and supply energy to the production facility.

It empowers the local community. For every 100 pairs we sell per month, 1 full-time job is added back to the assembly line.   

 

From the 1st prototype to the 25th, we've been testing and looking at every detail. This was everything from cut fitting to stitch-rubbing to odour fighting. We are proud to present a pair of underwear we believe is the best fit for you! 

We distributed 100 pairs of JoeyWears to test with our early supporters this year! Here's what they had to say about JoeyWears:

 

 

          

  

   

 

     

 

Thanks for checking out our project. 

We're so excited to bring JoeyWears to you guys here on Indiegogo. It's been a wild ride so far, with our campaign becoming the most backed apparrel campaign in the UK which is massive. After getting frustrated with getting sweaty boys after wearing normal underwear on hot days, we asked ourselfs - what if we made a pair to fix that? And JoyeWears grew from there. 

We've been working hard for the past year, traveling to Paris to find the best fabric and all over the world to find an ethical, high-quality manufacturer who is as excited as we were about the project. Over the last month we've been jonied by an army of over 1500 heros - and we'd love to you to join the squad. 

Please support at whatever level you're comfortable with. We'll return the favor with some really awesome underwear, crafted for comfort with super-high quality materials you’re going to love. 

Thanks for your support. 
- Yang & Jake

story:
Now available on our website: https://taskinsf.com/products/taskin-kube-travel-duffel

Modern style meets upscale elegance … in a duffel bag? Yes and yes.

After months of rigorous prototyping, we’re proud to present the Taskin Kube: The duffel that redefines everything a duffel can be. At home in the office, the airport, the gym and even the boardroom, the Taskin Kube delivers cool, confident style and functionality that’ll have you turning heads everywhere you go. No duffel does it better.

 

 

A NEW ANGLE ON MODERN AESTHETICS

Taskin Kube’s distinctive design is perfect for anyone who appreciates clean lines and uncommon quality that convey both style and substance. It’s the one bag you need to carpe more diem—and look great while you do it.

DOUBLE-WIDE ACCESS     

Know that single, narrow opening you get with other duffels? Been there, hated that. With Kube, just pull the aluminum handle to easily access the entire compartment. The other duffels will be so jealous.

 

ADJUSTABLE, JUMBLE-FREE AWESOMENESS  

Just because it’s a duffel doesn’t mean your stuff has to get scrambled. While most duffels flop over and tussle your belongings, the Kube’s precision construction keeps it—and your belongings—in place. Plus, the Kube comes with dual adjustable spacers for plenty of options to organize your bag like a boss. Don’t want to use them? Simply lay them flat to maximize the main compartment.

 

DUAL, EASY-ACCESS SIDE POCKETS   

The Kube includes two Easy Access Pockets—one on each side of the bag—for instant access to items you need at hand—like business cards, cell phones, boarding passes, or those sunglasses that say you’re kind of a big deal.

 

EASY COME, EASY GO ERGONOMICS

Our four-point, extra-padded shoulder straps make carrying the Kube a breeze, no matter which shoulder you prefer—no flopping from side to side. We’ve innovated the handle system, too. Forget the Velcro straps you get with other duffels (seriously lame). Our handles attach magnetically for instant comfort and a satisfying “whoosh” feel.

 

 

VENTED SHOE CUBBY

Maybe it’s running shoes. Oxfords. Flats. Or those cool boots you got in Aspen. When it comes to a change of kicks, the Kube has you covered. Our vented shoe compartment opens in the back, and is specially lined so the rest of your belongings stays clean.

 

SLIDE & RIDE TRAVEL TRIGGER  

Going to New York? Paris? Topeka or Taipei? Slide the Kube onto your suitcase handle and away you go!

 

TASKIN KOMPAK - PACKING CUBE

Pack like the pros. Keep everything organized and your clothes wrinkle-free. The Taskin Kompak offers dual side compression so you can pack more in the same space. Kompak is the first packing cube designed specifically to fit a duffel bag.

 

 

 

 

WET SIDE, DRY SIDE  

The Taskin Kompak packing cubes comes with a wet pouch with waterproof material and zippers, so you can keep your wet or dirty clothes separate from your fresh and dries. You can thank us later.

 

BALLISTIC QUALITY  

The Taskin Kube features premium high-quality materials, fine-weave, weatherproof ballistic nylon, rugged weatherproof zippers and all metal trims. The inside is furnished with bright orange lining to help with easy visibility.     

 

 

Back us now and get the duffel that says you’re going somewhere in style.

story:
Helmet Recent Awards:


Helmet Media Outreach and Recognitions:

“Helmet boasts some pretty neat features at an extremely reasonable price.” - CNET

“[Helmet has] a whole lot of functionality and options at about half the price of comparable models, like Nest Cam ,Samsung SmartCam HD Pro , Withings Home , Netatmo Welcome and FlirFX” - CNET

http://www.cnet.com/products/ifamcare-helmet/

“Not only does Helmet serve as an impressive pet camera, but it also serves as an all-in-one home security camera.” – Best Pet Cam

“Installing your Helmet Camera is incredibly simple. ” – Best Pet Cam

http://bestpetcam.com/ifamcare-helmet-review-impressive-home-pet-camera/


“iFamCare has done a great job of presenting this product through the packaging.”– Technology X

“SETUP & INSTALLATION: With the help of the quick start guide this is a piece of cake.” – Technology X

http://www.technologyx.com/featured/helmet-from-ifamcare-review/


INTRODUCING iFAMCARE


HELMET WHO?


Meet Helmet, iFamCare’s first family monitor, with lots of fun added to it. Helmet is a family monitor which allows you to watch over your home, pet, parents, or any valuables. That's not it - Helmet has a built-in laser that you can turn on and play with your cat, dog, rabbit, or any pet who loves to chase it.


STORY BEHIND HELMET CREATION

Co-Founder, Homer the Cat

An idea to create an affordable high quality camera for the whole family was long brewing in our minds. And then one day our co-founder Elnaz’s cat Homer became a change agent.

Yes, cat. Homer, just like the ancient philosopher, spent his days deliberating about life, while Elnaz was at work. If Homer could talk, he would probably tell us that he just wanted to play with someone. Greeting Elnaz with a long ‘Meoooooooow’ after work probably meant, ‘I want to plaaaay’.

And this is how Homer changed the world. Helmet stemmed from the idea that Homer was bored being home alone when he could be jumping, meowing, and doing other things good for a new viral cat video instead. Helmet allows all that and more. Any pet owner can now take photos, play chase with their pets using the laser and communicate through two way audio – all while being away.



HELMET UNDER THE MICROSCOPE


We utilized our experience in monitoring devices with careful market research to bring you the latest and hottest functions and features with Helmet. From checking on what you treasure the most to playing with pets, Helmet is sure to impress anyone and can protect anything that matters to you. 


With the full coverage 360° pan and 70° tilt, you have control over the entire space.




A HELMET FOR DIFFERENT LIFESTYLES


Pick the color you like and match it with your home or office decor. The exclusive and limited colors are black, gold, and silver only for our Indiegogo supporters.


And it blends in everywhere, with any lifestyle!


5 INTERESTING FACTS ABOUT HELMET


Use Helmet's laser beam to play with your furry friends - cat, dog, guinea pig -  you choose. Or scare an intruder by moving the laser around. 



Oh - did we mention that pets love it?! Helmet is now Minnie and Gracie's best friend :-)

Oh those eyes... If your pet's birthday is coming up, you know what to get, right?


With Split Viewing, you can have access to your cameras on just one page.

Want to showcase your dog, art gallery, or restaurant? Make your camera public to be seen by people in the world. Wait... we have more! You can even find new friends with the same interests with our 'Nearby Camera' feature.

Allow people to make comments on your picture, recorded video, or even live video feed. You are just a fingertip away from sharing your moments with the world.

With iFamCare Cloud™ you can access all your data anywhere at anytime, on any device (phone, tablet, computer). All your data are synced in real-time and can be accessed with just one account.


WHERE HELMET STANDS


HELMET TECHNICAL FEATURES


Video Quality

  • 1080P Full High Definition (1920×1080)
  • On-Screen Display (OSD)
  • Remote Real-Time Live Video
  • Split Screen View

Software Features

  • Optional Cloud Storage
  • Multiple User Access
  • User Access Levels
  • Public and Private Modes
  • Alert Tones Selection
  • Privacy Settings
  • Image Capture
  • Video Recording
  • Social Share Option
  • Push Notifications
  • Image and Video Gallery
  • Sound and Motion Alerts

* Real-time notifications for sound and motion activities. Get alerts as pictures, video, or just text. No matter where you are, you will be notified about activities around your camera.

Hardware Features

  • MicroSD Card Slot
  • Laser 0.4 mW
  • Two-way Audio Speakers
  • Air Quality Sensor
  • Night Vision LED Lights
  • Factory Reset Function

* Achieve a healthier lifestyle with Helmet's Air Quality Sensor. Use it as a smoke detector or analyze the air around you. Helmet can detect formaldehyde, benzene, carbon monoxide, hydrogen, ethanol, ammonia, and cigarette smoke.


Network

  • Network Search Function (P2P)
  • Wireless Connectivity
  • View on Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G, LTE
  • Automatic Network Recovery


BE CONFIDENT ABOUT iFAMCARE


iFamCare is a brand established by iBaby, the creator of the world’s first baby monitor with a 360° rotating camera. With over 4 years of video monitoring experience and being the winner of several awards such as Product of the Year (2015), silver Mom's Choice Award (2015), gold NAPPA Award (2015), and Apple's Top Seller in the Connected Home category, iBaby Labs expects iFamCare to become one of the fastest growing family care brands in the world.

We are here to redefine the Connected Home category by bringing a technology which is a people connector, pet entertainer,  and a home protector.


OUR CURRENT STORE PRESENCE WITH iBABY



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Is there any monthly cost associated with Helmet usage, such as cloud storage cost?

For our Indiegogo supporters there will be no cloud or other service fees for the next 2 years. After that, iFamCare will offer more competitive pricing that the average on the market.

I want more than one Helmet - is it going to be available in bundles?

Helmet will not be sold in bundles.  

How can I buy more than one Helmet?

Indiegogo only allows to process one Helmet at a time. You will have to buy the monitors separately, choosing a perk each time.

I'm buying several Helmets from overseas. How can I avoid paying the same shipping fee each time?

If you purchase several Helmets and have them shipped to the same address overseas, we will refund you all extra shipping costs once the campaign is over. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

What colors is Helmet available in?

Helmet will be manufactured in glossy white color. However, for our Indiegogo supporters, we have three more exclusive colors: matte black, gold, and silver. We might offer more colors as we get traction.

Does Helmet have a wall mount?

Yes. Helmet comes with a wall mount kit for your convenience.

Where can I buy Helmet?

After the product launch, Helmet will be available online to pre-order at higher price at www.iFamCare.com and also online with several major retailers. Gradually, Helmet will become available in brick-and-mortar stores as well.

Is Helmet battery-operated?

Helmet does not require a battery. It comes with a power adaptor for operation.

Do you have a question, concern, or correction in shipping address?

Send us an email at support@ifamcare.com.

Does Helmet have open source firmware?

Not at this moment but soon we will make our API available based on approval and screening. We believe many creative projects and ideas will come through this channel so we are definitely thinking about it. Please check back soon!


Are there any requirements for the Internet for Helmet?

Helmet is a Wi-Fi based monitor, which means its performance will depend on the Internet speed. We recommend at least 2.5 Mbps upload speed for adequate functioning of the monitor.

Are there any requirements for router for Helmet? Does it work with hotspot?

Helmet works on 2.4 GHz frequency. If you have a dual band router, you need to select lower frequency for Helmet. Helmet will give you best performance when located within 20-30 feet from the router. Helmet will also work with hotspot.

What kind of devices does Helmet work with?

Helmet is designed to work with majority of smart devices running on iOS and Android platforms, such as phones and tablets. A short list includes: iPhone 5 and later, Samsung Galaxy, Samsung Note, HTC One, LG Edge, Nexus,  iPad Mini & Air, and more. Let us know if you have specific questions regarding compatibility. You need to be running at least iOS 7.0 or Android 4.0 for smooth operation.

What kind of plug does Helmet use? What do I need to have Helmet work overseas?

Helmet comes with a standard US plug. In order to use it abroad, you need a plug convertor. No electricity convertor is necessary though, as Helmet supports both 110V and 220V.

Where does Helmet store my media data?

Helmet comes with a memory slot for a MicroSD memory card to store your data. In the nearest future, cloud storage options will also become available.

What can I monitor with Helmet?

Helmet is intended for a large variety of uses. You can monitor virtually anything that is important to you: your home, office space, children, pets, elderly parents, or your valuables.

How many users does one Helmet support?

If you only have one Helmet, all your family (and friends) can still use it! iFamCare app allows up to four viewers using Helmet simultaneously but you can invite unlimited number of people to view your video with limited access.


What is that built-in laser made for?

The main purpose for the laser is to play with your pets – and we don’t mean only cats or dogs. Parrots, geckos, fish and even spiders are known to chase laser beams! 

What can Helmet do?

Helmet can stream video, take photo and video, and send you alerts when motion or sound is detected. You can share your videos and photos on social media or email them to your friends. Helmet also provides a public video feed sharing platform where you can share your media with other users and comment on other people’s videos or pictures. In addition to that, it has a built-in laser to play with your pet, and two-way audio so that you could communicate even when you’re far away. Helmet also features environment monitoring to keep track of smoke, formaldehyde, benzene, carbon monoxide, hydrogen, ethanol, ammonia, and cigarette smoke in the air.

Are all Helmet’s features available now?

Some app features are still in the process of development and will be available to the users in early 2016. Such features include: social sharing, environment monitoring, cloud storage, and search for nearby Helmet cameras.

story:
RACE ACROSS AMERICA JUNE 2014

Race across America (RAAM) is the World's toughest cycling race. The route traverses from West Coast starting at Oceanside, California to finish East Coast at Annapolis, Maryland. A total distance of 3000 miles is what each of the rider rides on his/her bicycle which is to be done in less than 12  days to successfully complete the challenge. The route passes through 12 states, 88 counties and numerous communities across United States.

A time trial, trans continental race, where every second counts, no matter what, you take time out for breaks, sleep, loo & every single moment, all adds up in the total time. 

More than 2000+ people around the world have scaled the mount Everest against which less than 200 Solo Participants have completed Race across America in the history of 30 years. RAAM can be done in several formats: Solo, 2-team, 4-team & 8-team. Solo mode where a single rider does 3000 miles from coast to coast.

Learn More

SUMIT PATIL & TEAM AGNI

       

  

Team AGNI is a group of friends who have come together to see Mr Sumit Patil complete 3000 miles in less than 12 days and bring glory to the nation. The team is a mix of professionals from various backgrounds, young and active in pursuing various adventure activities. 

The Value

The crew and rider needs show and input strength, endurance and energy to never lose up until covering 3000 miles. All of your contributions would make a big difference in crossing each mile in run up to the glory, something which we all will proudly share. 

Your contributions will help in setting up our crew car, nutrition and some other essentials that the crew and Sumit Patil would need like medicines, food, motels etc. 

WHAT MEDIA SAYS

             

http://goo.gl/3gRwf3                                 http://goo.gl/BA7Dmp

             

http://goo.gl/hsH0LH                                http://goo.gl/0SF1PL

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Do spread the word among friends, colleagues on Facebook, word of mouth
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Living in United States & want to be a part of our journey? Do write us at raamteamagni@gmail.com and let us know.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Gift a Sight Project 2014

The power to see is a huge blessing and a very big advantage for all of us. Humans that have this advantage cannot understand the challenges that a blind person faces. Think about living in a third world country, being old, financially weak, and suddenly becoming blind due to Cataract. It is a huge disadvantage and leaves a person in a weak position with great distress. People passing through this phase of life face a Three-Pronged Challenge -  Economic, Mental and Emotional. The rural population living in a third world country is so poor that they can't afford a small surgery which might cost them a meager sum of $ 50-100 . After losing their eyes, they live and die in acute circumstances. The “Gift A Sight” Project is a very small step towards creating a caring community that provides a few people dignity and a new life.

What We Need 

Please visit our website for details on the project.

www.friendsforcause.org

This year we are targeting 300 people. As per our estimate we need $21,000 at the current rate of exchange. As of June 12th, we have $ 11,000 and are short another $10,000. We want to raise as much as we can. Six members of our group are paying for their own cost of travel, lodging and boarding. Our office expenses are zero. Therefore, each dollar collected goes directly to the cause. 

  • You can fund a full surgery or a partial surgery.
  • The cost of a single full surgery is $50.

The Impact

Of the 1.2 billion people living in India, more than 15 million are afflicted with sight-impairing conditions. In many of these cases, sight could be restored with one very simple surgery. Operable Cataract Surgery. 

Why India?

This country has the biggest population of blind people in the world. In the future we wish to get involved in helping other developing countries as well. 

We are participating in the World Health Organization's goal to remove blindness from the world by the year 2020. This is our 3rd project and since last year's project was so successful we hope to do even better this year. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Spread the word: Share details about our project on your Facebook.
    • Ask your friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
    • Ask people to visit our website www.friendsforcause.org

story:
Welcome to a local world with GlobalLeaf

Hi, 

I'm Inge Baars and I'm a international business student from the Netherlands. 
I want to introduce you to a new global travel community for students;
GlobalLeaf travel community. 

GlobalLeaf gives you the opportunity to experience the cities that you're visiting in a new way. Whether you're in your home country or abroad, you will know where to go for the local spots, the cheaper restuarants, the student bars and the free events. 

Also, you can meet up with other members for a drink, party or even a small sightseeing tour. And to help you find your favourite restaurant, bar or activity, GlobalLeaf provides you with ratings from other students & backpackers to guide you to the perfect places. 

The story

During six months of traveling, I realized that I want use my education in International business and management, combine it with my passion for traveling and finish it off with my drive to improve. This mix of abilities and interests led to the creation of a global travel community for students and backpackers, called GlobalLeaf. Let me tell you some more about GlobalLeaf.

Don’t worry, you’re not the only one with this experience. However, there is also another way to visit a city.


This will provide students & backpackers with a better, enriched travel map:

Apart from giving travellers a better experience of the city, small ventures are helped by the initiative of GlobalLeaf as well. Whenever a tip about a venture is posted on the website, this venture has the opportunity to promote itself on a page of the website. This is not just a banner or website-link, but a short message to tell the GlobalLeaf members why they are worth a visit. They also have the opportunity to provide members with a discount, which can only be granted when a review of the venture is posted on GlobalLeaf.  This way, the smaller ventures in the cities have the chance to promote themselves at very low costs, attract customers and build up a trusted image on the ratings page of GlobalLeaf for future use.

Many people are willing to show others around and let them feel at home when they're on the other side of the world, but not all of them want to spend an entire day doing so. With GlobalLeaf members can be as active as they like. 

The goal of GlobalLeaf is to enable students & backpackers to experience the actual city instead of the touristic version, and to enable local ventures to promote themselves without having to spend lots of money. 

Helping GlobalLeaf to become globally active will help students, backpackers and local ventures financially and add experiences to peoples lives. Small, local ventures don't need to waste money on promoting without results, but only need a small amount to reach their target group. 


What you fund and what you get

The website for GlobalLeaf has already been set up a little while ago through my personal funding. The website needs adjustments and maintaining in order to expand worldwide. This is what fundings are used for:

  1. Website maintainment and improvements (which include more Google-map features for localization, click-through-links between the maps and the Ratings-page and the option for non-members to leave posts).
  2. Reaching out to people all over the world through marketing campaigns
  3. Setting up a network of motivated ambassadors in every country that GlobalLeaf is active in in order to have national knowledge of cultures and habits. 

If these goals are met, the next step is to create an application for phones and tablets. 

Most costs will be in the website, as this is the main product and needs to function well and be user friendly. 

Every donated amount is very welcome! 

When I don't reach my entire funding goal, the raised money will be spend on as much maintainence as possible and campaigns to spread the word about GlobalLeaf worldwide. 

The Impact

Other travel organizations ended up changing their goals and going for the money instead of staying true to their believe. I want to create a community in which freedom is given to the members and they help each other because they want to. Ventures that are posted about by members get the option to promote themselves on a separate page, so that GlobalLeaf is really made by its members. 

Every city will have promotional space for 1 bar, 1 restuarant and 1 attraction.  This gives the ventures a unique place on the site, on which they can promote themselves for up to one month in a row. This enables a fast circulation of ventures. The amount of ventures per city will be increased when discounts are given to the members of GlobalLeaf. 

Other Ways to Support

Apart from contributions, you get really help me out through other methods. 

Please become a MEMBER for free and share the local tips that you have on the website.
Also, SPREAD THE WORD about GlobalLeaf. Every new person hearing about it is useful! 

If you know any people that love traveling or could use a new way to promote their local venture, please e-mail me at inge@globalleaf.net. Any tips, people and places are very welcome and I can use everything :).


Thank you very much for all your support!!

story:
Share the love!

 

 Once in a blue moon you have an idea that changes the world...

For us, that idea is BeachSheetz. A drawstring backpack that opens into a 7x7 ft. sheet that's sand, water and heat resistant. 

Ordinary beach towels absorb sand, need to be weighted down, and are so small that they leave your head or feet in the sand. 

We've designed BeachSheetz to solve all of those problems. 

Our design makes it easy to spot from a mile away. 

On the inside, there's a secret pocket to stash your phone, wallet and keys.

When you're done, simply stuff it back into the bag and it will return to its original form. 

As an added bonus, we've left room on the inside of the bag for sunscreen, water and beach toys. 

Beyond the beach, BeachSheetz is great for hiking.

 Camping 

And hanging out with the family. 

Throughout the Kickstarter, we'll work hard to make sure your pledges are delivered on time so you can enjoy your BeachSheetz in the warm months ahead. 

Thanks for your support. We couldn't do it without you!

story:
STORY

 

Why am I planning this Solo Trek ?

This year I am in my Senior Year at Noosa Pengari Steiner School (here in Oz) before I am set free into the world of adulthood.

As happens with Steiner Schools around the world, as part of my final year assessment I must carry out a project of my own devising – with the emphasis not only on education but also on personal development. AKA I must come up with a project that seems near to impossible to execute, but then through resourcefulness, lateral-thinking and a hell of a lot of hard work… ultimately discover for myself  ‘I'm possible’.

So in light of the brief, I have chosen to do something that i would imagine very few people my age have done. I have chosen to plan & execute a solo hike across an island in a remote wilderness location and push myself to the limits of physical, emotional & mental endurance. Upon my return I will then create a website that documents my trip and inspires other young and old people to find and push beyond their own boundaries and ultimately get their butt out into nature!

Why have I chosen to do a hike?
Most simply put, I have an impetuous passion for the outdoors and an urge to explore new territory. When I am outdoors in nature with no human development in sight, I feel a sense of awareness and personal freedom.  It's a feeling that portrays for me how I wish to live my life. 

By undertaking this project I hope to affect people with my passion and hearten them to live their life in solidarity with their own heart-felt passions. Basically, ANYTHING is possible in life, when you follow the truth of who you are and follow your dreams.

Also, being a passionate lover of photography, trekking ‘off the beaten track’ enables me to capture images of landscapes that are largely unseen… further enkindling others to get back to nature and love the beauty of this planet.

And why Hinchinbrook Island?  It is Australia's largest island National Park and is very biodiverse, featuring a jagged range of granite mountains rising to 1121 metres, pristine beaches, waterfalls, coral reefs, dense rainforests and woodlands. It is also home to many animal species in particular an abundant bird life, turtles, dolphins and crocodiles. The island also has a rich Aboriginal history, which I am eager to research and discover. However the best part of all is its remote, unspoiled and nearly deserted by humans as the whole island is very limited to human interaction. 

More about my Website... Upon completion of my trek, I will be creating my very own website  CallumMatthews.com (coming soon), all by myself from the ground up… yep, another ‘trek’ into the unknown for me !

My website will focus on ‘Outdoor Adventure Trips’. I will start by documenting my Hinchinbrook island trek in detail and include detailed information that will aid other hikers in their planning & execution of remote hikes. Here is a glimpse of what I will cover:

  • Hinchinbrook island – Everything you need to know about the trail: logistics, itinerary, trail conditions, safety, equipment, food (preparing & dehydrating your own, meal planning)… basically everything!
  • Solo Hiking - An insight into my personal experiences solo hiking – including the ‘do’s’ and the 'don'ts'.
  • Photography - A photographic section to display the breath-taking scenery of Hinchinbrook Island displaying its beautiful wilderness that people rarely see.

When I finish school at the end of this year, over time I envision this website to grow and expand covering further areas of Australia and who knows, maybe the world ! 

I have done the numbers…

Over the last 12 months I have been saving money and have purchased some of the equipment necessary to make my Hinchinbrook island trek possible.

Now, as part of my High School Senior Year 12 Project, I have completed a full budget of the trip. Ouch !!!  Even though I have already made quite a significant investment myself, I am still short a bit. As this is a solo-trek in a very remote location (meaning I may not see any other person on the trail for a full week), it is essential that I take the necessary precautions, including professional safety equipment, for my own health, survival & well-being.

Whilst I am covering out of my own pocket (with the help of Mum & Dad) all travel & accommodation, (to and from Hinchinbrook) as well as borrowing many items from school, family & friends, there are still a number of specialty items that I need to purchase/hire for this remote trek:

Lightweight Tent:  For this type of trip, I will need to invest in a rugged lightweight and weather proof tent that will last me for this trip and into my future of hiking.

Safety Equipment:  After significant research, there are some things that I just can’t do without and are essential for mitigating the risks of this trip.  Essentially, I will NOT be able to do the trip at all without any of these items:  GPS, PLB (personal locator beacon), satellite phone (hire costs) and remote location first aid kit.

Education & Survival:  Whilst I am an avid hiker and have trekked many high skill/difficulty hikes in the past (Angels Landing in Zion National Park, USA was one of my most favourites), I am keenly aware that this adventure is on the high risk level.  PLUS, as I am hiking solo in a remote location which adds further significant risk to this hike.  As a result, I will need to invest in education sources that help me with my risk mitigation plans, scenario planning & emergency contingencies.  Whilst I already have a specialized ‘Remote Location First Aid Certificate’, I will need to refresh the course contents and must also embark on further studies (including practice hikes) to ensure I am thoroughly prepared.

Food: Most of the dehydrated packet meals on the market are filled with nasties and are not nutritionally sound. I have already begun undertaking extensive research in meal preparation for remote hikes and have also started to prepare 'test' dehydrated meals. Consequently, I will purchase and dehydrate all of my own food to meet all of my nutritional/energy requirements for this trip… which is HUGE for a 17 year old boy. I might just need a bigger bag! I also plan on meeting with specialised people in sports nutrition.  I look forward to sharing all my knowledge with you too on my new website.

All of the above items are necessities for the trip and will last me for years and years to come.  After this trek I plan on putting the above items to good use by planning future adventures and documenting these trips on my website.   

 

Here is where I would love your help…

I have put over 500+ hours into this trip so far… planning, sourcing equipment & undertaking extensive research. I have now reached a point where I need to raise funds to purchase the above specialty equipment. 

The timeframe is very tight as I need to embark on a practice trek to test all the safety equipment and streamline the plan for my Hinchinbrook hike. All this must be completed over the next few weeks, such that I am well-prepared for my mid-June 2017 journey.

If you believe in the greater potential of my trek, what I am trying to achieve and my future aspirations, then I would be so grateful for your support in making this trek possible.  

In return, for each level of support that you give, you receive a PERK. Essentially, a PERK is a gift from me as a HUGE THANK YOU for your support.

The PERKS you will receive include some of my most favourite photos that I have taken on my travels to date around Australia, North America, Europe and Asia. I have put together photographs that I believe portray these incredible places in the best way. I hope that when people view my work they can feel like they were there and experienced each moment. I know you will love my photographic work and I am really excited to be able to share my photos with you all. At the top is a video of my photographic work to date! You can also check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/

Here is a summary of all the PERKS that are listed on the top-right-hand column of this page:
 

$25 - 3x High Resolution Digital Photographs
3x High Resolution Digital Photographs – received via email. You can use these digital jpegs as a wallpaper, or print & frame them, its up to you! As the files are high-res, you can print them very large without loss of resolution. I will personally email you your 3x High Res jpegs within 5 days of you making this purchase. Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/

+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos

+ Credited as a supporter on my new website
 

$50 - 8x High Resolution Digital Photographs​
8x High Resolution Digital Photographs – received via email. You can use these digital jpegs as a wallpaper, or print & frame them, its up to you! As the files are high-res, you can print them very large without loss of resolution. I will personally email you your 8x High Res jpegs within 5 days of you making this purchase. Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/

+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos

+ Credited as a supporter on my new website
 

$160 - Limited Edition Photo Book
Limited Edition Photo Book. I am creating a 30-40 page, professionally bound, high-gloss ‘coffee table book’ of my most favourite photos I have captured from around the world.  The book will be compiled AFTER my Hinchinbrook Island trek, such that it can include images from the trek and will ship to you FREE of charge by 31st October 2017. Depending on your location, (anywhere in the world) you will then receive your Photo Book within 5 to 10 business days.
Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/

+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos

+ Credited as a supporter on my new website

I will be posting updates of the Photo Book on this Indigogo campaign page… So check in at any time and see how it is coming along.
 

$285 - Canvas Wall Print - Framed 
A high quality professionally printed canvas wall print, framed and ready to hang. This is the ‘pièce de résistance’ when it comes to PERKS and I am VERY excited to be creating this PERK for you.  After I return from my Hinchinbrook hike, I will email you (by the 31 July 2017) a selection of my best photographs from various countries around the world (including Hinchinbrook Island). That way you can choose your most favourite photograph and I will have it professionally printed onto a large 75cm x 50cm (30" x 20") Canvas Wall Print personally for you !   Your finished product will be ready by the 31st August 2017 and shipped FREE of charge directly to your door.  Depending on your location, (anywhere in the world) you will then receive your Canvas Wall Print within 5 to 10 business days.
Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/

+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos

+ Credited as a supporter on my new website

I will be posting updates of the Canvas Prints on this Indigogo campaign page… So check in at any time and see how it is coming along.
 

One final note…

Thank you for reading about my life-changing Hinchinbrook Island adventure and your heart-felt consideration of supporting one 17 year old High School boys dream of making a difference in the world.

Thank You 

Callum :)

+ Credited as a supporter on my new website 
$160 - Limited Edition Photo BookLimited Edition Photo Book. I am creating a 30-40 page, professionally bound, high-gloss ‘coffee table book’ of my most favourite photos I have captured from around the world.  The book will be compiled AFTER my Hinchinbrook Island trek, such that it can include images from the trek and will ship to you FREE of charge by 31st October 2017. Depending on your location, (anywhere in the world) you will then receive your Photo Book within 5 to 10 business days.Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/
+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos
+ Credited as a supporter on my new website
I will be posting updates of the Photo Book on this Indigogo campaign page… So check in at any time and see how it is coming along. 
$285 - Canvas Wall Print - Framed A high quality professionally printed canvas wall print, framed and ready to hang. This is the ‘pièce de résistance’ when it comes to PERKS and I am VERY excited to be creating this PERK for you.  After I return from my Hinchinbrook hike, I will email you (by the 31 July 2017) a selection of my best photographs from various countries around the world (including Hinchinbrook Island). That way you can choose your most favourite photograph and I will have it professionally printed onto a large 75cm x 50cm (30" x 20") Canvas Wall Print personally for you !   Your finished product will be ready by the 31st August 2017 and shipped FREE of charge directly to your door.  Depending on your location, (anywhere in the world) you will then receive your Canvas Wall Print within 5 to 10 business days.Check out my photos here: https://www.instagram.com/curlycally/
+ Personalised postcard of one of my favourite photos
+ Credited as a supporter on my new website
I will be posting updates of the Canvas Prints on this Indigogo campaign page… So check in at any time and see how it is coming along. 
One final note…
Thank you for reading about my life-changing Hinchinbrook Island adventure and your heart-felt consideration of supporting one 17 year old High School boys dream of making a difference in the world.
Thank You 
Callum :)

story:
***  UPDATE: We removed the blackout dates ***

We have listened to your comments and questions and as a result of those, we have removed the blackout dates that applied to all the perks (i.e. which were valid for stays in low season only). So everyone who has backed us, and those who haven’t yet, will also benefit from this change. Future stays are valid year round, and this will mean savings of 82% as the rates in the summer are double than other times of the year. Indiegogo’s system will not let us update the perks, but where you have it in writing and will always be displayed in our campaign update page.

Best wishes,
Kristin & Marcus (Founders of Amberlair)

 

 

 

 

 

When we made the life-changing decision seven years ago to travel the world, we could not even imagine that the impact and inspiration would lead us to create Amberlair. Traveling to this extent gave us a new perspective, and exploration fueled our creativity. During our trip, we discovered that the most special and unique experiences were brought on by staying in smaller, independent hotels.

We always thought it was a great idea to tap into the knowledge of like-minded travelers. We wondered why we shouldn’t just start with the people who love boutique hotels? Going down this path, we discovered that crowdfunding and crowdsourcing are actually great ways to develop a product made for the guest and by the guest. We instantly loved the idea.

We’ve launched this crowdfunding campaign to give you the chance to back the first ever crowdsourced boutique hotel. After the campaign’s completion, we’ll be hard at work (with your input!) preparing for a very exciting grand opening in 2020. We’ll need help deciding on style, design and amenities – you won’t want to miss out!

 

 

 

 

Amberlair has a revolutionary approach to set up boutique hotels around the world. Through innovative use of crowdsourcing and social media, Amberlair brings together the global travel community and lets them have a say even before the hotels are built. Our community of backers - who we dearly address as #boholovers, meaning 'boutique hotel lovers' - are involved from day one, both creatively and financially.

Even our name was crowdsourced, because one hundred minds work better than one. And guess what? Our community - YOU - has also chosen the location of the first Amberlair in Italy. With the help of our community, we are going to develop a historic villa in Puglia, Italy, and to turn it into the perfect boutique hotel.

In many cases, people stay at hotels only once after finding rooms online and they do not have (or are interested in) a relationship with the brand. Amberlair creates potential lifelong guests, where people can get more involved with the brand and put their heart in the project.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In Puglia, the Amberlair team will be renovating historical buildings set within the plot— each offering a different room style— to create the first luxury boutique hotel in the region and give guests an experience they won’t find anywhere else.

The current project allows for 60 rooms: 30 rooms in the historical villa, 10 rooms in a unique farmhouse building situated amidst olive groves and vineyards, 10 cave or spa rooms and 10 luxury tents.

 

 

  • Spacious Rooftop Terraces
  • Aviary
  • SPA / Swimming Pool
  • Wedding destination with a famous pilgrim church within walking distance
  • Located between two crystal clear seas, the Ionian and the Adriatic
  • Within 20 minutes of pristine beaches

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Offering hotels for the people, by the people, Amberlair gives power back to the guests, allowing them to shape how a property will be used and what it will look like and to have the best boutique hotel experience imaginable. Backers can participate, interact, influence, support, back, fund or simply lay back and watch it happen from the very beginning.

     

     

     

     

    Along the development process, that means until the hotel has opened its doors, the Amberlair will run various contests and brainstorming exercises where backers have the chance to submit their ideas and to vote on your favorite ones:

    • what should we do with the old birdhouse located in front of the villa? 
    • how shall the perfect bedroom be designed?
    • what does the perfect bathroom look like?
    • what does the perfect swimming pool look like?
    • what kind of activities would you prefer? Would it be cooking classes with a nona, series of sports activities (yoga, biking, etc.) or nothing at all?

     

     

     

     

     

     

    For the People, By the People: Our community of boutique hotel enthusiasts is steadily growing. We have more than 60 Amberlair ambassadors comprised of travel, lifestyle and luxury bloggers with a reach potential of 1.2 million on Twitter and 500k on Facebook.

    As the world’s first crowdsourced boutique hotel, we’ve gained coverage on high-profile outlets including Forbes, National Geographic, Luxury Branded, Boutique Hotel News, WTM Global Trends Report, as well as various well-known luxury travel blogs.

     

     

     

     

    Although, we must confess that we have tried to keep it a secret and away from mainstream media for as long as we could, until now. Why? Because the surprise would be spoiled.

    Our community of boutique hotel enthusiasts who we dearly call #boholovers are involved from day one, both creatively and financially. Even our name was crowdsourced, because hundred minds work better than one.

     

     

     

     

    “I feel really excited about Amberlair. It’s a hotel for the people, by the people and it’s going to revolutionize the way hotels are built and conceptualized.”

     

    “It is once in a lifetime experience and I love the idea. I am also looking forward to taking part in the crowdfunding part, as I really want to be one of the first guests staying at the hotel.”

     

    “It’s a brilliant concept, getting feedback from future guests and adapting the hotel in function of this, rather than launching a hotel and having to tweak it afterwards. Hopefully it’s the way of the future for hotels!”

     

     

    ​“Amberlair is a fascinating concept. I’ll be curious to see how so many opinions from so many people can come together to create a cohesive project. If they pull it off, it could very well change the hospitality industry.”

     

    “I love the Amberlair concept. Such an innovative way to bring the travel community together. I can’t wait to see where the first location will be!”

     

    “I love the idea of crowdsourcing the perfect hotel. I think no one knows better than the travel community what would work best in a hotel and I’m excited to see what is created when we combine our efforts and ideas.”

     

     

     

     

    The southeastern heel of the Italian boot, Puglia is rich in history, which we noticed right away in  its beautiful, ancient architecture and friendly people. We could almost see the Amberlair boutique hotel – your hotel – resting somewhere amidst a sea of olive trees and vineyards. Because Puglia offers world class wine and cuisine, fascinating cultural experiences and gorgeous scenery, we knew we had made the right choice.

    Our fantastic property in Puglia is remotely located between two seas - the Ionian and the Adriatic, and it is within easy reach of beaches, UNESCO world heritage sites and international airports (Bari and Brindisi).

     

     

    • Puglia was voted one of the world’s Top 10 Destinations for Wine Tourism in 2013 by Wine Enthusiast USA
    • Significant number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites in close proximity

     

     

    • Castel del Monte / Castellana Grotte / Trulli of Alberobello / Lecce
    • Little cone-like stone buildings known as Trulli are only found in Puglia

     

     

     


     

     

    • Before founding Amberlair, Kristin and Marcus took an around-the-world tour and visited more than 40 countries on six continents, researching boutique hotels and getting the inside track on what works and what doesn’t
    • Spent over a decade in the airline business
    • Senior strategic planning role on the implementation of the Airbus A380

     

    • Over 15 years experience in the tourism industry and travel journalism
    • Toured the world, evaluating destinations and assessing hotels as a freelance writer and in-house reviewer for TUI Group

     

    • Hotel executive with extensive experience in hotel investments, including development, feasibility, investment analysis, asset management and capital sourcing
    • Vice President of Development for Europe for Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts
    • Founding principal of Taylor Global Advisors

     

    • Experienced in B2B and B2C marketing for over 18 years, implementing social media campaigns
    • Founder of the award winning luxury travel blog Mrs. O Around the World with a highly engaged, affluent audience, who use the blog as a point of reference

     

    • PR director with a global view and expertise in luxury lifestyle and experiential travel
    • Experienced in creating innovative, results-led campaigns across print and online platforms for clients large and small, from iconic city center hotels, restaurants and hidden away spa resorts

     

    • Resident Manager at Masseria Il Frantoio in Puglia, Italy
    • Master’s degree in International Hotel Management

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Please help us to spread the word and share this campaign with your friends, family and other like-minded boutique hotel lovers. THANK YOU so much supporting and backing us. It means the world to us – literally.

     

    Why Crowdfunding?

    • So you can be one of our first guests and have the chance to stay with us before others at a very special rate
    • Enlarge our community of boutique hotel enthusiasts

     

    When do you expect the hotel to be complete?

    • It will take time to plan and build the boutique hotel, so we will need you to be patient. We promise regular updates.
    • We need a community of boutique hotel enthusiasts who will be with us for the long haul. It’ll be so worth it! Our first boutique hotel will open its doors in 2020.

     

    What will your contributions be used for?

    • We are looking for 15,000 EUR of funding. These funds will be used to fulfill the architectural planning.

     

     

     

     

    • Your vote counts at Amberlair! Every backer has a voting right. We will run various contests and brainstorming exercises where backers have the chance to submit their ideas and to vote on their favorite ones.
    • Your room night perk will be valid once the hotel has started operation and remains valid for the next three years.
    • You can make a reservation 6 months prior to opening.
    • After choosing your perk, you will receive a personalized voucher via email.
    • All vouchers can only be used once and are not transferable.
    • All perks are subject to availability and exclude travel arrangements.
    • All room night perks will be be valid for two persons sharing one room: double occupancy
    • Between January and March the boutique hotel will be closed due to the seasonality of the area.
    • Site Visit Perk: We will stay either at Masseria Fumarola or Masseria Le Fabriche during the site visit.

     

     

     

     

    We’ve been working hard to build a community of travelers, boutique hotel enthusiasts and Amberlair ambassadors to help us spread our message and make our first boutique hotel a reality. We’ve picked an ideal first location and are excited to get construction underway and get our doors open to the guests who have put their heart into this project from day one.

    Puglia, located in the ‘heel’ of Italy, is a tempting region with constant and fast growing tourist numbers. Yet, Italy might be a bit unpredictable once it comes to dealing with the local authorities. Having a very strong team on board with people who know the Italian market in depth, as well as the hospitality industry, we have a long way ahead – but that will be half the fun. And we will share all the ups and downs with our backers. Our estimate is to be able to welcome you at Amberlair Puglia in 2020, as one of our very first guests.

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    We will continue searching for luxurious and unique locations for future projects while gathering input from excited guests to build a boutique hotel that’s truly for the people, by the people.

    Amberlair has the potential to revolutionize the way hotels are built and conceptualized.
