story:
Why We Invented Ox Cartz

Ox Cartz was created to solve a problem.  We were at our daughter's soccer tournament when we realized how much stuff we had to carry from the family truckster to the field.  On many occasions, my wife, Dawn, had to go to these tournaments by herself because of my 24 hour Fire Department schedule.  It became very clear we needed an easier way to carry all of our gear each weekend.  We began the search for a lightweight, strong, versatile, quality product that would carry an ice chest, shade, our chairs and a few gear bags, all in one trip.  Unfortunately, that product didn't exist, so we took it upon ourselves to invent Ox Cartz.
story_txt: Why We Invented Ox CartzOx Cartz was created to solve a problem.  We were at our daughter's soccer tournament when we realized how much stuff we had to carry from the family truckster to the field.  On many occasions, my wife, Dawn, had to go to these tournaments by herself because of my 24 hour Fire Department schedule.  It became very clear we needed an easier way to carry all of our gear each weekend.  We began the search for a lightweight, strong, versatile, quality product that would carry an ice chest, shade, our chairs and a few gear bags, all in one trip.  Unfortunately, that product didn't exist, so we took it upon ourselves to invent Ox Cartz.

story:
Can you believe it? It's 2017, and all the travel adapters on the market are still equipped with a single-use fuse that was invented in the 19th century.

As a result, every time you go on a travel, there's a high chance that your travel adapter will fail because of the single-use fuse, and you could be one of the reviewers above. That's why we built Passport.

When we began to work on this project two years ago, we simply wanted to resolve the single-use fuse problem so people don't need to worry about charging their devices while traveling.

As our project went on, we found many other problems of the current travel adapters on the market, such as child safety issues, not enough USB outputs, and awkward two-handed operation. So we ended up making a truly worry-free ultimate universal travel adapter and charger. 

Auto-resetting fuses are commonly seen in the aerospace industry, but it’s never applied in travel adapters before due to cost and size.

It took us a long time and hundreds of experiments to finally be able to customize the perfect auto-resetting fuse at the right cost and size for our product.

Passport’s use of auto-resetting technology allows the device to recover from an overload on its own within just one minute, making it electronically unbreakable, and the most resilient travel adapter ever.

It’s actually a mini switch with a built-in Bimetallic Thermal Sensor. It consists of two thermally different metals stuck together back to back. When it is cold the contacts are closed and current passes through the switch. When it gets hot, one metal expands more than the other and the bonded bi-metallic strip bends up, opening the contacts and preventing the current from flowing. The fuse can stand up to 10,000 reset cycles.

Video Demonstration of Auto-Resetting Fuse

 

Thanks to its built-in all-in-one plugs and the universal AC output, Passport can work seamlessly in over 150 countries worldwide.

Passport can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, I, J, K, L, N and O outlets.

Passport can accept type A, B, C, E, F, G, I, J, K, L and N plugs.    

 

 

According our research, most travel adapters on the market are not CE EMC certified for their USB charging electronics. Such devices can put out electromagnetic radiation that causes flickering screen or unstable behavior of your devices.

 

 

Note: images in the chart are to scale.

 

 

 

From the beginning, we wanted to design something that's world-class. So we partnered with Y Studios, an award-winning design firm based in San Francisco. They have won numerous Red Dot, iF, and Good Design awards in the past and have worked with several esteemed clients, including Microsoft, Activision, TiVo, Sphero, and Sonos. They worked closely with our team in East Palo Alto, California, and China for nearly two years.

Two years may seem like a long time to develop a product like this, but it was a matter of answering several complicated questions: how to fit so many components in such a small body, how to reinvent the something that has existed for decades and make it better, how to find the best auto-resetting fuse at the right size and cost, how to design it so it looks great. The fruits of this process are several pending patents and a unique structure that's second to none.

 

 

 

Dimensions: 2.24” x 2.8” x 2.5”/57mm x 72mm x 64mm  

Weight: 5.6oz/159g  

USB Output: 2.4A/12W Max per port, 5A/25W Total with ZEN+

AC Input: 100-250V/AC 50/60Hz

AC Output: 6A Max (600W at 100V or 1500W at 250V) 

Note: Passport doesn't convert voltage. Please only use devices that are suitable for the voltage supplied. 

 

 

Passport Type-C PD Add-on is a 30W charger that can perfectly attach to Passport so that you can get rid of your heavy and cumbersome Type-C laptop chargers while you travel. More details of the stretch goals would be announced when we progress towards them.

 

 

 

We knew we wanted to come back to crowdfunding because of the tremendous support we felt from the community the first time we released a product in 2013 (Zendure A-Series Crush Proof External Batteries). It was a huge success thanks to each and everyone of you.

Now that we have a new product to launch, we can't resist the chance to work with you guys again to make Passport a reality. Your support always inspires us to stay motivated. 

 

Risks and challenges

Our previous campaign had much bigger challenges because we were working with lithium-ion batteries and shipping them all around the world. We still delivered on time despite having way more backers than originally anticipated. We’re confident we can do it again. We are working with some of the best people in the industry to minimize risks. By partnering with experienced manufacturers and logistics experts, we are prepared for pretty much anything. And, of course, we will maintain constant communication with our backers no matter what.

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ here.
story_txt:
Can you believe it? It's 2017, and all the travel adapters on the market are still equipped with a single-use fuse that was invented in the 19th century.As a result, every time you go on a travel, there's a high chance that your travel adapter will fail because of the single-use fuse, and you could be one of the reviewers above. That's why we built Passport.When we began to work on this project two years ago, we simply wanted to resolve the single-use fuse problem so people don't need to worry about charging their devices while traveling.As our project went on, we found many other problems of the current travel adapters on the market, such as child safety issues, not enough USB outputs, and awkward two-handed operation. So we ended up making a truly worry-free ultimate universal travel adapter and charger. Auto-resetting fuses are commonly seen in the aerospace industry, but it’s never applied in travel adapters before due to cost and size.It took us a long time and hundreds of experiments to finally be able to customize the perfect auto-resetting fuse at the right cost and size for our product.Passport’s use of auto-resetting technology allows the device to recover from an overload on its own within just one minute, making it electronically unbreakable, and the most resilient travel adapter ever.It’s actually a mini switch with a built-in Bimetallic Thermal Sensor. It consists of two thermally different metals stuck together back to back. When it is cold the contacts are closed and current passes through the switch. When it gets hot, one metal expands more than the other and the bonded bi-metallic strip bends up, opening the contacts and preventing the current from flowing. The fuse can stand up to 10,000 reset cycles.Video Demonstration of Auto-Resetting Fuse

 
Thanks to its built-in all-in-one plugs and the universal AC output, Passport can work seamlessly in over 150 countries worldwide.Passport can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, I, J, K, L, N and O outlets.Passport can accept type A, B, C, E, F, G, I, J, K, L and N plugs.      According our research, most travel adapters on the market are not CE EMC certified for their USB charging electronics. Such devices can put out electromagnetic radiation that causes flickering screen or unstable behavior of your devices.  Note: images in the chart are to scale.   From the beginning, we wanted to design something that's world-class. So we partnered with Y Studios, an award-winning design firm based in San Francisco. They have won numerous Red Dot, iF, and Good Design awards in the past and have worked with several esteemed clients, including Microsoft, Activision, TiVo, Sphero, and Sonos. They worked closely with our team in East Palo Alto, California, and China for nearly two years.Two years may seem like a long time to develop a product like this, but it was a matter of answering several complicated questions: how to fit so many components in such a small body, how to reinvent the something that has existed for decades and make it better, how to find the best auto-resetting fuse at the right size and cost, how to design it so it looks great. The fruits of this process are several pending patents and a unique structure that's second to none.   Dimensions: 2.24” x 2.8” x 2.5”/57mm x 72mm x 64mm  Weight: 5.6oz/159g  USB Output: 2.4A/12W Max per port, 5A/25W Total with ZEN+AC Input: 100-250V/AC 50/60HzAC Output: 6A Max (600W at 100V or 1500W at 250V) Note: Passport doesn't convert voltage. Please only use devices that are suitable for the voltage supplied.   Passport Type-C PD Add-on is a 30W charger that can perfectly attach to Passport so that you can get rid of your heavy and cumbersome Type-C laptop chargers while you travel. More details of the stretch goals would be announced when we progress towards them.   We knew we wanted to come back to crowdfunding because of the tremendous support we felt from the community the first time we released a product in 2013 (Zendure A-Series Crush Proof External Batteries). It was a huge success thanks to each and everyone of you.Now that we have a new product to launch, we can't resist the chance to work with you guys again to make Passport a reality. Your support always inspires us to stay motivated.  Risks and challengesOur previous campaign had much bigger challenges because we were working with lithium-ion batteries and shipping them all around the world. We still delivered on time despite having way more backers than originally anticipated. We’re confident we can do it again. We are working with some of the best people in the industry to minimize risks. By partnering with experienced manufacturers and logistics experts, we are prepared for pretty much anything. And, of course, we will maintain constant communication with our backers no matter what.Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ here.

story:
'

'

Parks of Study and Reflection

Parks of Study and Reflection are places for all who want to stop in present hectic times and look for answers about the meaning of life, overcoming pain and suffering, about future… Parks are open to everyone. They are places of gathering and of getting in touch with the best in us and the best in others. Places meant for reflection but also for studying, growth and progress of man and of non-violent humanist sensitivity and culture.

All Parks in the world are built and are working thanks to people. They are independent of state or private companies. The fact that the Park in the Czech Republic exists, proves that there are enough people who care for this project and who want to be a part of it.

All Parks have several common symbolical elements - entrance gate, monolith, water fountain, meditation hall and stele (donnor wall).

All people involved in this project are unpaid volunteers. They come from different generations, backgrounds, countries, but they are joined in common cause - overcoming pain and suffering in themselves and in the world, creating the world without wars and violence where human being is the central value.


There are no leaders - the decisions are based on consensus; everyone who is part of the project (takes some responsibility and fulfils it) can join the discussion about the current issues in the Park and its future.

Pravikov Park

The Park of Study and Reflection is situated in a picturesque village Pravikov in Bohemian-Moravian Highlands several kilometres from Pelhřimov, approximately 100 kilometres from Prague. It was created in June 2011.

The real estate we bought for the Park contains three interconnected houses. The first one went through thorough cleaning and reconstruction during the summer 2011 and it is now used as the Centre of Work for seminars, studying, meditations and other activities. Another two buildings are just rough construction. There is also a large spacious building formerly used as cow barn. An integral part is also more than 12 thousand square metres of green vegetation.

In June 2012 there was the ceremonial Inauguration of the Park. Before that the first symbolical elements were installed - wooden entrance gate, stone water fountain and stele. When one passes through the Gate, one enters a different time and space. Marking the boundary between the external world – everyday life and the place for studying and reflection – the interior of the human being, the Gate is designed to bring about a change in the internal state of everyone who enters. Water fountain represents allegorically the fusion of feminine and masculine principles as the source of all energy. It symbolizes the life itself, the energy of life. Donor wall is a small monument displaying the engraved names of all who contributed to the construction of the Park.

Although we managed to build the base of the Park of Study and Reflection in the Czech Republic, it is necessary to think of its further development. We plan to build the Centre of Study, Workshops, bigger accommodation space and more. That’s why we are still looking for other people who would like to join us and support the development of the Park Pravíkov.

The Monolith

In 2014 we (among other things) want to install the Monolith. Monoliths were created by various cultures in history as symbols of connection between earth and sky, always from materials typical for the time of their origin. Constructed of stainless steel to reflect the age we live in, and engraved with the date of the inauguration of the Park, the monolith sets the Park’s coordinates in time and space.

What We Need & What You Get

You can become a part of this project. Each contribution is important. Everyone gives what he or she can and wants - smaller or bigger amount of money, help with the works in the Park, spreading information...

In case of monolith, we need approximately 5 000 USD (maybe less). If we get less through this campagin, it will help anyway - we will get the rest in other ways (personal contributions, funding activities, discount on the material...). If we get more, we will use the surplus for the further development of the Park, probably for the reconstruction of Centre of studies.

The funding of the Park is transparent, everyone can check the account on https://www.fio.cz/scgi-bin/hermes/dz-transparent.cgi?ID_ucet=2500074734. We also share up to date information about the development of the Park on the website and the Facebook page of the Park (www.parkpravikov.cz, www.facebook.com/parkstudii).

As for the perks, we would like to make you really feel that you are part od this project. Everyone who contributes even the smallest amount of money will have his/her name on the stele in Pravikov Park. For bigger contribution, we are offering original Park "souvenirs" - small handmade glass or wooden fountains; or books of Silo's Message (in language of your choice).

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on Facebook and check out our web page and share the information about Pravikov Park and the project of Parks of Study and Reflection in the world.

Join activities in other Parks in the world or organisations and communities related to the Parks.

campaign_city: Kamenice nad Lipou - Pravikov, Czech Republic

story:
Summary

First of all, hi and welcome to The Accommodationer! 
Let me introduce you to the project...

The Accommodationer is a start up, aiming to offer to travelers an all-in-one marketplace to discover uniques local places and book great experiences and to local tourism experts, an incredible tourism marketing platform for promoting their products and their destination.

The idea behind the platform was born on the following bases:

1. We are Travelers: we are frequent travelers and we love to discover new places enjoying original flavors, local culture and local traditions. 

Each time we plan a holidays by searching information on the internet,  we found outdated contents, misleading tips or generic guides. We see thousand of websites offering travel guides and information, mostly managed by marketing professionals with the only objective of driving traffic to their websites.

For this reason, we are designing an online solution where we can all find trusted information created by real local people, which identity is verified and confirmed.

2. We are tourism Professionals: we've been working for years with property managers and tour operators and we perfectly know how they work and what are the industry challenges.

There are several different tools to promote tourism, however none is tailored to promote local destinations, local culture, traditions and incredible local environment.

With this in mind, we are developing a strong, powerful and flexible platform that offers all the dream tools needed to promote small and medium local tourism businesses.

3. We are Locals: and we'd like a business model that reinvest revenues in the territory. 

Another objective we have, is to to give the control back to tourism experts over their destinations, lessening weight and importance from the big industry actors, which are earning huge amounts of money without investing in the territory, while profits will remain to local tourism experts and activities and reinvested in the territory.  We strongly believe in the “disintermediation”.

The Accommodationer will give local tourism experts easy-to-use tools to better understand travelers needs and desires and to travelers accurate information and tips to discover uniques places.

What differentiate The Accommodationer from the competition is
the all-in-one solution with 360º tools to manage and promote local products and territory, unlike modern booking platforms are doing.

All our services will be free or, in some cases, at a very low rate, in order to help small and medium tourism companies to grow and obtain visibility in this highly competitive market within accessible costs.

The Accommodationer is more than a marketplace or a marketing tool. Travelers and tourism experts will be able to collaborate to improve and promote visibility and quality of less known touristic spots with history and traditions.




The Accommodationer Experience™

How many times you've been on holidays but you couldn’t find proper information? 

For example,

  • Have you ever been to Sicily? Did you know that if you go there in august maybe you wouldn't be able to find a private spot on most of the beaches? 
  • Do you know when the most important event of the city of Barcelona is celebrated?
The “Accommodationer Experience”™ is a completely new way to find and discover new local destinations, away from classic touristic routes, where you can spend a special local adventure based on your previous experiences, all this thanks to a new technology we are developing for our platform. 
Every time you book an experience or an accommodation you're contributing in promoting the local environment.

The Accommodationer is a completely different marketplace. Our idea of local tourism is fresh and related to the actual tourism market. We love to think that every cent you will pay for your bookings will be reinvested in the destination. 

We love travel local and we do everything with “local” experiences in mind.

Why We Need Your Support

We have been working on The Accommodationer for the past year - bootstrapping the project, and we can proudly say that we come a long way!
At this stage, your precious support will help us finalizing the development of The Accommodationer platform by hiring new people, as well as incrementing the marketing budget needed to launch the platform on different channels. The Accommodationer is designed to be a big platform and it requires more resources than what we have available now!

Why you should you support The Accommodationer?

  • You love to travel and discover new unique places;
  • You want to try a completely new way of searching and booking local experiences;
  • You are a bored local tourism professional looking for low cost, reliable and smart tools to manage and promote your products and destinations;
  • Like us, you're a strong believer of the disintermadiation.

Why contributing to The Accommodationer project?

Well, for many reasons! 

  1. The Accommodationer will offer all the latest technologies in the tourism industry and a set of all-in-one services that no other company is offering to owners and travelers.

  2. Unlike many lobby driven companies, The Accommodationer is designed and developed with the local tourism concept in mind, with the objective to offer top local experiences and services available. 

  3. We believe The Accommodationer will create new opportunities for small/medium tourism professional and drive incomes to local destinations.

  4. Everybody can participate at no cost. If you are an owner or an activity seller, you can join The Accommodationer marketplace and create your own packages by linking your products with others in the network to increase your visibility.

  5. If you are a travel enthusiast or you simply want to share your experiences by adding a new guide, a tip or any helpful information, The Accommodationer is the platform where your thoughts count.

  6. We are a young company and we need your support!


Q&A's

Q: Which destinations are promoted on The Accommodationer website?

Local Europe destinations. 
The Accommodationer will promote incredible local spots across Europe like the incredible mediaeval town of Erice in Sicily or Mull Island in western Scotland.

We believe that being specialized in one region will give strength, credibility and market penetration to The Accommodationer.

Q: What can I book on The Accommodationer?

Activities and accommodations across Europe.
The Accommodationer offers you the possibility to explore and book a day trip around a small Mediterranean island or to book an incredible house in the Switzerland Alps.

Q: Who and how can contribute to create helpful contents?

Everyone.
If you are both a tourism expert or an enthusiast traveler, sure you have a lot of knowledge to share with the world. The Accommodationer gives you the tools to create and distribute unique travel contents and helpful tips for travelers like you. 
The only condition we have is being verified. Being a trusted source it's very important for the Local tourism sector.

Q: Will The Accommodationer website be mobile friendly?

Yes.
Due to the exponential increase in the number of bookings made with mobile devices, The Accommodationer platform will be fully mobile responsive both for travelers and local tourism experts.

Q: If I'm a property manager or a local tourism expert do I have to pay for my listings?

Absolutely not.
You can post as many listing as you want without having to pay. All our services will be free and in some cases, depending on the usage of a specific service, you will be asked to pay a small fee.

Q: If I'm a property manager or a local tourism expert what kind of tools will I find on The Accommodationer?

At this stage we cannot share our secret recipe but we can anticipate that The Accommodationer will offer you all the tools for managing your tourism business you ever dreamt of, without having to pay high monthly fees or commissions, such as:

  • professional e-mail marketing platform
  • local guides editor
  • package manager
  • free listings
  • free website
  • and many many more......

We have been working in this market for a while and we know exactly what you need!

Q: When I will be able to book my next “local” holidays on The Accommodationer?

We can only say soon, as soon as we can!
The beta launch date is set for January 2014 but unfortunately it will depend on the contribution we will be able to raise....

Your kind contribution will help us to delivery the platform as soon as possible!


# Additional information

    Tourism and opportunities

    If you're a traveler you' might have visited Europe several times, but we're pretty sure that your first choice was a classic destination such as Venice, Rome, Florence, Paris, Berlin, Barcelona, Madrid..... Wasn't it?

    Do you know that close to each one of these popular destination there are thousands of touristic pearls ready to be discovered?
    A recent study shows that almost the 70% of foreign tourists coming to Europe are visiting always the most touristic destinations as capitals, or the most touristic beach spots of southern Europe. 

    The Accommodationer in words

    SIMPLICITY
    Anyone should be able to book holidays only without hassle. For this reason we are developing a user friendly platform where everyone can navigate, explore information and book an accommodation or an activity with few clicks.

    INTELLIGENCE
    The Accommodationer's technology has been developed to offer you a highly personalized experience. The search process will be tailored around your choices and preferences, offering a unique world of possibilities.

    COMPATIBILITY
    One platform, multiple designs. The Accommodationer has been developed to offer you the best experience in all conditions on all devices. Looking for your next holiday's accommodation while you're on the bus? No probs! The Accommodationer's website is fully responsive.

    We'll be happy to give you more information and we hope you will enjoy The Accommodationer soon!

    Gianpaolo and Giulia
    info@theaccommodationer.com

story:
breath out... it's over!

We are eternally grateful for everything you've done​.​ We are now preparing for a massive challenge and couldn't be more excited to get started. Below we've summarised our broad and imminently optimistic plan of action for 2017 - we want to keep you all in the loop and also to know your perks are all in process!

​While the dust settles with the tax man (men) please ​keep spreading the word ​with​ anyone you think might have an interest in this project as were going to need constant exposure to the campaign​ to succeed!​

​www.feelfr.ee   |   Facebook   |   Twitter​   |   Instagram 


an update: where we are now

​This will serve as the first mailing list post, for all direct contributors and subscribers. There will be a link to the list ASAP on the website www.feelfr.ee should you wish to subscribe.

≈ ​Right now

We're currently in Santa Marta, in the north-east of Colombia, where Laura and I have lived for the last 12 months. We're closing down contracts with old landladies, selling everything that we can't use or get wet on the way, and psychologically preparing Gordis, Chiquibronx and Goa for their imminent sea voyage (Below, big-small respectively). Were finishing off final orders of Feel Free teeshirts and bags while were here, too.


3 cats in a boat?​

While were here the lot is being maintained loosely by the previous owner, and as you can imagine we're itching to get to work on it. But we have lots to organise, including a leftover payment for the attached riverside lot, transporting not just the cats but the SERyGRAFÍA workshop et al.; as well as finding a way of ditching a particularly sticky rental contract in Santa Marta in exchange for Nerys' cousin's* little farmhouse beside the lot at the equivalent of £75p/m. 

*That's how it is here.

The impatience is killing me. I can smell the dirt. We​ are on our way however, and​ have lots of trustworthy contacts here who are ​helping us, as well as a dear friend in Capurganá, co-owner of Capurganá's first hostel and property queen​, Nery​.

​

We'll be taking the not-immediately-necessary stuff over, with fingers crossed, at the start of April. ABOVE: Nery with Lau at the lot.

In terms of bureaucracy, visas, and other papers of all kinds we are prepared, having a wealth of experience over the last year with bureaucracy. ​My visa is in process after lots of frustrating official visits and signed papers around the country together with Lau. I couldn't even have started this without Lau's unwavering encouragement and loyalty throughout.​

≈ ​Up to & ​April

​When finally in Capurganá​ we'll map, ​plan, ​clear, ​pla​n the structures, layouts​, prepare​ beds and soil for planting and start to seed the some 120+ Moringa seeds as a circaviva (or living fence) and Baston del Imperador we were graciously given by Laura's uncle Diego in Fusa (Bogotá). 

April will be an uncomfortable period of passing between Santa Marta back-and-forth. We will apply for necessary permits and finalise all the tedious paperwork in this month. We're going to keep everything as low cost as possible, esp. as paperwork is costing us already. We also will arrange the water and electricity services in April.

≈ In ​May


We will have mapped, cleared, planned, prepared and be ​cultivating on the farm. We will ​start building (pending permit) the septic system and main hostel structure​ with the local chippy Arturo (and with luck new best friend. He's a good, seemingly educated man who lives 10 minutes from Feel Free) plus volunteers from Workaway.com and close friends,​ with a view of having ​at least one ​two-storey ​scribble​ below​ live-in ready by July.

​ Architects don't panic - It's not the only scribble.​ We'll also mount the greenhouse nursery. ​The design aims to keep you safe and dry as close as possible to the giant cashew trees​ - the​ beating heart of the forest.

≈ In ​the Summer


​From July/August the main structure will be mounted and the hostel taking it's first ​payments. 

​We will have maintained the fences, and prepared every mandala-shaped bed in zone 1 (the intensive food production area, or kitchen garden see this) with chopped cover crop, compost and hügelkultur beds ready for intensive production of vegetables and fruits. ​The groundwork for the food forest in zones 2 & 3 will be laid, seeding slower species first.

The full list of plants and trees we will be cultivating will soon be available in our public dropbox, here. Once production is started we can start on the natural pool, other guest houses, the kitchen, the animal areas. ​We'll also start projects like ​PLAN PAREJO, (waste management), ​PLAN ABEJA (beehive network) and PLAN COLIBRÍ (​the hummingbird ​conservation plan).​

We plan on keeping a regular diary of all the permaculture related activities which will make the final FeelFreePermaculture.pdf around August. Artists and the local school will be invited to create murals and exhibits in the space, as well as participating in the other various projects. 

≈ ​Win​ter

With everything in place, we can mount the Free Bar and really start the movement.​ Boozers, book your flights for around Christmas for best results.
story_txt:
breath out... it's over!
We are eternally grateful for everything you've done​.​ We are now preparing for a massive challenge and couldn't be more excited to get started. Below we've summarised our broad and imminently optimistic plan of action for 2017 - we want to keep you all in the loop and also to know your perks are all in process!
​While the dust settles with the tax man (men) please ​keep spreading the word ​with​ anyone you think might have an interest in this project as were going to need constant exposure to the campaign​ to succeed!​
​www.feelfr.ee   |   Facebook   |   Twitter​   |   Instagram

story:
The UltraDuo Z2 is the latest generation of our dual-lens dashboard camera that help you to drive with peace of mind and protect you and your car 24/7.

 

  

 

Whenever you’re driving out on the road, there is always a chance that you could get into a car accident. It could be anything from a rear-end collision caused by a distracted driver to a scratch or hit from a driver hurrying to back out of a parking lot. And, with so many factors, it can be difficult to place an insurance claim or provide footage that can be used in court when an accident happens. 

We understand the stress and worry. That’s why we’ve invented the UltraDuo Z2. With our unique take on the smart yet simple idea of a dashcam, we want to provide the solution to driving accountability, one car at a time.  

 

 

 

With UltraDuo Z2 set up in your car, you can breathe easy. Our two-lens dashboard camera with loop recording and auto file protection provides you with tremendous peace of mind while driving. Because you can record two directions at once, it’s easy to make sure that the information you need is caught on camera!

 

 

    

 

 

 

 

Our UltraDuo Z2 has two 180-degree rotatable lenses. With their extreme mobility, you can point them any direction you want! They record simultaneously. The left lens is a 160-degree wide angle lens and the right lens is a telephoto zoom-in lens capable of recording distances up to 164 feet (50 meters). This is helpful whether you want to record the traffic around your car, or, in a commercial edition, if you want to record your conversations with your passengers.

 

  

 

 

It’s irritating when your camera doesn’t record vital information because it doesn’t have room to store it. Unlike action cameras, digital cameras, or regular video recorders, our Z2 doesn’t have a problem with memory capacity. Unfortunately, we didn’t invent an unlimited memory storage system. However, we did equip our Z2 with the next best thing! Loop recording enables the Z2 to automatically overwrite the oldest, non-protected video files with the latest video. This means the Z2 can keep recording, even if its memory becomes full!

 

 

 

The Hot Key functions were designed to protect both you as the driver and the other drivers on the road. These keys are positioned around the 2 inch LCD display of the Z2 and are clearly labeled for easy accessibility.

1) The 'Mute' button stops and continues the sound recording feature on the Z2.

2) The 'File Protection' button allows you to protect certain footage from the Z2’s loop recording feature so you can save important information.

3) The 'EV Mode' button adjusts the exposure levels of both lenses from 0, which is the default setting, and gives you the exposure options of -1, -2, and +1, +2.

 

  

 

  

 

The Z2 is equipped with a 2 inch LCD screen so it’s easy to operate the camera, see what the camera’s recording in real time, and watch playback later.

 

 

 

Enabling parking mode allows the camera to turn on automatically if it detects any external force on the car. This function lets the Z2 record any potentially threatening actions, whether by vandalism or a distracted driver in a parking lot. The camera’s sensitivity is adjustable and will only activate when the camera and car are turned off . This function only works if the Z2’s internal battery has enough power. 

* Before you drive, simply connect the Z2 to your cigarette lighter outlet to charge the battery.

    

 

 

There are definitely moments in video footage that are more important than others, such as the moment of incident or impact. To ensure your vital files are saved, we added an auto file protection function to the Z2. Whenever the camera detects an external force on your car, the file protection feature will automatically lock the footage surrounding that moment, protecting it from being overwritten in the loop recording function.

 

 

 

The UltraDuo Z2 has two editions: standard and commercial. The standard edition features one wide angle lens and one telephoto lens. The commercial edition features two wide angle lenses.

Standard

This edition is designed with general users in mind. It works great for daily commutes! 

Both lenses record simultaneously. The wide angle lens captures more up-close traffic and cars, while the telephoto lens records in a magnified way, to record objects that are farther way, like license plates, road obstructions, etc. Because both lenses are rotatable, you can record traffic ahead of you and behind you at the same time. No need to install two separate cameras – the Z2 is the only camera you need!

 

Commercial

This edition is designed especially for taxi drivers or other professional drivers. 

If you have an unwanted passenger, being able to record and save footage of your driver-passenger interaction can help protect you by giving you control. This commercial edition has two wide angle lenses for professional drivers to easily record both traffic and driver-passenger interaction at the same time. This camera includes a microphone so you can record any conversations in your car.  

Important note: If you use the Z2 or any other camera to record inside of your commercial vehicle, you must have a warning sticker on your car to inform your passengers that they are being recorded

 

 

Watch the videos below to see how well UltraDuo Z2’s image quality compares to other dashcams!  

Note: Both editions come with a built-in microphone which you can turn on/off for voice recording.

Remember to set the video quality to 1080P resolution by clicking the gear button at the bottom of the video screen to ensure you view the crystal-clear footage the Z2 can capture!

 

 

  

 

With the advance of app-based professional transportation, it’s more important than ever to ensure your safety as a driving professional. We know that security is a major concern for all professional drivers. With the UltraDuo Z2, you can keep a watch on the traffic around you, and on the passengers in your vehicle. With the Z2, you’ll always have footage you can use to help with insurance claims or to present in court.

 

 

 

 

 

We’re excited to announce that we’ve completed the development and testing stages for our product and that the UltraDuo Z2 is ready for mass production! Now, we need support from you in the Indiegogo community, so we can reach the minimum  order request from our manufacturer and start producing the Z2!

 

 

 

  

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

   

 

 

  

 

 

 

One (1) Year Limited Warranty

We offer one year warranty for our UltraDuo Z2. For the detail of the warranty, please check the link below:

click here

Please note that the 30 days refund policy does not apply to this campaign.

  

International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be applied.

  

Help us to spread the word!
The more people take driving safety seriously, the safer road we can build. Share this campaign and get free pieces!
***Must be a contributor to be eligible***

How to enter the referral program?

  1. **Log into your Indiegogo account**
  2. Go to our campaign page: https://igg.me/at/ultraduo-z2
  3. Share our campaign with Indiegogo share tool

When someone pledge with your referral link, we will be able to see this contribution related to your Indiegogo account.

Social Media

For any press relations please use:

press.relations@cansonic.com

 

Risks and challenges

We believe in full transparency throughout our process, so we want to tell you about the biggest challenge for us on our journey. 
We had a lot of difficulty finding the right supply chain and manufacturer that believed in our product and could deliver high quality builds and on-time delivery services. 
Now, we’re very fortunate to be able to work with a reliable manufacturer partner that we have collaborated with before on different products. Our past experience makes us confident in high quality production and on-time delivery! 
We know that unexpected problems can happen when a product is first being produced. The satisfaction of our backers is our #1 priority. We guarantee to do everything we can to answer your questions and make sure everything is delivered on time. 
All our processes are completely transparent and we’ll update you regularly. 
Help us to spread the UltraDuo Z2! Together, we can make our roads safer!

story:
Hello all,

What we really want for our wedding gift is a honeymoon to Italy. Celeste and I have been wanting to go for most of our lives and we think it'll be a romantic trip for our honeymoon.

Anything you're willing to give  is greatly appreciated.

story:
The best way to describe our situation is for me to post this mesage from a dear friend of ours that she posted on Facebook.

PLEASE HELP!!! DONATIONS would be very much appreciated for this beautiful couple that were married recently. My heart goes out to Angela and Ron Smith of Virginia MN. As many of you know, Angela and Ron Smith, have recently had some bad luck with TEN INCHES OF SEWER BACKED UP IN THEIR BASEMENT, and they are also first-time home buyers! Their home owners insurance will not cover the clean-up of the ten inches of sewer in their basement or their loss of valuables, loss of all food in the freezer, (because they had to pull the electrical plug), and wet sewer smelling baskets of clothing near their (washer and dryer)! (Note: Home Owners: Many of you may not have water and sewer damage insurance, and it is plan that you may have to ask for to get it, many times it is a separate plan separate from your home owner's insurance policy!) Yes, it would be nice if the city would cover the cost of this city sewer problem, but it is not looking good from my understanding! :-( Please friends....your help would be very much appreciated, and I know it is difficult with this darn economy, but your help would be a blessing! Thank you and God Bless You, Mary Hagel

story:
INTRODUCING PLEVO 

 

 

Plevo is the most innovative luggage set in the world. Based on the concept of functional and aesthetic design, Plevo has combined the perfect mix between technology and ease of use, empowering travelers around the world to maximize their travel experience. Plevo luggage set starts with a beautiful and appealing design and incorporates the following innovations:

 

 

                                                   

 

Meet our first in the world, patented Garment Hanger System®

Take the hanger from your closet, hang it on the suitcase and go! Our Garment Hanger System® has been patented in more than 149 countries and allows Plevo UP to be the first 100% vertical luggage in the world. No need to put the luggage on the floor to enjoy it - leave it standing UP and access what you need.

With our 3G location tracking you will always know where your luggage is, whether it’s 20 meters or 20 countries away. Never wonder where your luggage is again, plus, you can even know when it’s coming to you at the luggage carousel.

Lock and unlock your suitcase from your phone with a remote digital lock system. Travel with peace of mind, knowing your bags will automatically lock as soon as they are away from you.

 

Face ID revolutionizes authentication using facial recognition, and with a simple glance it’s a secure and private new way to lock and un-lock your Plevo.

 

Meet our Morse Code and forget about old school combination locks

Let's say you lost your phone, you ran out of battery or you wanna let a friend open your luggage. We thought about a solution that doesn't require your phone, your face, or even your fingerprint. 
Just put the code you previously set with morse code, and boom, that's it. To lock it, just press and hold the button for 2 seconds.

 

PLEVO’s Removable Battery Pack is compliant with all Airline Regulations, so you can travel worry-free. Charge all your devices. USB and USB-C ports.

 

VISTA 360 °

We know that going through security checkpoints at the Airport sucks, so we decided to make it easy for you to breeze through them by being able to access your electronics without having to open your bag.

 

Removable wheels make it easier for storage at home or in the trunk of your car.

 

DASHBOARD - know everything that is happening with your PLEVO at a glance.

Wide handles provide consistent comfort throughout your travels. Super easy to open and close, the wide handles deliver stability to your luggage when you are carrying it.

By combining the most innovative technology with fashion forward design, Plevo delivers mobility with pure elegance and sophistication. We handpicked the most efficient materials that will ensure durability without sacrificing style.

You won’t believe everything we have packed in such a tiny space. GPS Location Tracking, Bluetooth Antennas, Battery Pack, Digital Scale, LED lights, all without taking up the precious space needed for your clothes and travel essentials.

We think personality is a great trait and nothing more personal than your favorite color. We would love to have ALL the colors in the world (sh... don’t say anything, we will in the near future!) but for now, you have to pick between these 4 beautiful options.

You will be able to pick your color after your pledge, we will send you an e-mail when the campaign is finalized to confirm shipping details and your preferred color choice.

 

 

DOMESTIC SHIPPING - To 34 Countries: United States, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, China, and 28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

We've got Fulfillment Centers worldwide that allow us to offer domestic shipping at highly discounted rates to the 34 countries listed above. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 34 countries will NOT have to pay any additional fees and taxes (apart from the nominal domestic shipping fees that we charge when you make your pledge here on Kickstarter). Which means you will NOT be paying any import/customs duty, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got everything covered.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - Rest of the World: Backers from all other countries (Rest of the world) may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

From our experience, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and a majority of our international customers don't get charged any additional fees apart from the regular shipping fees on Kickstarter.

FOLLOW US:
story_txt:
INTRODUCING PLEVO 
  Plevo is the most innovative luggage set in the world. Based on the concept of functional and aesthetic design, Plevo has combined the perfect mix between technology and ease of use, empowering travelers around the world to maximize their travel experience. Plevo luggage set starts with a beautiful and appealing design and incorporates the following innovations:                                                      
 

 Meet our first in the world, patented Garment Hanger System®Take the hanger from your closet, hang it on the suitcase and go! Our Garment Hanger System® has been patented in more than 149 countries and allows Plevo UP to be the first 100% vertical luggage in the world. No need to put the luggage on the floor to enjoy it - leave it standing UP and access what you need.
 - PLEVO System - 
With our 3G location tracking you will always know where your luggage is, whether it’s 20 meters or 20 countries away. Never wonder where your luggage is again, plus, you can even know when it’s coming to you at the luggage carousel.
 
Why put GPS in your luggage? More than 23 Million bags are lost or stolen every year. And let's face it, no-one likes to lose their luggage. Our GPS enabled product allows you to quickly locate your luggage anywhere in the world through our connected travel app.
 
Welcome to your very own personalized digital bio-lock for the highest level of security. No more old school metal locks. Best of all, it's approved by airport security.Lock and unlock your suitcase from your phone with a remote digital lock system. Travel with peace of mind, knowing your bags will automatically lock as soon as they are away from you.  Face ID revolutionizes authentication using facial recognition, and with a simple glance it’s a secure and private new way to lock and un-lock your Plevo. The highest level of security at your fingertips. Put your mind at ease knowing that you can lock your suitcase via your smartphone; if you get separated from your Plevo, it will lock automatically. Access can be shared with people you trust, and you will be notified anytime someone attempts to open the suitcase. The Plevo Travel Sentry® Approved Lock is accepted by the TSA.
   Meet our Morse Code and forget about old school combination locksLet's say you lost your phone, you ran out of battery or you wanna let a friend open your luggage. We thought about a solution that doesn't require your phone, your face, or even your fingerprint. Just put the code you previously set with morse code, and boom, that's it. To lock it, just press and hold the button for 2 seconds.LOCK PROTOTYPE

 
 PLEVO’s Removable Battery Pack is compliant with all Airline Regulations, so you can travel worry-free. Charge all your devices. USB and USB-C ports.   VISTA 360 ° 

  
 

  

 We know that going through security checkpoints at the Airport sucks, so we decided to make it easy for you to breeze through them by being able to access your electronics without having to open your bag. 
 
 
Did you know that broken wheels is the Nr. 1 reason for buying a new luggage? Not with PLEVO; our removable wheels ensure you’ll keep on rolling forever.
   Wheels Design - 360° ViewRemovable wheels make it easier for storage at home or in the trunk of your car.  
 
  DASHBOARD - know everything that is happening with your PLEVO at a glance.Wide handles provide consistent comfort throughout your travels. Super easy to open and close, the wide handles deliver stability to your luggage when you are carrying it. By combining the most innovative technology with fashion forward design, Plevo delivers mobility with pure elegance and sophistication. We handpicked the most efficient materials that will ensure durability without sacrificing style.You won’t believe everything we have packed in such a tiny space. GPS Location Tracking, Bluetooth Antennas, Battery Pack, Digital Scale, LED lights, all without taking up the precious space needed for your clothes and travel essentials.  

  
 We think personality is a great trait and nothing more personal than your favorite color. We would love to have ALL the colors in the world (sh... don’t say anything, we will in the near future!) but for now, you have to pick between these 4 beautiful options.You will be able to pick your color after your pledge, we will send you an e-mail when the campaign is finalized to confirm shipping details and your preferred color choice.  
    DOMESTIC SHIPPING - To 34 Countries: United States, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, China, and 28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United KingdomWe've got Fulfillment Centers worldwide that allow us to offer domestic shipping at highly discounted rates to the 34 countries listed above. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 34 countries will NOT have to pay any additional fees and taxes (apart from the nominal domestic shipping fees that we charge when you make your pledge here on Kickstarter). Which means you will NOT be paying any import/customs duty, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got everything covered.INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - Rest of the World: Backers from all other countries (Rest of the world) may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. story:
Le Wolf Bike Park prend forme

(fermeture de la campagne -  19 novembre 2020) 

Merci énormément de votre support, on se voit sur les sentiers en 2021 ! 

Les KIT WOLF BIKE PARK seront envoyés au début de l'année 2021 ! 

 

/ ENGLISH VERSION BELOW 

Nous avons maintenant complété le squelette du Park, ainsi que testé les infrastructures avec plus de 60 client.es lors de nos récents événements de préouverture. 

Nous venons aussi tout juste de pousser le Park au niveau supérieur avec la zone du Champ, c'est-à-dire en finissant les sentiers existants dans la clairière, en plus de l'ajout d'une zone d'habileté en construction. 

Avec la première phase de sociofinancement à l'automne 2019, vos contributions ajoutées à plusieurs milliers d'heures bénévoles auront permis de mettre sur pied ; 

  • 1 sentier de remontée (500 mètres) 
  • 1 sentier intermédiaire / avancé avec plusieurs options (400 mètres)
  • 1 sentier expert / proline avec plusieurs options (400 mètres) 
  •  

Donnez 115$ - Obtenez le KIT WOLF BIKE PARK ! Inclus dans le kit;  bas de MTB, T-shirt exclusif et autocollants. 

Les bas sont de très belle qualité, faits par Endurapparel, avec la mention ''Roule ou Crève''. Les t-shirts sont haut de gamme avec une coupe et un tissu agréables, une étiquette de type cuir sur la poche, produits par l'entreprise sherbrookoise Unique Wool. Voyez la charte des tailles ici. Les collants sont en vinyle qualité voiture, découpés au laser, tiennent bien en place et ne laissent aucune trace si vous les décollez. Les t-shirts et les bas seront de la même couleur, même si ça ne parait pas sur le rendu. Leurs designs pourraient varier légèrement lors de la finalisation du tout.

MERCI ! 

Vos contributions vont nous permettre d'ajouter de la chair autour de l'os avec : 

  • Le matériel pour 5 à 10 modules en bois d'envergure (whale tail, wallride courbés, box, etc) Environ 500$ à 1000$ / module 
  • Ajout d'un sentier d'échauffement / débutant Environ 3 000$ à 5 000$
  • La mise sur pied d'une zone d'habileté complète Environ 3000 $ 
  • De la signalisation efficace Environ 3 000$
  • Du mobilier  extérieur Environ 2 000$
  • Des améliorations générales aux lignes Environ 3 000$ à  5000$

TOTAL: environ 15 000$ à 25 000$ 

Retour sur l'expérience des clients

Nos premiers tests des infrastructures avec des client.es de différents niveaux ont été très concluants, voici certaines grandes lignes de nos constatations et apprentissages ;

  • Nos infrastructures s'adaptent très bien pour ceux et celles qui commencent tout juste à décoller du sol, ainsi qu'aux cascadeurs et cascadeuses de carrière 
  • Les sentiers sont un feu roulant de défis et de plaisir; cependant, pour décortiquer les techniques de sauts, virages et drops, une zone d'habileté en toute simplicité est à ajouter, et nous avons déjà commencé  
  • Les gens progressent à vue d'œil, et la première question après l'expérience au Park est généralement; quand est-ce que je peux revenir ? 
  • Vous pouvez lire le compte rendu de l'expérience vécue par Filles de Bois, rien de mieux que le témoignage de gens qui ont vécu l'expérience ! 

 

 

Autres façons de vous impliquer/contribuer

Vous avez aussi la possibilité de simplement donner le montant de votre choix. De plus, si vous êtes une entreprise et souhaitez contribuer et embarquer avec nous dans l'aventure, signifiez nous votre intérêt par courriel au wolfbikepark@gmail.com, nous allons édifier un plan de commandite pendant la saison morte. 

Bien sûr, vous pouvez aussi PARTAGER UN MAX ! 

 

ENGLISH VERSION ///

 

The Wolf Bike Park is an innovative Bike Park in Quebec made to level up jumping and other flow type skills from intermediate to expert level riders !

 

WOLF backwards is... FLOW

 

This big skills park / small trail network is all about collecting those Air Miles, in the safest way possible ! 

 

 

You could contribute to this sick project and help fellow riders !

 

 

This start-up first build days were in september 2019, and since then, the overall layout is done, after more than 20k $  investment and 1000 + volunteer hours. We are now preopening and adding options in our trails, skill zones and organizing chilling and pause areas. 

We focus on quality over quantity. We are all about creating a unique flow, no brake no pedals kind of vibes. And it's working ! People are progressing so much and loving the trails ! 

 

You can now help us achieve our goals and put this infrastructure to life

 

Contribute 115$ - Get the WOLF BIKE PARK KIT ! Included in the kit; MTB socks, exclusive t-shirt, and stickers 

Socks are high quality by Endurapparel, with ''Roule ou Crève''., written on, litteraly ''ride or die'' translation. T-shirts are high-end with a very nice cut and fabric, a leather-like label, made by local business Unique Wool. You can see the size chart here , Stickers are car-quality vinyl. T-shirts and socks will be same color, design could change slightly. 

 

Your support will help us with : 

  • Build big wooden features (whale tail, curved wallride , box, etc) Around 500$ to 1000$ of wood / feature
  • Add a warm-up trail / beginner  Around 3 000$ to 5 000$
  • Complete skills zone Around 3000 $ 
  • Useful signage  Around 3 000$
  • Outdoors living furniture Around 2 000$
  • Options and improvment to every lines Around 3 000$ to  5000$

TOTAL: around 15 000$ to 25 000$

 

THANK YOU SO MUCH !

story:
Yenokavan, a small village in Armenia

Yell Extreme Park is located in Yenokavan village (Tavush region)- South to Yerevan, Capital of Armenia. It's two hour drive from Yerevan and two and half from Tbilisi, Capital of Georgia. Actually, the population of community is 612 people. Mostly, they are engaged in cattle and agriculture. Apaga Resort, which is also located in Yenokavan and Yell Extreme Park provide approximately 60 workplaces to the people living in community. During the last 10 years, stable tourism growth was recorded in the community, which led to the improvement of social conditions of the villagers. 

The territory is mainly mountainous and rocky hillsides covered with a green carpet of Alpine meadows, which ensures perfect conditions for the development of eco and adventure tourism in Yenokavan. Tavush is sometimes reffered to us as a little Armenian Switzerland. 

               

Our Story

As the first adventure park in Armenia, Yell Extreme Park gives an opportunity to do extreme sports without being a professional. It is located 142 km away from Yerevan and 158 km away from Tbilisi. Here we do our best to lighten up the world and live the moments with full enjoyment. The team of Yell Extreme Park has created an amazing opportunity for those who are searching for adventures and adrenaline.


 

Our first Zip-line flight took place in July, 2015. A year later, in August 2016, the quantity of visitors surpassed 15.000. In that period, the activities were regularly accrued. Since November 2015, one can also experience paragliding or ride a bike in mountains. Next year two more Zip-lines were constructed. Now our longest line is 750m with the height of 200-300m and the speed of 5-7m/s.

New activities adjoined the park recently – people can try their forces in Paintball and Extreme Swing. If they love speed, they can join our Off-road tours or ride Yell track. There are also horseback riding tours in the nearest mountains lasting up to 7 days.

Now we are designing a new Zip-line with the length of 2680 m and the height of approximately 250 m. There will be 4 parallel Zip-lines from the place of Yell Extreme Park to the village of Yenokavan. We are going to set a new record of Guinness Records book and we want the highest Yell to be heard from the Yell Park. 

            

 

We are hungry for adventures and we all need to feel more

Every time we are planning our trips we want to discover new places and new emotions. The longest Zip-line will be an amazing chance to change the world of adventure.

For many years in some mountainous countries the Zip-line has been used as a transportation method. Now Zip-line tours become popular vacation activities and one of the best adventure sports.

Zip-line allows the person to move from a certain location to the other with a cable extended between the two point at a certain distance. In reality, there are two primary forces that affect acceleration; one is due to the component of gravity in the direction of motion and the other is a combination of friction and other resistive forces.

Zip-line with the length of 2.7 km: The duration of flight will be maximum of 3 minutes and the speed of 120 km/h.

The harness: The Super Ripper will allow to fly head first down and will keep safe.

Product description: Multiple adjustment points keep the rider balanced. Color coded safety straps make it easy to put on and off. Made from 5,000lb test mil-spec webbing and high strength quick adjust buckles with adjustable leg and shoulder straps keep the people locked in.

Pricing: Individual fee for Longest Zip-line is $60. But if you get your ticket in advance via Indiegogo you will get 50% discount – one price for 2 tickets.  

 

To finish our project we need

$ 80-100,000 – We are designing 4 parallel lines.The overall length of the lines will be 12.000 meters. (1 meter costs 6.5$, 4 parallel lines, each for 3000 meters, (including taxes).

$ 10-15,000 – Harnesses for Zip-liners. 

$ 25-30,000 – Construction costs.

If we don't reach our entire goal, we will build 2 parallel Zip-lines, instead of 4, which, in fact, will reduce the capacity of servicing simultaneous flights.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are very thankful to all those who contribute, but also those who will help us realize our big project by sharing our campaign. You can really help to reach our goal using Indiegogo sharing tools or by having your say in Social Media platforms. Thank you for your contribution.

Live the moment

We want people to feel the adrenaline, to overcome all the fears that they may have, to live the moment and enjoy every minute of the life. Time in Yell Extreme Park allows others to connect with their fun inner child — impulsive and unrestrained, not afraid to bend rules, not afraid to stand out, and comfortable in their own skin. 

At the heart of our project is the idea of collective action or “bringing people together” for a happy world.

For those who love heights, thrills, Zip-lining, or just having fun…

story:
Vrijeme je za novo putovanje - jer putovati se mora!

 

Vrijeme je za stvaranje novih priča jer i priče se stvarati moraju... vrijeme je i za nove uspomene koje će to tek postati jer uspomene su jedino što nam na kraju ostaje. 

 

Svoju škrinju sa uspomenama punim koliko god mogu i dozvoljavam svima da u nju zavire i bar na taj način putuju sa mnom. 

 

Svako ima svoju škrinju i svako ju puni na način koji on smatra najboljim. Moja se puni putovanjima, a putovanja koštaju. Koštaju vremena i novca...

Ono što dobijem zauzvrat kada se škrinja puni, neprocjenjive je vrijednosti. Nova poznanstva i upoznavanje novih, drugačijih kultura življenja ljudi u različitim krajevima svijeta je ono što doživljavam iz prvog reda, a doživljaje se trudim prenijeti na papir ili fotografiju kojom želim potaknuti nekoga od vas da krenete putem kojim i sam idem. 

Svoje uspomene stvaram putujući motorom... 

 

Želite li putovati sa mnom možete to učiniti besplatno. Čitajte to što napišem, gledajte fotografije koje nastanu na tim putovanjima... lajkajte ili dijelite sadržaj sa svojim prijateljima. Razgovarajte o tome što vidite.

 

Postoji naravno i način da i vi budete kreator tih uspomena. Jednostavo odvojite dio novca iz svojeg budžeta i pogurajte me da putujem više i dalje. Pogurajte me da vama i svima onima koji uz kavu vole pročitati štivo koje napišem mogu pisati jer tinte u nalifperu nestaje... i to poprilično brzo.

 

 

A sada malo o samom putovanju...

Plan je krenuti 11.05.2019. prema sjeveru. Taj dio putovanja neće biti toliko zanimljiv ali nakon što uđemo u Bjelorusiju, a kasnije i u Rusiju, putovanje postaje vrlo interesantno. Vožnja preko Urala, vožnja beskrajnim Sibirom, izlet u Mongoliju i pokoji kilometar te avanture svakako bi mogle stvoriti vrlo zanimljivu priču. Nakon što se dokoturamo do Vladivostoka i do granice sa Korejom, i to onom Sjevernom, putovanje postaje još zanimljivije jer se valja vratiti nazad kroz Sibir i nakon tjedana vožnje ući u Europu. No, da vas ne davim previše, reći ću samo jedno: bila bi šteta, kad smo već u Rusiji, ne skoknuti još jednom do Nordkappa, najsjevernije kopnene točke Europe. Također bi bila šteta kad smo već na Nordkappu da se ne spustimo ponovo do Afrike i odvozimo poznato Atlas gorje. Zaista bi bila šteta, zar ne?

 

Što nam je potrebno da svoj cilj ostvarimo?

Potrebno nam je vrijeme, a njega smo osigurali... potrebno nam je iskustvo u putovanjima, a njega također imamo... potrebni su nam motocikli i oprema, a to također nije problem... potreban nam je i novac, a tu uskačete vi na način da kupite jedan (ili više) perkova koji su u ponudi. 

E tu je caka... spomenuti ću jedan perk - razglednica. Vi nama lovicu, a mi vama razglednicu sa putovanja... budimo realni; ta razglednica ne košta toliko koliko ju vi plaćate i ne vidim razloga zašto bi ju kupovali. Jedini smislen razlog je taj da vam ona ostane za uspomenu kojom ćete se moći hvaliti da ste i vi postali vlasnikom nečega što vam je neki ludi putnik poslao iz, recimo - Sibira...   coool, ha? 

 

Zašto bi vi trebali podržati ovu kampanju?

Zato što većina vas nikada neće pomaknuti svoje guzice dalje od jadranskog mora i sada vam se za vrlo malu lovu pruža prilika da gledajući fotografije ili čitajući tekstove putujete zajedno sa mnom. Ako pak spadate u skupinu ljudi koja će nekada negdje, možda otputovati, imati ćete osobu koja će vam moći prenijeti informacije kako se to radi. Za određeni iznos novčića možete si na policu, u svoju ego sobu, staviti i pokoju kap japanskog mora ili mililitar bajkalskog jezera. Možda vam donesem bočicu vode iz rijeke Volge, a moguće je da si začinite jelo pijeskom iz Sahare po koji ću ponovo otići. I to je ono što plaćate... to je način na koji podržavate cijelu kampanju. Fora je i u tome što na sve ovo možete jednostavno odmahnuti rukom i reći: pusti bedaka neka putuje jer svaki bedak ima svoje veselje, a ja ću, pogurali vi moje putovanje ili ne, svejedno otputovati. Na vama je odluka... 

 

Što će se dogoditi sa silnim milijunima koje ćete mi uplatiti ako na ovaj put iz nekog razloga ne odem?

Datum polaska je definiran, sve za putovanje je spremno ali na eventualnu višu silu ne mogu utjecati. Zdravstveni problemi su mogući u svakom trenutku. Politička situacija u zemljama kroz koje kanim voziti također je promjenjiva... no, pustimo to. Ako na putovanje ne odem, novac ću iskoristiti za slijedeće putovanje koje će biti bar u rangu ovog planiranog. Za sada ne vidim niti jedan razlog zbog kojega bi putovanje trebalo odgoditi.

 

Što nakon putovanja?

Plan je izdati knjigu o tom putovanju i održati mnoštvo tribina na temu tog putovanja te na taj način potaknuti još nekoga da putuje i stvara svoje uspomene. 

Moja dosadašnja putovanja potaknula su mnoge da kupe motocikle i na taj način počnu putovati. Jedan od njih je i Antun Čolig koji je prošle godine kupio motocikl i sada na ovo putovanje ide sa mnom. Da, da... čovjek koji nikada u životu nije vozio motor i čovjek koji čak niti vozačku dozvolu za motocikl nije imao do prije 10-ak mjeseci, sada sa mnom putuje u avanturu života. 

 

Riječ dvije za kraj...

Podržite me ili ne... čitajte me i gledajte ako želite... putujte sa mnom kao Antun ili kao osoba ispred ekrana vašeg laptopa ili mobitela... uživajte uz mene bar malo i doživite bar dio atmosfere koju ja doživljavam putujući kroz svoje snove. Pogurajte putovanje svojim novcem ako ste u mogućnosti i ako to želite... 

 

... ili me jednostavno ignorirajte... 

 

Voli vas Brmbi <3
story_txt: Vrijeme je za novo putovanje - jer putovati se mora! Vrijeme je za stvaranje novih priča jer i priče se stvarati moraju... vrijeme je i za nove uspomene koje će to tek postati jer uspomene su jedino što nam na kraju ostaje.  Svoju škrinju sa uspomenama punim koliko god mogu i dozvoljavam svima da u nju zavire i bar na taj način putuju sa mnom.  Svako ima svoju škrinju i svako ju puni na način koji on smatra najboljim. Moja se puni putovanjima, a putovanja koštaju. Koštaju vremena i novca...Ono što dobijem zauzvrat kada se škrinja puni, neprocjenjive je vrijednosti. story:
Saludos y muchas Bendiciones!

Por este medio deseo extender mi más cordial saludo y bendecirles de gran manera.  Costa Rica se prepara para recibir la impartición no solo en lo espiritual si no también en el area del Arte, Música e Intercesión Profética. Durante el mes de Noviembre  estaré junto con Delki Rosso, Maestras y Lideres impartiendo Talleres de Danza y Arte  además de Impartir la palabra, las danzas y una gran manifestación de Gloria junto al Equipo de Lideres y Maestras de House of T'Hearts International School and Ministry. Como parte de este gran equipo necesito recaudar algunos fondos para costear  gastos relacionado al viaje ministerial.

Apelo por este medio a su generosidad y su contribuccion , sin importar la cantidad seran usados para este proposito, mi mayor deseo es poder estar en esta hermosa mision asi cumpliendo el proposito dentro del llamado que Dios me ha regalado. .

Revivalcamp Globales se ha extendido a varios países. En el 2012 tuve la oportunidad de ministrar en Revivalcamp Republica Dominicana ( Bringing Heaven To Earth) ademas de ser parte del equipo Misionero HOTAI MISSION llevando alimentos , vestimenta y bendiciendo a nuestros hermanos dominicanos de escasos recursos. También fui parte del equipo  Revivalcamp 2012 USA, Transformadores de Atmosferas donde impartí talleres y ser parte del equipo coordinador lo cual fue de gran bendición. Este yr. 2014  me dirijo hacia Costa Rica con la encomienda de Dios y el llamado profético a través de las artes. Cuento con su apoyo y sé que Dios se glorificara con su siembra. Estarás sembrando en tierra fértil!!

Para más información sobre Revivalcamp Globales visita la página web www.houseofthearts.com


Les bendigo .

Con amor!

Ilia Barreto
Maestra Revivalcamp Globales
House of T'Hearts International

story:
What is this about?
I would like to purchase a good mountain bike to attend the 5 day Peak to Peak Pedal Race (Big Bear Peak to Mammoth Peak on October 2014) and raise donations for disabled kids (and kids at heart) via United States Adaptive Recreation Center (http://usarc.org/).

The 5 day mountain bike race is organized by U.S. Adaptive Recreation Center. This winter, I volunteer at USARC as a ski instructor for visually impaired skiers.

The United States Adaptive Recreation Center, previously known as California Handicapped Skiers, was founded to ensure access to skiing to people with all types of disabilities. In 1993 the organization started the adaptive watersports and summer camping programs in addition to on-site adaptive ski school in Big Bear.

What am I going to buy with your donation?
I will buy Saphire  (a Specialized brand) bike from Derek Hermon of Bear Valley Bikes. If I don’t raise the entire amount, I will purchase a lower model bike for the amount I raised by April 2014.

Who am I?
I have recently competed at a fitness competition where I prepared for 5 months. During the process, I learned the fundamentals of losing weight and improving my health and eating habits. I would love to share that information with as many people as possible. You can see the details of my eating plan on my blog. If you want to live my lifestyle for 2-4 days, come and be my guest at Big Bear cabin and eat with me, do the grocery shopping with me, workout with me and enjoy the magical Big Bear.

You can find more about me:

Here is my Facebook: Facebook.com/SnowSonmez

Here is my fitness blog:  HotSexyLife.com– It is in Turkish.

Here is my translator website:  TranslatorTurkish.com

Did you know that you can donate and give it to your family or friends as a gift too?

Here are the goodies for YOU

Retreat Package No: 1
Jump start for your fitness journey – 3 nights, 4 days - $500
· 4 meals for 3 days
· 3 meals for 1 day
· 1 restaurant meal – How to order at a restaurant and not break your eating plan workshop
· Your workout buddy for 3 workouts: 1 gym workouts (sponsored by Wolf Total Fitness Gym), 1 home workout, 1 outdoor workout
· 1 hour food preparation session
· 1 hour grocery store shopping session including how to read a label session
· Half day full-suspension mountain bike rental or snow shoe rental (sponsored by Bear Valley Bikes)
· %20 discount on gloves, shorts, arm warmer and socks at Bear Valley Bikes

Retreat Package No: 2
Introduction to the fit lifestyle – 4 nights, 5 days - $600
· 4 meals for 3 days
· 3 meals for 1 day
· 1 restaurant meal – How to order at a restaurant and not break your eating plan workshop
· Your workout buddy for 4 workouts: 1 gym workouts (sponsored by Wolf Total Fitness Gym), 1 home workout, 2 outdoor workouts
· 1 hour food preparation session
· 1 hour grocery store shopping session
· 1 full day full-suspension or downhill bike or snow shoe rental (sponsored by Bear Valley Bikes)
· %20 discount on any gear and accessories at Bear Valley Bikes
· 1 day ski pass valid for both resorts, Snow Summit and Bear Mountain

About the Retreat Packages
This is for healthy individuals. Accommodation is provided in my guest room. There is a closet and queen size bed. You are welcome to bring your significant other or a friend. All services are optional. If you choose just to kick back, you are welcome too.

Meals include two or more of the food groups including animal protein, veggies, fruits and starchy carbs. I will serve what I eat.
Meal preparation session includes use of crock pot, baking and good oils.

Grocery trip includes information on how to prepare a shopping list, how to read the labels and one 4 day shopping list for one person.

Rental bike fee is included. However you are responsible for yourself and the damages to the bike.


Living Room

Your room (Guest room)

Shared bathroom

Guest room patio


Rent a workout buddy for 2 workouts - $100
· Semi-private workout with Tarkan Kaynas, world champion body builder, expert on weight loss and muscle building.
· 50 minutes high intensity interval training (HIIT) including warm-up and stretching OR your workout – bring it on.
I am your workout buddy for the HIIT workouts:-) The gym workout takes place at Gold’s Gym, Venice Beach. You may need to pay for your daily pass to the gym or you can print a guest pass online. It is $15. The HIIT workout takes place outdoors in Los Angeles or in Big Bear.

Rent a room in my cabin for 5 days - $400
Fireplace, barbeque, sleeps 2 people, wireless internet, and pet friendly. This package includes 1 ski pass for both resorts OR half day mountain bike rental.

Other opportunities to support – Did you know that you can make an anonymous donation?

All sound great but I don’t use any of those services. I support your goal donation $50

Good luck on your journey donation $20

I wish you well donation $10

Ride well donation $5

Can you not contribute at this time? There are other ways to help. Feel free to share this campaign with your friends in the social media. 

My sponsors 

Derek Hermon of Bear Valley Bikes is a legend at mountain biking. He owns and operates Bear Valley Bikes, an authorized Specialized brand bike distributor. He competes solo and also as the Bear Valley Bikes team leader. Here is Bear Valley Bikes’ website:http://bvbikes.com/
Tarkan Kaynas is a celebrity in fitness industry both in Turkey and in the U.S. He trains athletes for NPC (National Physique Committee) and IBFF (International Bodybuilding and Fitness Federation) competitions. I hope that I will train with him for one of the NPC competitions. He is a personal trainer and life coach in Los Angeles. Here is Tarkan’s website:http://www.tarkankaynas.com/

Wolf Total Fitness is the boutique gym at Big Bear Lake. The owner is very welcoming and generous for the local athletes. They offer various clinics from yoga to mixed martial arts.http://www.wolftotalfitness.com/

Wolf Total Fitness' motto is Balance is Everything. I couldn't agree more:-)

Here is the event that I will attend and the non-profit that organizes the bike race:
Big Bear to Mammoth Peak to Peak Pedal
It is a 5 day fundraising event starting at Big Bear and ending at Mammoth mountain peak. It is a volunteer run 5 day bike riding festival. The goal is to improve the awareness of children with disabilities and rise funding for winter (mono skiing and bi-skiing) and summer activities (water skiing, kayaking, paddle boarding, sailing, fishing and off road and downhill mountain biking.)

Here is the link for the 2013 Peak to Peak Pedal. The 2014 schedule is not posted yet.  The race will take place in the middle of October in 2014. http://usarc.org/peak-to-peak-pedal

Would you like to pedal with me from Big Bear to Mammoth Mountain on October 2014?Send me a message on Facebook.  Facebook.com/SnowSonmez 

Would you like to see some photos from my volunteer training?
