fruits and starchy carbs. I will serve what I eat.
Meal preparation session includes use of crock pot, baking and good oils.
Grocery trip includes information on how to prepare a shopping list, how to
read the labels and one 4 day shopping list for one person.
Rental bike fee is included. However you are responsible for yourself and the
damages to the bike.Living RoomYour room (Guest room)Shared bathroomGuest room patioRent a workout buddy for 2 workouts - $100
· Semi-private workout with Tarkan Kaynas, world champion body builder,
expert on weight loss and muscle building.
· 50 minutes high intensity interval training (HIIT) including warm-up and
stretching OR your workout – bring it on.
I am your workout buddy for the HIIT workouts:-) The gym workout takes place at
Gold’s Gym, Venice Beach. You may need to pay for your daily pass to the gym or
you can print a guest pass online. It is $15. The HIIT workout takes place
outdoors in Los Angeles or in Big Bear.Rent a room in my cabin for 5 days - $400
Fireplace, barbeque, sleeps 2 people, wireless
internet, and pet friendly. This package includes 1 ski pass for both resorts
OR half day mountain bike rental.Other opportunities to support – Did you know that you can make an anonymous donation?
All sound great but I don’t use any of those services. I support your goal
donation $50
Good luck on your journey donation $20
I wish you well donation $10
Ride well donation $5
Can you not contribute at
this time? There are other ways to help. Feel free to share this campaign with
your friends in the social media. My sponsors Derek Hermon of Bear Valley Bikes is a legend at mountain
biking. He owns and operates Bear Valley Bikes, an authorized Specialized brand
bike distributor. He competes solo and also as the Bear Valley Bikes team
leader. Here is Bear Valley Bikes’ website:http://bvbikes.com/
Tarkan Kaynas is a celebrity in fitness industry both in Turkey and
in the U.S. He trains athletes for NPC (National Physique Committee) and IBFF
(International Bodybuilding and Fitness Federation) competitions. I hope that I
will train with him for one of the NPC competitions. He is a personal trainer
and life coach in Los Angeles. Here is Tarkan’s website:http://www.tarkankaynas.com/Wolf Total Fitness is the boutique gym at Big Bear Lake. The
owner is very welcoming and generous for the local athletes. They offer various
clinics from yoga to mixed martial arts.http://www.wolftotalfitness.com/Wolf Total Fitness' motto is Balance is Everything. I couldn't agree more:-)Here is the event that I will attend and the non-profit that organizes the
bike race:Big Bear to Mammoth Peak to Peak Pedal
It is a 5 day fundraising event starting at Big Bear and ending at Mammoth
mountain peak. It is a volunteer run 5 day bike riding festival. The goal is to
improve the awareness of children with disabilities and rise funding for winter
(mono skiing and bi-skiing) and summer activities (water skiing, kayaking,
paddle boarding, sailing, fishing and off road and downhill mountain biking.)
Here is the link for the 2013 Peak to Peak Pedal. The 2014 schedule is not posted
yet.  The race will take place in the
middle of October in 2014. http://usarc.org/peak-to-peak-pedalWould you like to pedal with me from Big
Bear to Mammoth Mountain on October 2014?Send me a message on Facebook.  Facebook.com/SnowSonmez 
Would you like to see
some photos from my volunteer training?

story:
WHO AM I???

My name is Lexie Wilson and i am currently a freshmen at Vanguard University. I am studying Pastoral Leadership in hopes of one day opening an Outdoor Adventure Camp where people would come to learn about the love of Christ through outdoor experiences and adventures. While preparing myself for this camp and everything that I will be faced with after graduating, i am dedicated to serve God wherever he calls me and wants me to be a light for him. I have a heart to serve Gods people and show love to everyone in our world. I believe everyone deserves to know that they are truly loved by a God who sent his son for our lives. I believe everyone deserves to know that they matter in this world, in Gods Kingdom. 

WHY I NEED YOUR HELP!

Vanguard has multiple Outreach programs within the school. The outreach program that I am trying to raise money for is called SFO. This spring break i will be spending my time in San Francisco with this team serving the homeless in the slums of San Francisco. I need to raise a total of $500 dollars before March 1 in order to be a part of such a wonderful program. The funds that i raise will be the only way i can be a part of this team. The money will be going towards my travel, hotel, and food for our team as well as the homeless we will be serving. The trip is from March 16-23. The team will be bussed from Vanguard University in Costa Mesa, CA to San Francisco CA. We will be spending a week there serving the homeless, going to shelters, and building relationship with people of the city. 

THE IMPACT.

The truth is that their are a lot of people in our very own country who have lost their homes, who are in need of the simple things that we need to survive, to simply put it, who just need love. San Francisco is a city that desperately needs to know the Love of Christ and like many other places in our world are very broken. My heart breaks for people with families who must sleep on the cold concrete due to the loss of a job. Your support will help me go along with a team that is going to bring our serving hearts and hands for these people to let them know how loved they are. 

MONEY AIN'T EVERYTHING!

If you feel like you just are not able to help me financially right now, that is complelety OK! I understand that right now the economy is rough and as much as i need the money i understand if that is just not possible for you and your family to help support in that way right now. However, you can contribute and help me in a different way. 

I would appreciate your prayers for this trip, our team, the people we will be coming in contact with, and for my own personal growth through this mission. 

The power of Prayer blows me away. God hears all of our requests and wants to watch over his children. YOUR PRAYERS ARE SO IMPORTANT AND APPRECIATED! 

"Be Joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer." Romans 12:12.

story:
Hey, Welcome to our campaign page! 

We're excited to share our newest collection with you. Together with the Indiegogo community we’re able to keep developing new products and bring them to the market. Last year we won an ISPO Gold Award on the biggest outdoor trade fair, today we're ready to show you our newly developed Hard Shell jacket, Mid-layer jacket and Zip-in Fleece jacket. Enjoy!

INTRODUCING OUR NEW WINTER COLLECTION

Cortazu creates the highest-quality outerwear and sells it straight from the manufacturer to you. We're happy to introduce our new Winter collection, including all the features you need to embrace the outdoors. From the Mountain to the City.    

500+ VERIFIED REVIEWS - THE CUSTOMER IS KING!

This is our 4th Indiegogo project and we have delivered thousands of products all over the world. Feedback has been incredible and we couldn't have arrived here without the Indiegogo community.   

Our new Hard Shell has some amazing updates and features we are excited to share. We have taken our popular Hard Shell and made it even more innovative with a higher waterproof rating, zip-in system to connect to the Mid-layer or Fleece, re-designed sleeve length, and added some new colors.

On top of this, our updated Hard Shell is made from a more durable and Recycled 3-Layer fabric. Including 20+ features all in one jacket. Check it out below! 

We know that winters can be tough, so we choose a Recycled 3-Layer fabric that can withstand any condition. It's 100% water and windproof and even more durable than anything we created before.

It’s perfect for whatever mother nature throws at you. Specifically created for a wide range of activities, from the city to the mountain.

And of course, we also included many of the features you might know from us: 9 pockets to hold all your essentials, Waterproof AcquaGuard® zippers, Cohaesive™ Cords, Recco® Rescue System and more! 

THE CORTAZU SHELL VS. ARC'TERYX AND NORRONA

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortazu Hard Shell can easily compete with the best in the industry. 

Cortazu creates the highest-quality outerwear and sells it straight from the manufacturer to you. We're happy to introduce our new lightweight high-performance jackets, including all the features you need to embrace the outdoors.

We like to call them outdoor essentials, made for all seasons: The Hard Shell 

RED - Including Free Fleece Jacket and €50 Euro Gift card - Preorder here for €349


DARK GREEN - Including Free Fleece Jacket and €50 Euro Gift card - Preorder here for €349

BURGUNDY - Including Free Fleece Jacket and €50 Euro Gift card - Preorder here for €349

OUR REVOLUTIONARY FABRIC        

Dermizax®EV by Toray - The perfect membrane that redefines comfort and protection for high-performance fabrics. Now renewed in our Hard Shell with an even higher waterproofness rating and improved durability.

Created with proprietary technology in Japan and designed to protect you in all weather conditions.   

 

WHY THIS FABRIC?

Dermizax®EV is a 100% waterproof, windproof and breathable membrane (fabric). Specifically developed to provide maximum protection against all kinds of demanding activities and weather conditions. It's a durable and strong 3-layer fabric that can be washed like any other textiles. The perfect fabric for our collection of High-Performance jackets. Besides waterproofness, we highly value the fabric's exceptional breathability. See below how the Dermizax membrane compares to other high-performance fabrics.  

 

500+ VERIFIED REVIEWS - THE CUSTOMER IS KING! 

 

THE WINTER MID-LAYER - YOUR NEW BEST FRIEND

Perfect from autumn to winter whether you are hiking, skiing or just for everyday life. This insulated jacket is warm, breathable and easy to pack. Available in 6 colors!

 

PACKED WITH FEATURES 

Super warm, light and animal-friendly. Featured with a water-resistant and windproof fabric, convenient pockets on the out- and inside. Design details that keep you comfortable and 3M Featherless FL700 Insulation that keeps you warm.

AVAILABLE IN 6 COLORS, FOR MEN AND WOMEN

NAVY BLUE WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99

RED WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99

DARK GREEN WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99

YELLOW WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99 

BLACK WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99

IBIZA BLUE WINTER MID-LAYER - Pre-order here for €99 

 

DOWN VS. SYNTHETIC. THE SOLUTION: FEATHERLESS 3M™ FL700 

For years, outdoor brands have used down as insulation for their mid-layers. Down is extremely warm and packable, but it doesn't perform when wet. While synthetic insulation is bulky and not as warm.

But wouldn't it be great if you could combine the warmth and packability of down with the versatility of synthetic insulation?

Together with our supplier we developed a unique material that mimics down when dry, and performs better when wet. And it is super warm, comparable to that of 700 Fill Power Down!  

THE CORTAZU MID-LAYER VS. PEAK PERFORMANCE AND PATAGONIA

A picture is worth a thousand words. Let us show you why we believe the Cortazu Mid-layer can easily compete with the best in the industry.

 

CUSTOMER REVIEWS

Together with the Kickstarter and Indiegogo community we have grown. And customer feedback forms an essential part of our journey and product development.  

 

THE ZIP-IN FLEECE 

Ultra-soft and featured with our new Zip-in system. Made of a Hi-Tech microfleece fabric that is super soft, warm and offers ultimate comfort. Perfect for layering in colder conditions or as a standalone piece. We believe it's a must-have for every outdoor enthusiast. Available for men and women.     

 

REWARDS

See our packages below to find out everything you need to know.

 

TIMELINE 

Since the start of Cortazu our team has delivered thousands of packages to customers all over the world. As this is our 4th Indiegogo campaign we are 100% sure to do so again in 2020 and we will make sure each backer becomes a happy owner of their ordered Cortazu  products.

All production lines have already been reserved which guarantees us output on time, according to the timeline below. 

Covid-19 Update:  Currently we're sure that there's no need to mention any (to be expected) delays. There is a good amount of padding in our schedule for unforeseen circumstances and for most of our components we already booked material ahead which means those are readily available. We're in direct and constant contact with our suppliers and if there are any potential influences on our proposed production timeline we will inform you - our backers - as soon as we know. 

 

SIZE CHART 

After your pledge on Indiegogo we'll contact you within 2 weeks to help you select the right size and color.

Nevertheless, below you can find our size chart to already measure your chest, waist and hips. This will help you to choose that one size that fits you best.

 

This is us, rocking the Cortazu jackets! We are passionate skiers and outdoor enthusiasts with an extensive background in clothing production, fashion and entrepreneurship.

As the founders of Sqetch.co Wiebe and Wouter have helped hundreds of fashion brands and clothing suppliers to grow their business.

Herman has been working in the field of clothing production for 40+ years and is the owner of Vert Company, a true pioneer in sustainable production.

We're on a mission to create lasting outdoor experiences and re-green our planet. That's why we partnered up with Justdiggit and started to cool down the planet. For every jacket sold we re-green 50m2 of land on the foot of the Kilimanjaro (Tanzania) to reduce global warming.

At Cortazu you don't buy to get, you buy to give.

OUR DESIGN PROCESS

This is outerwear you are going to love, so we want to make sure it lasts.

Together with the most respected manufacturers in the industry we are ready for our fourth collection.

Highest quality products, outstanding design and build to last.

EXCELLENT VALUE: SELLING STRAIGHT FROM THE MANUFACTURER

By using a disruptive direct-to-consumer model, and cutting out the middlemen, we can offer our products for an exceptionally reduced price while maintaining the same high-quality standards as leading industry brands.

SPECIAL THANKS

Our first early supporting backers from our 1st, 2nd and 3rd Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns :)

Video & Photography credits: VISUALCHEFS - Creative Film Company. In particular, #janfillem and #stefanjansen and #visualentrepreneur

Cortazu superstars: Marjolein van der Klauw, Sabine Tol, Nick Hanraets, Marios Kefalas, Arda Akdeniz, Adam Montrose, Merlijn van den Biggelaar and Alex Cheuk

AND OF COURSE..

We would love to thank our family and friends for their support during the Cortazu journey so far, we couldn't have done it without you! Let's hope together we can make this a huge success!

story:
What is Bluesmart?

Bluesmart is a high-quality carry-on suitcase that you can control from your phone, like a boss. From the app you can lock and unlock it, weigh it, track its location, be notified if you are leaving it behind and find out more about your travel habits. You can also charge your phone 6 times over with a built-in battery. Isn’t that awesome?

 

As seen on:

 

After decades of no innovation in the luggage industry, we re-imagined the suitcase to solve all the problems of the modern traveler. No more luggage nightmares to spoil your trips. With Bluesmart, you will travel smarter and be the coolest kid in the airport.

 

The Bluesmart carry-on connects to your smartphone, enabling features that will forever change the way you travel.

We all know nothing can ruin a trip like losing your luggage and its contents. Put your mind at ease knowing that you can lock your suitcase via your smartphone; if you get separated from your Bluesmart, it will lock automatically. Access can be shared with people you trust, and you will be notified anytime someone attempts to open the suitcase. The Bluesmart Travel Sentry® Approved Lock will be accepted by the TSA.

Forget about checking your bag! Bluesmart has a built-in digital scale so you can find out its weight and whether it’s approved by the airline. Just pull the handle and the app will tell you if you are ok to go.

You need to Instagram your trip, so we know how important it is to have your phone charged at all times. That’s why we’ve included a super powerful battery charger that can charge two devices - whether it is your smartphone, tablet or ebook - at the same time. The suitcase battery will enable you to recharge your smartphone six times over.

You don’t want to lose this baby. Thanks to the proximity sensors, you will receive alerts when you are separated from your Bluesmart. You can also locate your Bluesmart with a proximity heat map and receive a reminder of the last recorded location. Take that, James Bond.

If you ever lose your Bluesmart (how dare you!) or if it gets “re-routed”, the Bluesmart network will help you track the location of your suitcase. As the network grows, we will cover the whole planet.

Let’s be honest, going through airport security sucks. So we made it extremely easy to access your electronics with a compartment at the front of the suitcase, specially designed to hold and protect your laptop and tablet. You’ll breeze through airport security like George Clooney in that movie.

The data shows that you’re a jetsetter. Get real-time reports with trends and data from your trips, including miles traveled, airports visited, time spent in each country, and more through the Bluesmart app.

How cool would it be to have your own travel assistant? Imagine Bluesmart syncing to your calendar and to other travel services that you use so you can get reminders about when and what to pack.
 

Oh yeah. We will also develop apps for the smartwatch users out there, so you can control your suitcase right from your wrist and be the ultimate travel baller.

 

Using this Travel Sentry® Approved lock allows your luggage to be unlocked and inspected by security authorities without damage.

You live in the 21st century. It is about time for someone to make the suitcase that you deserve. More than a suitcase, your personal travel assistant.

 

Where we are

We now have a new generation of fully functional Bluesmart prototypes and - unlike previous iterations made in-house - they have been built by our manufacturing partners. This gives us great certainty about the manufacturing process to come.

 

 

Why we need you

We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of tech-savvy travelers around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. Our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. We have expertise in manufacturing products, and we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the luggage and electronics industries. All together, we can make this happen.

We are a group of geeks that share a passion for travel, technology and design. After having trips ruined because of problems with our luggage, we looked at our suitcases and realized that they haven’t evolved in decades. So we set out to re-imagine how a suitcase should be in this day and age.

 

Tomi Pierucci - Co-founder, President
Tomi is a seasoned entrepreneur with extensive experience building companies that manufacture physical products. He co-founded Little Blue and Big Blue, where he worked for worldwide brands, fulfilling orders in over 5 continents. 

 

  

Alejo Verlini - Co-founder, Head ofDesign
Alejo has extensive experience as a lead industrial designer. He co-founded NSNC, a boutique design consulting firm that specializes in product design, user experience, strategic innovation and design thinking processes.

Diego Saez Gil - Co-founder, CEO
Diego is a seasoned travel entrepreneur with extensive experience building web and mobile technology-based companies. He co-founded WeHostels startup, acquired by StudentUniverse, where he became Vice President of Mobile.

Ale Sarra - Industrial Designer
Ale has an extensive experience conceiving and developing products. He's been actively involved in the design process of products for brands such as Electrolux, INDRA, P&G, Teka, Unilever, Alfa Hogar, among others.

 

  

We already have trusted manufacturing partners with vast experience in luggage and electronics ready to help us get Bluesmart to market.

  • October 2014: Spread the word and fund our dream!

  • November 2014: Finalize engineering and tooling, start software development.

  • April 2015: Tooling build-out, complete assembly testing and international quality control certifications.

  • May 2015: Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.

  • June 2015: Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and thermo-molded parts, software testing.

  • August 2015: Finalize the assembly process and begin order fulfillment.

  • October 2015: Delivery!

 

We have been working for more than a year developing Bluesmart and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.

Manufacturing: 

We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

Software:

The software and app are functional, but we still have work to do building all the features that we want to include in the Bluesmart app. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge. 

We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it right on time.

 

FAQ's

Should you have any questions, please visit http://bluesmart.com/ for general information or http://support.bluesmart.com for our Help Center.
story_txt:
What is Bluesmart?Bluesmart is a high-quality carry-on suitcase that you can control from your phone, like a boss. From the app you can lock and unlock it, weigh it, track its location, be notified if you are leaving it behind and find out more about your travel habits. You can also charge your phone 6 times over with a built-in battery. Isn’t that awesome? As seen on:

 
After decades of no innovation in the luggage industry, we re-imagined the suitcase to solve all the problems of the modern traveler. No more luggage nightmares to spoil your trips. With Bluesmart, you will travel smarter and be the coolest kid in the airport.
 


The Bluesmart carry-on connects to your smartphone, enabling features that will forever change the way you travel.

We all know nothing can ruin a trip like losing your luggage and its contents. Put your mind at ease knowing that you can lock your suitcase via your smartphone; if you get separated from your Bluesmart, it will lock automatically. Access can be shared with people you trust, and you will be notified anytime someone attempts to open the suitcase. The Bluesmart Travel Sentry® Approved Lock will be accepted by the TSA.

Forget about checking your bag! Bluesmart has a built-in digital scale so you can find out its weight and whether it’s approved by the airline. Just pull the handle and the app will tell you if you are ok to go.

You need to Instagram your trip, so we know how important it is to have your phone charged at all times. That’s why we’ve included a super powerful battery charger that can charge two devices - whether it is your smartphone, tablet or ebook - at the same time. The suitcase battery will enable you to recharge your smartphone six times over.

You don’t want to lose this baby. Thanks to the proximity sensors, you will receive alerts when you are separated from your Bluesmart. You can also locate your Bluesmart with a proximity heat map and receive a reminder of the last recorded location. Take that, James Bond.

If you ever lose your Bluesmart (how dare you!) or if it gets “re-routed”, the Bluesmart network will help you track the location of your suitcase. As the network grows, we will cover the whole planet.

Let’s be honest, going through airport security sucks. So we made it extremely easy to access your electronics with a compartment at the front of the suitcase, specially designed to hold and protect your laptop and tablet. You’ll breeze through airport security like George Clooney in that movie.

The data shows that you’re a jetsetter. Get real-time reports with trends and data from your trips, including miles traveled, airports visited, time spent in each country, and more through the Bluesmart app.

How cool would it be to have your own travel assistant? Imagine Bluesmart syncing to your calendar and to other travel services that you use so you can get reminders about when and what to pack.
 


Oh yeah. We will also develop apps for the smartwatch users out there, so you can control your suitcase right from your wrist and be the ultimate travel baller.
 

Using this Travel Sentry® Approved lock allows your luggage to be unlocked and inspected by security authorities without damage.




You live in the 21st century. It is about time for someone to make the suitcase that you deserve. More than a suitcase, your personal travel assistant.





 
Where we are
We now have a new generation of fully functional Bluesmart prototypes and - unlike previous iterations made in-house - they have been built by our manufacturing partners. This gives us great certainty about the manufacturing process to come.
 


 
Why we need you
We’ve turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you and the awesome community of tech-savvy travelers around the world. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we will get this product to market that much faster. Our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. We have expertise in manufacturing products, and we have partnered with manufacturers that are experienced in the luggage and electronics industries. All together, we can make this happen.

We are a group of geeks that share a passion for travel, technology and design. After having trips ruined because of problems with our luggage, we looked at our suitcases and realized that they haven’t evolved in decades. So we set out to re-imagine how a suitcase should be in this day and age.

 




Tomi Pierucci - Co-founder, PresidentTomi is a seasoned entrepreneur with extensive experience building companies that manufacture physical products. He co-founded Little Blue and Big Blue, where he worked for worldwide brands, fulfilling orders in over 5 continents. 


 
 




Alejo Verlini - Co-founder, Head ofDesignAlejo has extensive experience as a lead industrial designer. He co-founded NSNC, a boutique design consulting firm that specializes in product design, user experience, strategic innovation and design thinking processes.




Diego Saez Gil - Co-founder, CEODiego is a seasoned travel entrepreneur with extensive experience building web and mobile technology-based companies. He co-founded WeHostels startup, acquired by StudentUniverse, where he became Vice President of Mobile.




Ale Sarra - Industrial DesignerAle has an extensive experience conceiving and developing products. He's been actively involved in the design process of products for brands such as Electrolux, INDRA, P&G, Teka, Unilever, Alfa Hogar, among others.


 
 



We already have trusted manufacturing partners with vast experience in luggage and electronics ready to help us get Bluesmart to market. 

October 2014: Spread the word and fund our dream!
November 2014: Finalize engineering and tooling, start software development.
April 2015: Tooling build-out, complete assembly testing and international quality control certifications.
May 2015: Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.
June 2015: Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and thermo-molded parts, software testing.
August 2015: Finalize the assembly process and begin order fulfillment.
October 2015: Delivery!

 




We have been working for more than a year developing Bluesmart and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start. However, we know that before mass production begins, we may encounter some problems. We have plans to mitigate all the risks and have enlisted great advisors that will also help.


Manufacturing: 
We need to create the tooling to manufacture different parts of the product. This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.
Software:
The software and app are functional, but we still have work to do building all the features that we want to include in the Bluesmart app. Software development sometimes gets tricky and takes longer than expected, but we have a lot of experience in this area and if necessary will look for additional help to solve any problems that could emerge. 
We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product for you and deliver it right on time.
 




FAQ's
Should you have any questions, please visit http://bluesmart.com/ for general information or http://support.bluesmart.com for our Help Center.

story:
Can you imagine never having to pump your wheelchair or bike tires ever again? 


Pump Hub eliminates the problem of under-inflated tires with elegance and simplicity. As you roll, our wheels automatically inflate your tires then shut off. Just flick a convenient switch and roll. Increase your performance conveniently. You get a high quality wheel with a built in pump.

Our Story

The Pump-Hub creator, Kevin Manning, has been an avid cyclist for over 30 years, and an active member of a local bicycle club, the Oakland Yellowjackets.  He earned a degree in Mechanical Engineering  from San Francisco State University and designed and manufactured groundwater environmental cleanup pumps fresh out of college.  


                                                 


While looking at a bike pump, it occurred to him that the easiest way to pump up a tire would be to not have to pump it up at all - to use the wheel and its rotation to do the work. The result is the Pump Hub: designed as an automatic,  adjustable pressure, tire-inflation system that sits right in the hub of your wheel.

               



What's Next for Pump Hub? 

Kevin has partnered with Phil Wood & Co,  a leading manufacturer of wheel components for bicycles and wheel chairs. By supplying us their quality components, we've been able to produce some beautiful wheel chair wheel prototypes. We want to bring self-inflating wheels to the world, but need a little help in this initial production phase. We're excited to start our journey to replace the hand pump/floor pump/air compressor/ or any other method of tire inflation and make our wheels available to all.



Timeline and Funding Breakdown

Supporting our campaign will the provide us the capital to begin volume production. Here's a breakdown of our timeline and where the campaign funds will go.



Why is Pump Hub so significant?

Our wheels will revolutionize life in a wheelchair. Since most of us don't carry tire pumps with us, nor understand the importance of proper tire pressure many wheelchair users are expending unnecessary effort. With our wheels, a simple flick of a switch allows you to maintain optimum tire pressure at all times.


How Does it Work?

Our wheels have pumps built into them. It works using the natural rotation of the wheel. As the wheel rotates, you'll hear a faint clicking noise. This means air is being pumped into your tires. When the optimum pressure is reached, the pump shuts off automatically, giving the user minimal rolling resistance, assuring the most efficient ride possible.



Besides saving your energy, proper tire pressure drastically reduces the chance of a flat. Should you need to deflate your tires somewhat to gain traction on a particular terrain, you can quickly and easily re-inflate to optimum pressure when desired. Just flick the switch and roll.

Let's Break It Down

·  Reach down to the center of the wheel and flick the switch on the hub to turn it on

·  Proceed to ride

·  As the wheel rotates, the tire inflates until it is fully pumped up (gentle clicking will   be heard until the designated tire pressure is reached)

·  When the clicking stops, the Pump-hub has completed the job of inflating the tire!

Risks & Challenges

Over the past few years, Kevin has been perfecting the design and making prototypes; a process that requires precise engineering, time and money.  Friends and family supported Kevin through pre-production, prototypes and samples; now we're reaching an entirely new level of preparation for mass production. Parts must be ordered in volume then go through significant assembly and quality control. In order to be sure we’re able to offer our wheels at a reasonable price, we need your support to get us started.


Who Loves Us


FAQ's

How often do I need to activate the pump?

A: Probably once a week is sufficient for most people, but since the pump shuts off automatically you can top off at any time.

 

Does the pump need a battery?

A: No. Your forward motion powers the pump.


Is the pump noisy?

When inflating, the pump sounds a little like the old playing-card-in-the-spokes that kids used to put on their bikes to sound cool. 


How much does the pump add to the wheel weight?

About 4 ounces per hub, you won't even notice a difference.


What pressure does it inflate the tires to?

A: Whatever you want, from 40 to 125 psi.


Which wheelchair models are we compatible with ?

We will initially be offering wheels that are compatible with Quickie Q7 chairs and Tilite ZR chairs. After this campaign, we aim to be compatible with most major models on the market.


Is there a warranty?

Yep! 5 years. 


How much will shipping cost?

We'll cover shipping within the continental US for perks 1-3. For the wheels, shipping will vary based on location and volume. 

What do the messenger bags look like and how big are they?
Our messenger bags are locally made by a small business in the Oakland. The small messenger bag can fit a small water bottle, wallet, keys and your cell phone. The large bag is a standard messenger bag that can carry a laptop and comes with two smaller pockets inside the front flap. Here's an example below.



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help!

Like our Facebook Page and encourage your friends and family to help bring Pump Hub to the masses!

story:
Inspire & Achieve

The Burnaby 4 Day is an international event held in Burnaby, BC that incorporates music, cycling lifestyle, craft beer, local cuisine, and pure entertainment. As a cycling event the talent it attracts serves to inspire the next generation of cyclists, young and old, and provide our homegrown talent an opportunity to test their metal against some of the best cyclists in the world.

Inspiration, however, lends itself to the theatrical. What better way to set the scene than to create an atmosphere that truly highlights the main event...Your contribution will allow you to see the event as we have, at its' inception. And, while this year's event is merely a stepping stone on the path to what the Burnaby 4 Day will become, the lights illuminate the way.


What We Need & What You Get

In total, the goal of our fundraising efforts is only $3,000; that's 120 people contributing $25 each!

Provided we meet our goal, the funds used will cover the expense of operating the lights as well as the rental of the equipment. However, since this is a bit of a Hail Mary, it's possible we won't succeed. Unfortunate as that may be the funds raised would go right back to the riders in the form of the prize purse. Either way, the funds go to a good cause!

So what's in it for you? Good question!

We want you to be a part of the action! With every $10 donation you'll get one Adult Admission ticket good for any one of the four days of competition. Spend $25 and you'll get that and we'll put your name in a raffle for one of four prizes:

  • A weekend getaway at the Tinhorn Creek Vineyards Estate ($1,200)
  • A Felt TK-3 track bike ($1,029)
  • A jersey autographed by the Canadian National Women's Team Pursuit ($150)
  • A Learn to Ride package ($110)


Time Crunched

We know we're asking a lot in a very short time but hey, it's the time of year when miracles happen. So, even though we've only got a few days, our lighting technician is fully on board and ready to go at the last minute.


Help Us Spread the Word!

It's the Holidays, a tough time for everyone. So if you can't donate, we understand. But that doesn't mean you're off the hook. What you can do is share this campaign with everyone that you know who's passionate about bikes, community, and the drive to make things better; tweet it out, share it on Facebook, Instagram, good ole' fashion conversation...let's just get it out there and make it happen!

story:
Order Yours Today at

www.omegastrap.com

 

The best way to tie down your load!

Ratchet tie-down straps have been loved yet reviled for decades as they jam, confuse, and frustrate the user. Problem solved! 

OmegaStrap is the world’s first ergonomic ratchet strap system. It features a hand-friendly control knob, a flexible fastener to hold your hook in place, and an elastic loop for easy storage. The OmegaStrap makes all other ratchet straps in its weight-class archaic.

 

Common Ratchet Strap Problems... OmegaStrap Solutions!

Buckles/straps that jam... Knob turns them out                                     

Hooks that fall loose... Flex hook holds almost anywhere

Dangling strap tails... Knob receives excess length

Tangled straps … Elastic loop stores strap

Loading confusion ...Knob makes it easy

Uncontrolled ratchet release ... Knob gives control

 

Background on OmegaStrap:

Frustrated by recurring bad experiences with regular ratchet straps, it became my mission to improve them. Over the past 4 years I have worked to redesign the common ratchet strap and get it produced. Finally, the first production run of OmegaStrap has begun. 

 

It's tough! It's rugged! It's good looking! It's smart! It's you!

 

How OmegaStrap is different:

The Control Knob!

A knob was added to create an ever-present device that could be used to clear jammed straps and stuck axles. Once the knob was present, it revealed that the buckle's axle could be engineered to be turned backwards while closed. This is really important!  This feature allows the axle to be rotated by hand until it locks in-line for easy and proper loading of the strap into the ratchet buckle. The metal will even be stamped with loading directions!

 

The Flexible Hook!

Hooks repeatedly dropping loose from their remote anchor points led to the creation of a flexible wire assembly. The wire allows retention of the hook even in the most difficult places. 

 

The Elastic Loop!

The addition of an attached elastic band solved the problem of tying off the excess strap as well as neatly storing the tie-down. When traveling, simply wrap the excess around the knob and secure it with the storage loop. When you are finished, just wrap the strap up and loop it.

 

What OmegaStrap Enthusiasts Have to Say:

"Elegantly simple."

Chuck R. (Engineer)  

"Genius. Simple. Finally. Three words that sum up the OmegaStrap. If you have ever had a dirt bike fall over in the back of your truck when you release the strap, or been forced to lose time re-hooking or un-jamming, the damage doesn't go away and you never get that time back. This product will not only help your blood pressure, but it will save you time and money."

Tyler F. (Lawn and landscape company manager)  

"I need more straps, but won't buy them until yours are out."

Max (Boxstore Hardware Manager)  

These straps are genius! After many years of ATVing these look like they would solve a lot of the issues of traditional straps. I have shared it with 3 ATV groups already. Good luck, hope you do well!

Warren W. (Motorsports entusiast)  

 

Our campaign goal:

Your investment made here will help us overcome the next hurdle: Sales history. Having a strong sales history translates to retailer interest. Contributing not only puts some of the straps into your hands, but also helps this product succeed! 

We are asking you to participate! Put a pair in your tool chest. You'll feel like a pro as you tie down your cargo with speed and confidence.

 

The Impact of Contributions, and The Future:

We want to reduce the excess waste in ratchet strap packaging. 

Most straps today are sold in a very heavy plastic, single-use container that goes into landfills and may last forever. They also make it very difficult to remove the product. It shouldn't require 10 minutes and all of your wits and strength to get them out of the packaging. If you can get them out that is!

Our packaging will be a more simple paper and soy-based style that is more carbon-neutral and easy to recycle. 

 

OmegaStrap Packaging

We plan to get the product into stores as soon as possible. Once we have proven the product, we will work to finalize connections already initiated for shelf-space with retail stores you are familiar with. There will be on-line marketing to reinforce the OmegaStrap brand and an ecommerce channel for sales via OmegaStrap.com.

With a successful start-up period, we would like to take the production a step further and bring it home. Price competition is the driving force behind our start-up partnership with Chinese manufacturing.  Our straps' patents create enhanced value that we believe will make it cost effective to eventually produce in the U.S.

Retail and online sales will not be our only marketplace. Many boating, hauling, and motoring brands offer straps for sale in on-line company stores that are promotional of their name. The knob has been designed to receive a personalized logo cap, and our supplier has the ability to imprint company identification on the webbing. We are pursuing relationships in that market. They would also be great for municipal departments with the name identifying city property. Could your company or department use some?

 

Perks: 

OmegaStrap is being produced right now for expected delivery in late December 2020.

The first production run of 5,000 sets of OmegaStraps are a 15 ft, 800 lb safe working limit/2400 lb max limit edition. It has a sleek all-black look with the red control knob and red elastic storage loop as you have seen above.  Each set contains 2 ratchet tie-downs, 2 soft-tie loops, and an OmegaStrap mesh storage bag.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our first project on Indiegogo. We have improved a popular tool with newly patented ideas. This campaign is made to establish an indication of the product's market viability, as well as to help raise funds needed to cover the costs of our first production run. The design and engineering are ready, and assembly is underway. Unforeseen circumstances, such as an escalation of international trade issues, transportation delays, or the manufacturer's ability and willingness to deliver in a timely manner are risks. Covid-19 related delays are also a possible issue. 

Omegastrap is confident in our supply chain and does anticipate delays to our in-stock date.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not use ratchet straps, but people you know are suffering!

  • Sign up for email updates from OmegaStrap!

  • Let your friends know you have seen this cool new strap.

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let them know!

  • Click and follow:  OmegaStrap on Facebook

  • Click and visit us at: OmegaStrap.com

 

Product concept was only the beginning. The overall design has required changes to the stamping of almost every metal part of the ordinary buckle. Each piece of plastic requires a mold for the process. The creation cost of the strap with its patents, molds, time, and travel has been substantial. We have worked hard to get to this stage and this product is worth the effort!

My dream is to be driving down the road as someone goes past with OmegaStraps securing their load. That'll be cool! 

Thank you,

Brad Willodson

Founder

 

Information on patents may be found at: http://www.omegastrap.com/legal​

Uncontrolled ratchet release ... Knob gives control

 
Background on OmegaStrap:

Frustrated by recurring bad experiences with regular ratchet straps, it became my mission to improve them. Over the past 4 years I have worked to redesign the common ratchet strap and get it produced. Finally, the first production run of OmegaStrap has begun. 
 
It's tough! It's rugged! It's good looking! It's smart! It's you!
 
How OmegaStrap is different:
The Control Knob!
A knob was added to create an ever-present device that could be used to clear jammed straps and stuck axles. Once the knob was present, it revealed that the buckle's axle could be engineered to be turned backwards while closed. This is really important!  This feature allows the axle to be rotated by hand until it locks in-line for easy and proper loading of the strap into the ratchet buckle. The metal will even be stamped with loading directions!

 
The Flexible Hook!
Hooks repeatedly dropping loose from their remote anchor points led to the creation of a flexible wire assembly. The wire allows retention of the hook even in the most difficult places. 
 The Elastic Loop!
The addition of an attached elastic band solved the problem of tying off the excess strap as well as neatly storing the tie-down. When traveling, simply wrap the excess around the knob and secure it with the storage loop. When you are finished, just wrap the strap up and loop it.


 
What OmegaStrap Enthusiasts Have to Say:
"Elegantly simple."
Chuck R. (Engineer)  
"Genius. Simple. Finally. Three words that sum up the OmegaStrap. If you have ever had a dirt bike fall over in the back of your truck when you release the strap, or been forced to lose time re-hooking or un-jamming, the damage doesn't go away and you never get that time back. This product will not only help your blood pressure, but it will save you time and money." 
Tyler F. (Lawn and landscape company manager)  
"I need more straps, but won't buy them until yours are out."
Max (Boxstore Hardware Manager)  
These straps are genius! After many years of ATVing these look like they would solve a lot of the issues of traditional straps. I have shared it with 3 ATV groups already. Good luck, hope you do well!
Warren W. (Motorsports entusiast)  
 
Our campaign goal:
Your investment made here will help us overcome the next hurdle: Sales history. Having a strong sales history translates to retailer interest. Contributing not only puts some of the straps into your hands, but also helps this product succeed! 
We are asking you to participate! Put a pair in your tool chest. You'll feel like a pro as you tie down your cargo with speed and confidence.
 
The Impact of Contributions, and The Future:

We want to reduce the excess waste in ratchet strap packaging. 
Most straps today are sold in a very heavy plastic, single-use container that goes into landfills and may last forever. They also make it very difficult to remove the product. It shouldn't require 10 minutes and all of your wits and strength to get them out of the packaging. If you can get them out that is!
Our packaging will be a more simple paper and soy-based style that is more carbon-neutral and easy to recycle. 
 
OmegaStrap Packaging



We plan to get the product into stores as soon as possible. Once we have proven the product, we will work to finalize connections already initiated for shelf-space with retail stores you are familiar with. There will be on-line marketing to reinforce the OmegaStrap brand and an ecommerce channel for sales via OmegaStrap.com.
With a successful start-up period, we would like to take the production a step further and bring it home. Price competition is the driving force behind our start-up partnership with Chinese manufacturing.  Our straps' patents create enhanced value that we believe will make it cost effective to eventually produce in the U.S.
Retail and online sales will not be our only marketplace. Many boating, hauling, and motoring brands offer straps for sale in on-line company stores that are promotional of their name. The knob has been designed to receive a personalized logo cap, and our supplier has the ability to imprint company identification on the webbing. We are pursuing relationships in that market. They would also be great for municipal departments with the name identifying city property. Could your company or department use some?
 
Perks: 
OmegaStrap is being produced right now for expected delivery in late December 2020.
The first production run of 5,000 sets of OmegaStraps are a 15 ft, 800 lb safe working limit/2400 lb max limit edition. It has a sleek all-black look with the red control knob and red elastic storage loop as you have seen above.  Each set contains 2 ratchet tie-downs, 2 soft-tie loops, and an OmegaStrap mesh storage bag.
 



 

Risks & Challenges
This is our first project on Indiegogo. We have improved a popular tool with newly patented ideas. This campaign is made to establish an indication of the product's market viability, as well as to help raise funds needed to cover the costs of our first production run. The design and engineering are ready, and assembly is underway. Unforeseen circumstances, such as an escalation of international trade issues, transportation delays, or the manufacturer's ability and willingness to deliver in a timely manner are risks. Covid-19 related delays are also a possible issue. 
Omegastrap is confident in our supply chain and does anticipate delays to our in-stock date.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
You may not use ratchet straps, but people you know are suffering!

Sign up for email updates from OmegaStrap!
Let your friends know you have seen this cool new strap.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to let them know!
Click and follow:  OmegaStrap on Facebook
Click and visit us at: OmegaStrap.com


 
Product concept was only the beginning. The overall design has required changes to the stamping of almost every metal part of the ordinary buckle. Each piece of plastic requires a mold for the process. The creation cost of the strap with its patents, molds, time, and travel has been substantial. We have worked hard to get to this stage and this product is worth the effort!
My dream is to be driving down the road as someone goes past with OmegaStraps securing their load. That'll be cool! 
Thank you, 
Brad Willodson
Founder
 
Information on patents may be found at: http://www.omegastrap.com/legal​

story:
Fiets & Fiets backpack is designed for people with active lifestyles. With its magic docking system, modular & transformable design, it adapts to your lifestyle by offering you a space for everything in a convenient and accessible way. 

 

Fiets & Fiets’ multifunctional design is perfect for commuters, photographers, adventure seekers, and many more.     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 The Fiets & Fiets pack is designed for all professionals with different travel needs. With the Magic Dock, a universal docking system, you can attach your own accessories to the outside of the backpack, easy access and saving space in the main interior compartment. 

 

 

Simply click and lock to attach your daily essential to the Magic Dock. Bike helmet, water bottle, and more can be attached to your back with the unique dock system.

 


 

Going out on an evening ride? With the light’s static or flash mode, maintain visibility to all drivers and pedestrians on the road while riding. The bike light has a built-in replaceable lithium battery bright enough for others to spot you from miles away.   

 

 


 

 Want to separate your shoes or dirty laundry from clean clothes? With the included anti-dust bag, keep the main compartment nice and clean.    

 

 

 

Need easy access to your water bottle or want to blast your speaker while biking? With the universal holder, attach anything you want to the front of your packbag.

 

 

Collect Creative Ideas

 

In addition to the three accessories described above, we are also exploring other possibilities for the magic dock, such as a place to hold your umbrella, gears, and so. We’ve already working on an idea collected from our community - a cycling light with directional signals!   

 

 

This is just one of the many awesome suggestions we’ve receive and we want to invite you to share your creative ideas to take the Fiets & Fiets to the next level.

 

 

The Fiets & Fiets backpack is made from PU materials. It is waterproof, stain-proof, lightweight, and offers optimal heat dissipation. Take the Fiets & Fiets backpack to the hot Sahara Desert, snowy Icelandic glaciers, or wild Amazon rain-forests, its premium material can withstand any weather.

 

Waterproof

 

Fiets & Fiets weatherproof material and zipper free you up in your journey. It's waterproof, storm proof and even stain-proof! Play in the rain instead of fleeing from it when you are exploring the world.  

 

 

Wet Items' Pocket

 

A dedicated water retentive compartment to keep your wet raincoat or umbrella from the rest of your dry items. The holes at the bottom enable fast drying to wick away any unwanted moisture in your bag. 

 

 

 

 

These smart organizers help you pack everything with ease. 

 

Going on a weekend getaway? There’s a organizer for your clothes and toiletries so you don’t have to dig to the bottom of your bag for a shirt or toothbrush. Going on a shoot? There’s camera gear organizer to protect and secure your gear while you’re on the move. Get anything you need instantly.  

 

 

 

 

 

It offers several multi-functional pockets for flexible storage. Use the side-pocket for items you want quick access to while keep the main 22 L compartment for larger items like a 15” Macbook. The various sized compartments provides you instant access to all of your things. 

 

 

Organize all your commuting, schooling, and work necessities in the Fiets & Fiets compartment!

 

 

 

To free yourself from being weighed down by an overstuffed backpack, simply attach your backpack to the front or the rear rack for a comfortable and unrestrictive ride. 

 

 

 

Removable Chest-strap

 

Simply fasten the removable chest buckle to stabilize the pack while cycling. By doing so, it can take away any unbalanced pressure weighing down your shoulders when you’re cycling or hiking.

 

 

 

Instead of the traditional zipper, the magnetic enclosure offers quick and easy access to your items while you’re on-the-go. The magnetic seal with Fidlock securely fastens the flap onto the backpack safeguarding your items in seconds.

 

 

The patented lock, Fidlock, is convenient, protective, and reliable. It can secures your backpack instantly while still offering you a practical and accessible solution to all your things. 

 

 

 

 

You can now pledge for accessories ($10 each) on top of the $79 basic reward. Choose whatever you need and as many as you want.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Inspired by the mother nature, the Fiets & Fiets is available in 2 color options: Navy Blue and Ebony Black to highlight the adventurous, bold, and mysterious oceanic life that makes up most of the earth. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our team is young yet experienced. We hope to design products that inspire consumers to venture out and seek excitement even in their daily routines. We take into consideration the unique needs different travelers have as well as the various travel experiences of our consumers in order to create the most optimal products to cater to their needs. 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

We spend months preparing the set-up for this backpack, and have full functioning samples of the Backpacks. 
We are in close contact with the factory and they are well prepared for the production when the project is fully funded. 
Also our QA team is in place to personally check every shipment that will go out to make sure all backers receive the product without any defaults. 
The challenge therefore will not be the production side, but mostly the fulfillment side. We now have a good margin in our delivery times, and hope to deliver all the backpacks even before the deadline mentioned on this page. 
For this project we put a special team in place that is solely focused on answering any questions you might have for us, and we will make sure to respond to all messages within 24 hours. 
In short -- Nothing to worry about!

story:
Short Summary

I am The Average Jim, I am a professional photographer based in Palm Springs, California.  I have had my work published internationally and am working on my first photography art book.  The idea is to take my beloved Mercedes and drive it across country.  Along the way I will be picking up models and photographing them in various states of dress and undress for the Naked Road Trip USA!

What We Need & What You Get

  • My minimum goal is for $500.00, this covers the first leg of the west coast portion of the road trip.  Anything over this amount will lead to a longer journey and more models to photograph for this book along with more exciting locations!
  • For every location I go to, I will create custom postcards which will be available via email list to all contributors.  These will also be available in art print form and eventually in the book.
  • If I don't reach my main goal all funds will go directly into the first leg of the trip.  I am going to start this project no matter what so 100% of the funds go towards the car, fuel, hotels and models along with material costs of the book.

The Impact

  • The point is to showcase America the way it has not yet been seen!  True freedom on the open road!
  • This is my first book but I have been a photographer for over 20 years and published over 20 times last year alone.  I have had moderate success as a photographer and have always followed through on a project.
  • I have already photographed over 30 models in my car in my home town, now it is time to take the show on the road!

Risks & Challenges

  • The biggest challenge is finding people in every location, but fortunately with the internet this has made models more accessible than ever before.
  • The other challenge is local laws against nudity, I will need to be discreet while also pushing the boundaries of local laws.  The more you donate the more money I will have to bail a model out of jail! Just kidding, public nudity is a ticket.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you cannot donate money, please tell your friends, share this on social media and help me bring nudity in an old Mercedes to everyone across this country!
  • Share Share Share!!!!!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Do you remember playing with spinning tops when we were kids? Let me introduce you to Holl, a spinning top completely different from the one you already know. It breaks all the standards and tests your creativity.  Holl is the new approach to self-expression on the playing ground. Holl knows no limits when it comes to designing. 

 

 

Wood is considered to be a renewable natural resource, used in making high-quality products. Even in toy production, wood-made products have a higher reputation. The dominant material in Holl is wood, however, it is accompanied by other materials that work together in harmony.

 

 

Holl spinning tops are entirely handmade. Each of the spinning tops is a unique illustration of artwork and professionalism. Holl tops are just masterpieces that can fit in your hands.

 

 

There is an unlimited number of patterns that Holl can offer you. Trust me, designers put much love and effort into designing each of them. By the way, each print is handmade and unique.

 

 

 

 

Playing Holl is very easy. First, hold the Holl’s string in one hand and its widest end in the other.  Then, wrap the Holl’s string around its anchor knot and check if it is tight enough. When you’re done, roll the other end of the string around the middle finger of the same hand that holds the Holl. Keep the Holl with anchor point facing upwards, position yourself, and throw it. That’s how easy it is

 

 

 

 

Holl will brighten your day. With Holl, you will never be bored. You can play and organize competitions with your friends and family members anywhere and anytime. Think out of the box and improvise with Holl. 

 

 

 

If you are still thinking to get armed with a new toy, you are on the right track. Holl will be your inseparable friend everywhere.

Good News!! We are on our last stage of the project. The production and design processes  are completely finished. At this stage, we are packing Holls to dispatch.   We promise you’ll get HOL before Christmas.

story:
Update 17/11/14

We reached our goal in only 5 days!!! Thank you so much everyone. 

------------------------------------------------

10,000 km is a project that I dreamt to do for years, on September 2014 I finally managed to set my work schedule, sold my car and a few other things, got all the photo equipment and set off for this great journey. 

This project is a photographic collection of some of the most amazing landscapes in Venezuela, I will show you the great diversity of natural wonders that our country  has to offer hoping to inspire some of you to visit us and see it for yourselves.

I'm offering to all the contributors an exclusive limited set of large high quality prints, and an E-Book option as well.
Please check the list of Perks I have created for you and I hope you enjoy them. I will constantly post updates to keep you informed, motivated and excited. Stay tuned and as always, please spread the word. 

This are the images currently available to our contributors:

story:
BLANKET THE DMV!

A broad coalition of Muslim organizations* have come together with the goal of collecting $10,000 to purchase items that can benefit homeless individuals in the Washington DC Metro Area.  

HERE's WHERE YOU COME IN

We will be collecting donations to cover the cost of purchasing blankets, hats, gloves, socks, hygiene kits, and granola bars for 2,500 individuals!

WE CAN'T DO THIS WITHOUT YOU!!!!!

You can not even imagine how an 'unhoused' individual feels living day to day on the streets of the DMV.  The items that we will be purchasing will go a long way when faced with the cold and wind of an east coast winter.

WHAT ARE OTHER WAYS THAT YOU CAN HELP?

Please share this campaign with your networks!  Family, friends, email, FaceBook, and Twitter (#BlanketDMV).

*Al Madinah Institute, CAIR, Islamic Relief, ISNA, MakeSpace, Next Wave Muslim Initiative, MCC YAP, MPAC, Peaceful Families Project, Project Affinity, The Muslim Link, Zakat Foundation of America

story:
lease like us on FACE BOOK  --
 button above  -- You will help us get on the 1st Page --we are currently on page 3 ****Thanks
And please share our link !

Introducing The Award Winning:     InstaKnot

 InstaKnot – Tie is totally SEPARATE from Tie Knot.  --- 

Eg: A Red & Grey Tie with Red Tie Knot for unique, Mix N Match Option (see BELOW example)

Your Modern Day Solution for Tying a Tie Knot.  It can be MIX N Match for a unique look or Same color for Traditional look.  (InstaKnot, does not replace traditional ties).

Web site:  http://www.instaknot.com/ 

(All decesions will be made by Marcia VP/ Designer until the 3 Year old CEO grows up)


(Timothy) 3 Year old CEO .. Is the reason InstaKnot was developed. Now we are sharing the InstaKnot concept with YOU !!

I wanted to duplicate the Jennifer Aniston’s GQ Magazine cover when she wore the Tie only. So I took Timpthy to Sears photo studio, after his first out fit, I changed him into the next out fit (Tie and diaper). Then I realize I did not know, “ how to tie a tie knot”. The manager, Mercedes assisted me and the photos came out great. Few weeks later after speaking to several people, I found lots of people including men have the same issue, so I was no longer felt ashamed to admit I can not tie a tie knot. (but wait , I still do not knot how to tie a tie – but I can attach the InstaKnot for Traditional or Mix N Match Look on a Tie!

Even if you know how to make a Tie Knot, you can try it for the Mix n Match unique feature or our Special Occasion InstaKnot for a unique look or the Traditional option if you just don't want to tie a tie knot each time.

After the Campaign please visit us at ..

http://www.instaknot.com/

We received the Gold Medal Award of Merit at the 2013 Inpex Trade Show. (Largest Invention show in the USA).

Thank You

Thank you in advance for your support and coming on the InstaKnot journey, we really appreciate it!

InstaKnot is patent pending and a Registered trade mark.

After the Campaign please visit us at ..

http://www.instaknot.com/

I wanted to duplicate the Jennifer Aniston’s GQ Magazine cover when she wore the Tie only. So I took Timpthy to Sears photo studio, after his first out fit, I changed him into the next out fit (Tie and diaper). Then I realize I did not know, “ how to tie a tie knot”. The manager, Mercedes assisted me and the photos came out great. Few weeks later after speaking to several people, I found lots of people including men have the same issue, so I was no longer felt ashamed to admit I can not tie a tie knot. (but wait , I still do not knot how to tie a tie – but I can attach the InstaKnot for Traditional or Mix N Match Look on a Tie! 
Even if you know how to make a Tie Knot, you can try it for the Mix n Match unique feature or our Special Occasion InstaKnot for a unique look or the Traditional option if you just don't want to tie a tie knot each time.

After the Campaign please visit us at ..
http://www.instaknot.com/
We received the Gold Medal Award of Merit at the 2013 Inpex Trade Show. (Largest Invention show in the USA). 

Thank You


Thank you in advance for your support and coming on the InstaKnot journey, we really appreciate it!
InstaKnot is patent pending and a Registered trade mark.
After the Campaign please visit us at ..
http://www.instaknot.com/

story:
The HIDEAWAY 

 

With winter approaching, we wanted to make sure you are never be left out in the cold again. As small as a baseball and made of ripstop waterproof materials, The HIDEAWAY Jacket is a great water-resistant windbreaker at first glance, but it's SO much more. It's the jacket that's ALWAYS with you. 

The HIDEAWAY has strategically placed panels throughout the jacket are designed to accept any type of dry and light insulation: (dry leaves, newspaper, cotton and more) turning this windbreaker in to an extremely warm insulated coat, ready to shelter you from the harshest elements. 

High-vis colorway keeps you safe during the day, while reflective logos keep you seen at night. And as with all Uncharted products, helpful instructions are found on the inside of the jacket giving you all of the information you need to stay warm. Easily stick The HIDEAWAY in your car glovebox, in your purse or inside The SEVENTY2 pack. 

 

Help Us Make The World A Little Warmer 

This holiday season, we want to make a difference and we need your help.  Donate The Hideaway Jacket by backing $25 by December 15th and you’ll help warm a person in need & protect them from winter's harsh elements.  We’ve partnered with charities with the simple mission of putting 1,000 jackets on the homeless this holiday season. 

 

THE "I HAVE A NAME PROJECT"

This campaign for the Hideaway is donating jackets to "The I Have A Name Project" - a homeless art & advocacy campaign whose enduring mission endeavors to create greater understanding and compassion for the nearly 3.5 million Americans who call the street home.

In 2007, Jon Linton volunteered at a shelter to better understand the plight of those without a door to walk through at day’s end. He then began gathering imagery to document the homeless. The most poignant moment of the effort came when Linton shared a conversation with a homeless veteran and asked his name. “You have no idea how long it’s been since someone has cared to me who I am. We are the forgotten, the walking invisible.”, said Chuck Ridgeway.

In that instant the project became "I Have a Name".

Through the years the initiative has fed and clothed thousands in need, enjoyed several photographic exhibitions, published a book, developed an engaged social media following, and created a large public mural that pays remembrance to lives lost to the street. In the coming year the campaign will broaden its horizons with an expansive "Let’s Be Better Humans" movement in hopes of sparking a revolution in love and humanity. 

I Have A Name will distribute Hideaway jackets to those in need throughout 2017 and beyond.  Your donations will make a significant difference for those living on the streets.

 

Who Are We?

Uncharted Supply Co. launched our first product, The SEVENTY2 on Indiegogo & raised more than $100,000 within the first week. The SEVENTY2 is the world's smartest survival kit, with over 30 designed and curated survival tools organized by use and need, intuitive instructions and thousands of applications. It's the world's best survival kit and the one thing to add to your car, home or office to make sure you and your family are prepared for anything life throws at you.  

We’re a team of friends who’ve collectively traveled to over 125 countries.  From the top of Mt. Everest to the jungles of Bolivia to military bases in Iraq, we’ve spent time in some of the most dangerous and extreme environments in the world.

Through it all, we’ve found ourselves in more than a few difficult situations and it's these experiences that have taught us the importance of having the right tools and the proper knowledge. And because of this, we live prepared every day.

Our Company

Our goal is to build a company and create products that make the world a safer place, unite communities, and empower people to be in control.  The Seventy2 & The HIDEAWAY are just the start.  We have a pipeline of products in the works. This is the launch of our company and we are asking you to help.

Our Goal

Our goal for this campaign is to raise $10k to help The HIDEAWAY & give at least 1,000 jackets to people in need.

story:
Our Story

Our vision is to provide a solution to the prevalence of theft and robbery to ensure that when out on the go, both YOU and your belongings are safe and protected. While some manufacturers have undertaken a few anti-theft measures, they all fall short of preventing theft of the bag in its entirety, not to mention protection of the bag wearer them self.  

At this current time, we are integrating a BALLISTIC UPGRADE to the already revolutionary Eversafe backpack.  

The ballistic upgrade adds 1lb to the backpack’s total weight and is a stand-alone armor plate with multiple hit capability that is rated for up to five hits from a .44 magnum bullet and can withstand multiple hits from all pistol calibers. 

The Impact 

Safety and protection are at the forefront of our goal. Tragedy seems to strike daily, and places high in tourism are at stake.  

With the rise in burglaries, theft and mass gun shootings, we hope to achieve peace of mind for our consumers. We are striving to provide a product that, above all else, offers peace of mind. 

What We Need & What You Get

At this time, we are asking for 40K in funding in order to secure mass quantities of ballistic plates for integration.  

By funding this project, you will be among the first to get your hands on our product, including our Ballistic Insert! 

Should we not reach our full goal, all is not lost. We plan to leverage funds raised to begin mass production on a smaller scale and can ensure that we will be able to produce enough to support our generous backers. 

About The Ballistic Upgrade

Ballistic Upgrade: A level IIIA armor plates comes inserted into the back pocket of the bag, the closest point to the wearer's body. 

And reflective piping outlining the front of the backpack as well as reflective strips on the straps to ensure passing cars will see you at night. 

Safety For Your Belongings, Anywhere

Full zipper concealment using the anti-cut flap, steel cable and TSA padlock stops thieves from gaining access to the main compartment of the bag. Zipper is double-toothed to prevent puncture.

 

 
The bag can still be locked down without having access to a SafeDock.  While on-the-go you can simply use our cable locks that run through the straps of the bag and secure it around any fixed object.
 

 

Cut Resistant - Backpack is designed to resist cuts in all locations.  Hard, injection molded shell makes up back, bottom, and a portion of the sides of the backpack.  While the front features 2 flexible, cut resistant plates.  Top and sides are protected by cut resistant fabric and steel braided cable.

  

 
Inside of bag contains laptop sleeve for up to 15" laptop, and an RFID blocking pocket to protect credit cards and passports. 
 

Safe in Your Home & Car 

Docking System: Simply mount a SafeDock in your home and/or office and drop the bag on top to secure it.  In order to remove the bag, you must know the codes to get inside and use the internal pull release.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

We understand that not everybody can contribute financially. But, for those who love our product and find value in it, we encourage you to share! Indiegogo provides great share tools, and we encourage you to share the product with your social media networks!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mark Miller and I have been designing and building things all my life(40+ years). I have constructed many things electronic including robots, and all sorts of gadgets. I love designing and building things, and always will.

 This is a product that I have been wanting to produce and make for sale to the public for quite some time. I have went through several designs and modifications getting it all just right, and working out fabrication details. I want to make it available as both and kit and also as a finished product ready to use.

 Most things that I manufacture and build now are very "short" runs-a quantity of maybe 6-12 units total, and then move on to something else. They are more art pieces, than mass produced tech, but this item is an exception. I want to setup and produce as many as several hundred units, as many have expressed an interest in the product. I beleive in the product in both viability and usefulness.

 

What We Need

 In order to produce a larger volume of the fishing pole I need to aquire all the components that are not fabricated in house, including motors, electronic components, PCB boards and misc hardware. The larger quantity that I can buy, the lower the cost. I want to buy supplies for 200 units to start, which give a fantastic quantity price break, and a better margin of profits from the final product.

 The printed circuit boards will be fabricated from from a board house, and the gerber files and artwork is done, with a run of ten boards tested, verfiyed and working. The components are all readily availible and in stock from supplyers. Each PCB cost about 3.50 in lots of ten, and 2$ in 100 lots.

The cases are fabricated by me at my shop. They are produced from lexan and resin castings. Funding will pay for resin only-the lexan I already have on hand and have begun cutting to size.

 If my funding goals can not be met, I will slowly make up the difference on my own, which will take longer, but this product is worth it. I hope to build and sell the first lot and make more than enough to farm out some of the work and create a job or two for others, and continue to make more units for sale.

 The product will retail from between 30$ for the kit(DIY delight!) or 49$ ready to go with some free lures. Many folks who expressed interest in purchasing a fishing pole wanted to build it from a kit, so I am making this an option.

The Impact

 It might sound strange, but I never really liked fishing. In fact I do most of my fishing in the isles of a grocery store. But when I went out to test the pole, an amazing thing happened-I enjoyed the day(s). I even got sunburned staying out enjoying it too much. And I caught a few fish. I let the pole move the bait-It can troll, reel in and out with the flick of a switch. And it gives you something to do and fool with in addition to fishing, and waiting. Its fun. Its a gadget that is useful and serves a purpose.

 Most things I made in the past were short run, tech stuff for dedicated hobbyists. This is a mass appeal item, that people have already expressed an desire to have me make. I went through the pains of productionizing it so it can be manageably built, and now it is ready.

 Please help me make this a reality! Tell your friends whether they fish or not! Some may want one to "fish" in the office while at work(hey people golf in their office) or just want it as a conversation starter. Its a useful, feel good item.

Thank you,

Mark Miller
