story:
Bikeboards are a patent pending product created by a group of people who are tired of putting their bikes away for winter and want to ride their bikes in the snow.

A bikeboard is a bike accessory that attaches to the tire and allows you to ride your bike in snow.  Bikeboards can be carried in your backpack as you ride until you get to snowy conditions. Bikeboards can be used touring, backcountry, or in snow parks. Ride with a single board on the front and pedal for crosscountry riding or have a great adventure riding downslope with 2 boards, one on front and one on back.  What makes bikeboards great is that they are quick and easy to use on your own bike. You just pop the tire into the boot, and they are adjustable to fit any bike tire from a BMX to Fatbike. It's the creation of a new seasonal crossover product so you no longer have to put your bike away for winter. For cyclists who need to keep up their training getting out in the winter with the bikeboards is great for your endurance.  You also do not have to modify your bike.  This is not a conversion kit. Our product lets a bike remain a bike. When you are finished riding on the snow pull the tire out of the boot, put the bikeboards in a backpack and continue on your journey. 

Your first time riding you will remember what it was like to first ride your bike as you're thinking, "I'm doing it! I'm really doing it!"  It's all about a having a good time and fun.

Our vision is to see cyclists across the U.S. and worldwide enjoying their bikes year around, proving that cycling is also a winter sport, taking bikes on greater adventures.  We want to see bikeboards expand the opportunities for biking, with new races, challenges and events.

Our group is based out of Colorado.  Currently we are using our own proprietary parts and repurposed snow blades, but are working on our own custom ski that will be made in New York.  All of our other parts are built in Colorado.

story:
Shonda English...

What can we say--but thank God for the gift that he has given us. This is the motivation for my campaign for Shonda that I have started. She is my sister and friend. I also know that she is a selfless individual who works hour -after-hour, and day-after-day for others.

Here's a SHORT LIST of what she does:

Director of Music (all choirs and groups) at Greater St Paul Non-Denominational Church in Sumter, SC

Renowned Gospel Artist (who has appeared and shared stages with many great people, i.e. Shirley Caesar, Dorothy Norwood, Steve Harvey, etc.)

Performs with the Palmetto Voices (a Classically trained professional group under the tutilage of Dr. Sonja Sepulveda)


A Musical Composer,a gifted songwriter, arranger, pianist, percussionist, and vocalist.

Workshop and Conference Speaker and Director

 

...and SO MUCH MORE!!!!
____________________________________________________

We want to express our love to her by sending her off on a vacation of her choice. The deadline to give/donate is August 31st, so there is no time to waste if you would like to give.

If 50 of her friends and family can donate just 20.00, then we will make the goal of 1000.00 to send her off on a nice vacation. Of course, you can give more.

I hope you would donate today. She deserves it. Give people their flowers and appreciation while they are with us. Who knows where God will take her. She is an awesome PERSON and FRIEND to so many of us.

 

-David Simmons, Organizer


___________________________________________________

SUPPORT SHONDA BUY PURCHASING HER CD ON AMAZON.COM

“Think on These Things”

http://www.amazon.com/Think-These-Things-Shonda-English/dp/B001714VT2/ref=ntt_mus_ep_dpi_1


OR BOOK HER TODAY...

http://www.sonicbids.com/2/EPK/?epk_id=200909

story:
My name is Cassie Heward and I am a grade 10 student at Lower Canada College located in Montreal, Canada. I am a new student at this school and I was informed and intrigued by a community service program offered by LCC known as the Duke of Edinburgh program. It was developed to encourage youth ages 14 to 25 to be active, to participate in new activities and pursue their current interests in four different areas. The Program offers opportunities to set goals and achieve results in a fun and challenging way. Upon completion, participants are recognized for their achievements with a Bronze, Silver or Gold Award.

 I am currently trying to achieve my Gold award and to do so, I must complete 90 hours of community service over 18 months, be physically active for 50 hours over 25 weeks and go on an adventurous journey that meets the requirements of the program. LCC has chosen to bring us on a trip to Costa Rica. It costs 4000$ all in and I would like to try and raise the money needed on my own. I have gone door to door multiple times and worked at different events to try and raise money but I am unfortunately running out of time and I need your help. 

The trip is focused on leadership and community service. We leave the 28th of February and come back the 9 of March. We will be doing a four-day hiking trip during which we will be hiking and doing community service in every location visited. They currently need help building shelters, houses and schools, teaching children the basics of the French and English language and assistance when it comes to farming and the gathering of crops. 

The Duke of Edinburgh trips are a great way to gain in leadership skills. When i went on my Silver camping trip in October, we froze. It was -20 °C, there was snow, rain and hail. I learned that to get through these types of conditions, you had to think positively and convince yourself that you were warm. Many had a hard time being outside in these conditions but in the end, we all helped each other through it. There were times when most wanted to go home and there were always a couple people that would make us forget about where we were and what we were doing and think about the positive side of thinks. We did trust exercises and blindfolded walks through the forests at night and by the end of the trip, we all grew closer as friends and learned to appreciate a lot more what our parents have been able to offer us such as food, clothing, a home, warmth, etc.

The Costa Rica trip is a great opportunity for me to bond with students I barely know, to visit a new part of the world, to help others and hopefully, to discover a true leader in myself. If ever you cannot donate, I would truly appreciate it if you spread the word about my campaign using social media like Facebook and also, Indiegogo. 

Thank you very much for your support, 

Cassie Heward 

Je m’appelle Cassandra (Cassie) Heward et je fais ma 10e année d’études au Lower Canada College, à Montréal, Canada. Cette année est la première que je passe à ce collège et j’y ai trouvé une activité axée sur les services communautaires, le Programme du duc d’Édimbourg, qui m’a particulièrement intéressée. Ce programme a pour objet d’encourager les jeunes de 14 à 25 ans à entreprendre ou poursuivre des activités dans quatre domaines particuliers. Il les aide à définir des objectifs et à surmonter avec sérénité les obstacles rencontrés en chemin. Les participants qui le font reçoivent des prix de mérite Or, Argent et Bronze.

J’ai maintenant atteint l’étape menant au prix de mérite Or ; pour l’obtenir, je dois donner 90 heures de services communautaires en 18 mois faire 50 heures d’exercice physique en 25 semaines et participer à une expédition « d’aventure » selon la définition du programme. Le collège organise pour nous une expédition au Costa Rica qui coûte 4 000 $, tous frais compris, et je tiendrais beaucoup à recueillir moi-même cette somme. J’ai fait beaucoup de sollicitation de porte-à-porte et je n’ai manqué aucune occasion de travailler pour ramasser de l’argent mais je suis encore loin du compte ; le temps manque maintenant et j’ai besoin de votre aide.

L’expédition mettra l’accent sur le développement des aptitudes pour le leadership et sur les services communautaires. Nous partirons le 28 février et serons de retour le 9 mars. Nous ferons une randonnée pédestre de quatre jours au cours de laquelle nous offrirons nos services dans toutes les localités que nous traverserons. Les gens de la région ont besoin d’aide pour construire des abris, des maisons et des écoles ; nous nous efforcerons d’enseigner aux enfants les rudiments du français et de l’anglais et nous pourrons contribuer aux travaux des champs et aux récoltes.

Les voyages du duc d’Édimbourg contribuent beaucoup au développement des aptitudes pour le leadership. Au cours de l’expédition de camping qui m’a valu le prix de mérite  Argent, en octobre dernier, nous avons gelé. Il faisait -20° C et nous avons affronté neige, pluie et grêle. L’enseignement que j’en ai recueilli est l’importance de faire contre mauvaise fortune bon cœur et le fait qu’il est possible de se convaincre que l’on n’a pas froid !  La plupart des membres du groupe ont trouvé très dur d’être dehors par un temps pareil mais nous nous sommes mutuellement convaincus de tenir le coup avec le sourire. Beaucoup parmi nous ont à plusieurs reprises été tentés de rentrer chez eux mais il y en a toujours eu plusieurs d’assez déterminés pour nous convaincre d’oublier où nous étions et de garder notre bonne humeur. Nous avons fait des exercices pour développer notre confiance en nous, nous avons marché dans la forêt la nuit, les yeux bandés. Ces moments difficiles, traversés ensemble, nous ont appris à nous serrer les coudes et à forger de solides amitiés. Ils nous ont aussi amenés à mieux apprécier tout ce que nos parents font pour combler nos besoins… nourriture, vêtements, toit sur nos têtes, chaleur, etc.

Cette expédition au Costa Rica sera pour moi une occasion exceptionnelle de me rapprocher d’autres élèves que je connais à peine, de découvrir un nouveau coin du monde, d’aider des personnes dans le besoin et, j’espère, de renforcer mes aptitudes pour le leadership.

S’il ne vous est pas possible de faire un don, j’apprécierais vraiment que vous parliez de mon projet autour de vous et par l’entremise de médias sociaux tels que Facebook, et aussi d’Indiegogo.

Un très grand merci pour votre soutien !

Cassandra Heward
story_txt:
My name is Cassie Heward and I am a grade 10 student at Lower Canada College located in Montreal, Canada. I am a new student at this school and I was informed and intrigued by a community service program offered by LCC known as the Duke of Edinburgh program. It was developed to encourage youth ages 14 to 25 to be active, to participate in new activities and pursue their current interests in four different areas. The Program offers opportunities to set goals and achieve results in a fun and challenging way. Upon completion, participants are recognized for their achievements with a Bronze, Silver or Gold Award. I am currently trying to achieve my Gold award and to do so, I must complete 90 hours of community service over 18 months, be physically active for 50 hours over 25 weeks and go on an adventurous journey that meets the requirements of the program. LCC has chosen to bring us on a trip to Costa Rica. It costs 4000$ all in and I would like to try and raise the money needed on my own. I have gone door to door multiple times and worked at different events to try and raise money but I am unfortunately running out of time and I need your help. The trip is focused on leadership and community service. We leave the 28th of February and come back the 9 of March. We will be doing a four-day hiking trip during which we will be hiking and doing community service in every location visited. They currently need help building shelters, houses and schools, teaching children the basics of the French and English language and assistance when it comes to farming and the gathering of crops. The Duke of Edinburgh trips are a great way to gain in leadership skills. When i went on my Silver camping trip in October, we froze. It was -20 °C, there was snow, rain and hail. I learned that to get through these types of conditions, you had to think positively and convince yourself that you were warm. Many had a hard time being outside in these conditions but in the end, we all helped each other through it. There were times when most wanted to go home and there were always a couple people that would make us forget about where we were and what we were doing and think about the positive side of thinks. We did trust exercises and blindfolded walks through the forests at night and by the end of the trip, we all grew closer as friends and learned to appreciate a lot more what our parents have been able to offer us such as food, clothing, a home, warmth, etc.The Costa Rica trip is a great opportunity for me to bond with students I barely know, to visit a new part of the world, to help others and hopefully, to discover a true leader in myself. If ever you cannot donate, I would truly appreciate it if you spread the word about my campaign using social media like Facebook and also, Indiegogo. Thank you very much for your support, Cassie Heward Je m’appelle Cassandra (Cassie) Heward et je fais

story:
What We're Trying to Achieve

Every other year, hundreds of youth players send in applications to participate in tryouts for the U-19 National Teams. In the end, less than 50 players are selected based on their ability to play at the highest level. Unfortunately, sometimes these players have to make the choice not to attend the most prestigious event in the world due to cost. We want to take that factor out of the decision for every player that needs it.

  • My name is Julia Lee - I work at USA Ultimate and have been helping our National Teams with fundraising for the past few years. As I have gotten to know these players, I have made it my goal to help them in any way that I can.
  • To start, we encouraged the players to run fundraising efforts on their own in their own communities. After they went through that process, we asked them to evaluate if they needed help from USA Ultimate and the larger ultimate community. All money raised as part of this campaign goes directly to those players who asked for support.
  • Your gift means so much to these players who are only asking to play. For more information about both teams (boys and girls), please visit their website (2014 U-19 US National Teams). 
  • We'll also be showcasing individual players on both teams over the next 2 weeks during the campaign. We'll  post them as updates to the campaign so check out that tab to learn more about the awesome, goofy, friendly players that will be representing the US in Italy!

What We Need & What You Get

We've broken down the levels for costs and perks into how much various parts of the trip will cost for each player, including food, housing and transportation both at training camp at Manhattan College in Riverdale, NY (July 13-18) and at the tournament itself in Lecco, Italy (July 19-27). There are even more costs that add up too, but we wanted to highlight some of the main financial burdens that these players face.

Here is a list of the costs:

  • $25 - Shuttle to and from the airport for training camp, as well as additional transportation as needed during the week.
  • $50 - Shuttle to and from the airport at the World Junior Ultimate Championships in Italy (Milan to Lecco and back). Fortunately, shuttle service to and from the fields during the tournament are included as part of individual player fees (112 Euros each or about $150 USD).
  • $100 - Meals in the dorms during training camp.
  • $200 - Housing in the dorms during training camp.
  • $300 - Housing in the dorms during the World Junior Ultimate Championships (30 Euros per night for 8 nights - at the current exchange rate, that's about $38  USD per night).
  • $500 - Flight to training camp in Riverdale, NY and then back home after the World Junior Ultimate Championships (average cost for airfare per player, depending on their location).
  • $1,500 - Flight to and from the World Junior Ultimate Championships in Lecco, Italy (the teams are flying directly from training camp in New York to Milan, the closest airport to the tournament).

Fortunately, we have great sponsors like Five Ultimate who supplies the players and coaches with jerseys, shorts, warm ups and more! We cannot thank them enough for all of their support! We also want to give a huge thank you to our affiliate, DiscNY, for their help securing and paying for the fields that the teams will be using in NYC during training camp! One less cost on a list of many.

Here is a list of our perks:

  • $25 Level - National Team prize pack
  • $50 Level - White Flexfit embroidered hat from Five Ultimate and a National Team prize pack
  • $100 Level - Light Grey National Team Daywalker Hoodie (sweet new lightweight long sleeve in the same material as the Hydro shorts!) from Five Ultimate and a National Team prize pack
  • $200 Level - NEW for 2014! Red National Team Jersey from Five Ultimate and a National Team prize pack
  • $300 Level - Limited Edition National Team bag from Five Ultimate and a National Team prize pack
  • $500 Level - NEW Red National Team Jersey and Light Grey National Team Daywalker Hoodie (sweet new lightweight long sleeve in the same material as the Hydro shorts!), both from Five Ultimate, and a National Team prize pack. In addition, your white National Team logo disc from Discraft will be signed by the players and coaches!
  • $1,500 Level - You're a member of the team! All of the above perks, including a Limited Edition National Team bag from Five Ultimate, a NEW Red National Team Jersey from Five Ultimate, a Light Grey National Team Daywalker Hoodie (sweet new lightweight long sleeve in the same material as the Hydro shorts!) from Five Ultimate, a White Flexfit embroidered hat from Five Ultimate and a National Team prize pack. Your white National Team logo disc from Discraft will also be signed by the players and coaches!

All perks include a National Team prize pack, featuring a white National Team logo disc from Discraft, a thank you note signed by the players and coaches, and a few surprises!

In addition, ALL contributions to this campaign are deductible to the fullest extent allowed by law (USA Ultimate is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization). 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you are not in a position to give, please help us out by sharing this campaign with others. We appreciate your support!


    Cover photo by Tino Tran from day 1 of competition at the 2014 World Junior Ultimate Championships.

    Thank you to Tino Tran for allowing us to share the link to his compilation of photos and quotes from the West Coast Tryout Camp.

story:
Finally, a bike light that lets you see it all. With beyond 180° degree illumination you'll see more and help other to see you better. With 4 way illumination you get the long range front lighting you're already used to having with a bike light, plus full side to side peripheral visibility and downward ground lighting. 

Not your typical bike light. Safer for you and for others. With the expanded range of illumination you will not be limited to a single spot light of visibility. See everything in your side to side peripheral and the below you. That also helps make you more visible to everyone around you. 

Questionable weather won't stop you from seeing what you need to see. The One80 Bike Light is waterproof so you can set out on any ride with confidence that the rain won't stop you.  

There is nothing worse than a battery running out when you need it most. That's why we've made the battery removable. Keep a back up on hand and swap it out as need  - quick and easy. 

Risks and challenges

This is our 3nd Crowdfunding Campaign, so we are familiar with the process and have learned much from our first 2 experience. With that in mind we are not naive enough to believe we have it all figured out, and keep our perspectives alert and open to the potential of unplanned changes through this process. From what we learned, we've done everything possible to streamline the process on our end. We are working with the same trusted manufacturer on this project that we've worked with over the past 3 years. We’ve set a delivery date that is real and attainable to ensure an on time delivery or early delivery; even in the case that something unexpected occurs. Regardless, we’ll work to keep all backers aware of changes or challenges if/as they happen.

story:
The easiest and by far most elegant folding furniture. Featuring a unique ergonomic design that saves space and is easy to set up, the Sofi Folding Lounger is your solution to enjoying those beautiful summer days where and when you want. And because its weather-resistant, UV, and fad protected, you know that you’ll be able to use it time and time again.

Most lounge chairs are difficult to move and take up so much of your home’s space. Whenever you want to enjoy the sun or catch up on your reading, they flip over and move if you lean on them the wrong way.

If you live in an apartment or have a crowded balcony you can have similar issues as well. Constantly having to maneuver large bulky patio furniture on and off of the balcony based on the weather is a hassle that no one wants to deal with. Stop wasting time and energy!

With the Sofi Folding Lounger you can finally have a modern, space saving, and stress free solution to that old furniture problem.

The Sofi Folding Loungers ergonomic shape adds to its unique construction. Using tension ropes with anchors attached, the Sofi Folding Lounge can be mounted quickly when you need it and rolls up easily when you don’t!

The mounting is quite simple: Remove Sofi Folding Lounger from the handy carrying case, roll out the lounger in front of you, fold up the left and right side, fix the sides with the both lashing straps and flip it over. Throw on the cushions and you are ready to relax!

Sofi Folding Lounger is light enough for anyone to move and can be set up within a few minutes. The sleek and elegant easy to construct design of Sofi Folding Lounger add a Modern touch to any home. Relax in style and Comfort with the Sofie Lounger!

Designed by a master carpenter, The Sofi Folding Lounger is expertly crafted from high quality polished birchwood. An extremely hard wearing PVC-truck tarpaulin gives the Sofi Folding Lounger a unique naturalness that makes it especially resistant to environmental influences. The Sofi Folding Lounger is also enhanced with durable UV protected material that prevents sun and weather damage.

The Sofi Folding Lounger is the perfect solution to getting the most out of sunny days! The easy to carry and fast set up of Sofi Folding Lounger is made simple by its one-of-a-kind ergonomic design that goes with you anywhere and everywhere. Don't miss those days at the park soaking up the sun with friends because your furniture doesn't come with you! Don't keep yourself inside all day because your patio furniture just isn't comfortable! With Sofi Folding Lounger you can have a comfortable and cushioned piece of furniture that is stylish in and out of your house! Take back your sunny days with Sofi Folding Lounger!

 

The Sofi Lounger is made from specially polished birchwood that is soft, safe and durable. It is light enough for anyone to be able to move, fold, and roll. This gives the Sofi Folding Lounger an incredible set time of under 2 minutes! The design coupled with the beautiful polished birchwood and weather resistant Decor Nubuk futon topper adds a beautiful and comfortable touch to any home, patio, or balcony!

This lounger is truly like no other! When not being used as a relaxing chair or a stunning piece of decor, Sofi Folding Lounger can be unfolded and rolled flat to store under a bed or in a closet in no time at all! We’ve even included a special DuPont Tyvek material made bag with drawstring that makes storing easier!

The Sofi Folding Lounger draws its inspiration from a tambour. Traditionally the tambour, a flexible surface made of woods slats adhered to a textile canvas, is used in roll top desks. We were inspired by the unique movement and shapeshifting abilities and thus created the most innovative reclining chair on the market, The Sofi Lounger!

Go outside and enjoy the sun whenever there is nice weather and avoid the hassle of moving bulky furniture. Take Sofi Folding Lounger out for any occasion and then put it back the second you are done.

Enjoy world class comfort on the therapeutic Decor Nubuk cushion in minutes while you relax the day away in style!

The Sofi also features a removable side pocket so you can keep your valuables safe when you are outside, or, attach it indoors as handy storage for books, phones, glasses, and remotes. Keep yourself warm and your items protected with the Sofi Folding Lounger!

 

Discover the advantages of changing your home’s layout on a whim in minutes. Create exquisite lounge space for parties or events or set up Sofi Folding Lounge so you can sunbathe in that perfect corner with a book. Remember, when you don't need the Sofi, you can fold it flat and roll it up for easy storage in minutes! The Sofi Folding Lounge will add flair and style to any room with its polished birchwood finish and it unique ergonomic shape.

Add a touch of modern European elegance and design to your apartment, home, condo, patio, gazebo, front yard, back yard, or balcony with The Sofi Folding Lounger. 

The Sofi Folding Lounger is a must have for homes and business. With its polished birchwood finish and sleek ergonomic design it looks great indoors and adds a touch of style to any room. Because the Sofi Folding Chair is enhanced with PVC materials that add a UV and fade resistant quality, so you know that it will hold up to weather, use, and mobility.

The Sofi Folding Lounger isn't just designed for style. Its advanced ergonomic shape and hiqh quality construction give a robust area for lounging. With lumbar supporting contours and cushions, Sofi Folding Lounge is perfect for short breaks and long naps!

It not hard to see how our emphasis on sharp design and unparalleled comfort make the Sofi Folding Lounger both an environmentally friendly and state-of-the-art piece of furniture. Say yes to The Sofi and start relaxing today!

The best thing about the Sofi Folding Lounger is the money you save when you purchase it. Take a look at the cost for renting a sunbed below:

Sunbed Rental 1 Day = 15$

At that price, renting a sunbed or patio furniture to enjoy the great weather can cost an arm and a leg. For a two week rental you could be paying over $200! That is a steep price to pay to enjoy the sun for a handful of times. The Sofi Folding Lounger is priced at $149 saving you money all summer long! After two weeks the Sofi Folding Lounger has paid for itself!

 

“As a master carpenter I had to invent some exciting new engineering processes along the way and reinvented the relaxing furniture. I think there’s a better way to rest and so almost everything about our longer is different. The Sofi lounger is the most sophisticated relaxing deck-chair in the world and the simplest.” - Valdis Pauls (Master Carpenter).

 

Risks and challenges

The world makes making stuff look easy. But manufacturing a highly engineered kinetic object at scale is complex and requires a trusted team, vetted vendors, and a fastidious grasp of the product (if one aspires to quality and safety, at least).

Challenges and unforeseen obstacles can always arise when trying to introduce a new product. There is simply so much to manage at times. However, we are confident in our abilities, knowledge, and work ethic to get the job done right. We believe in being completely transparent with our backers. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile. Thank you so much for your support and for believing in us!
story_txt: The easiest and by far most elegant folding furniture. Featuring a unique ergonomic design that saves space and is easy to set up, the Sofi Folding Lounger is your solution to enjoying those beautiful summer days where and when you want. And because its weather-resistant, UV, and fad protected, you know that you’ll be able to use it time and time again.Most lounge chairs are difficult to move and take up so much of your home’s space. Whenever you want to enjoy the sun or catch up on your reading, they flip over and move if you lean on them the wrong way.If you live in an apartment or have a crowded balcony you can have similar issues as well. Constantly having to maneuver large bulky patio furniture on and off of the balcony based on the weather is a hassle that no one wants to deal with. Stop wasting time and energy!With the Sofi Folding Lounger you can finally have a modern, space saving, and stress free solution to that old furniture problem.The Sofi Folding Loungers ergonomic shape adds to its unique construction. Using tension ropes with anchors attached, the Sofi Folding Lounge can be mounted quickly when you need it and rolls up easily when you don’t!The mounting is quite simple: Remove Sofi Folding Lounger from the handy carrying case, roll out the lounger in front of you, fold up the left and right side, fix the sides with the both lashing straps and flip it over. Throw on the cushions and you are ready to relax!Sofi Folding Lounger is light enough for anyone to move and can be set up within a few minutes. The sleek and elegant easy to construct design of Sofi Folding Lounger add a Modern touch to any home. Relax in style and Comfort with the Sofie Lounger!Designed by a master carpenter, The Sofi Folding Lounger is expertly crafted from high quality polished birchwood. An extremely hard wearing PVC-truck tarpaulin gives the Sofi Folding Lounger a unique naturalness that makes it especially resistant to environmental influences. The Sofi Folding Lounger is also enhanced with durable UV protected material that prevents sun and weather damage.The Sofi Folding Lounger is the perfect solution to getting the most out of sunny days! The easy to carry and fast set up of Sofi Folding Lounger is made simple by its one-of-a-kind ergonomic design that goes with you anywhere and everywhere. Don't miss those days at the park soaking up the sun with friends because your furniture doesn't come with you! Don't keep yourself inside all day because your patio furniture just isn't comfortable! With Sofi Folding Lounger you can have a comfortable and cushioned piece of furniture that is stylish in and out of your house! Take back your sunny days with Sofi Folding Lounger! The Sofi Lounger is made from specially polished birchwood that is soft, safe and durable. It is light enough for anyone to be able to move, fold, and roll. This gives the Sofi Folding Lounger an incredible set time of under 2 minutes! The design coupled with the beautiful polished birchwood and weather resistant Decor Nubuk futon topper adds a beautiful and comfortable touch to any home, patio, or balcony!This lounger is truly like no other! When not being used as a relaxing chair or a stunning piece of decor, Sofi Folding Lounger can be unfolded and rolled flat to store under a bed or in a closet in no time at all! We’ve even included a special DuPont Tyvek material made bag with drawstring that makes storing easier!The Sofi Folding Lounger draws its inspiration from a tambour. Traditionally the tambour, a flexible surface made of woods slats adhered to a textile canvas, is used in roll top desks. We were inspired by the unique movement and shapeshifting abilities and thus created the most innovative reclining chair on the market, The Sofi Lounger!Go outside and enjoy the sun whenever there is nice weather and avoid the hassle of moving bulky furniture. Take Sofi Folding Lounger out for any occasion and then put it back the second you are done.Enjoy world class comfort on the therapeutic Decor Nubuk cushion in minutes while you relax the day away in style!The Sofi also features a removable side pocket so you can keep your valuables safe when you are outside, or, attach it indoors as handy storage for books, phones, glasses, and remotes. Keep yourself warm and your items protected with the Sofi Folding Lounger! Discover the advantages of changing your home’s layout on a whim in minutes. Create exquisite lounge space for parties or events or set up Sofi Folding Lounge so you can sunbathe in that perfect corner with a book. Remember, when you don't need the Sofi, you can fold it flat and roll it up for easy storage in minutes! The Sofi Folding Lounge will add flair and style to any room with its polished birchwood finish and it unique ergonomic shape.Add a touch of modern European elegance and design to your apartment, home, condo, patio, gazebo, front yard, back yard, or balcony with The Sofi Folding Lounger. The Sofi Folding Lounger is a must have for homes and business. With its polished birchwood finish and sleek ergonomic design it looks great indoors and adds a touch of style to any room. Because the Sofi Folding Chair is enhanced with PVC materials that add a UV and fade resistant quality, so you know that it will hold up to weather, use, and mobility.The Sofi Folding Lounger isn't just designed for style. Its advanced ergonomic shape and hiqh quality construction give a robust area for lounging. With lumbar supporting contours and cushions, Sofi Folding Lounge is perfect for short breaks and long naps!It not hard to see how our emphasis on sharp design and unparalleled comfort make the Sofi Folding Lounger both an environmentally friendly and state-of-the-art piece of furniture. Say yes to The Sofi and start relaxing today!The best thing about the Sofi Folding Lounger is the money you save when you purchase it. Take a look at the cost for renting a sunbed below:Sunbed Rental 1 Day = 15$At that price, renting a sunbed or patio furniture to enjoy the great weather can cost an arm and a leg. For a two week rental you could be paying over $200! That is a steep price to pay to enjoy the sun for a handful of times. The Sofi Folding Lounger is priced at $149 saving you money all summer long! After two weeks the Sofi Folding Lounger has paid for itself! “As a master carpenter I had to invent some exciting new engineering processes along the way and reinvented the relaxing furniture. I think there’s a better way to rest and so almost everything about our longer is different. The Sofi lounger is the most sophisticated relaxing deck-chair in the world and the simplest.” - Valdis Pauls (Master Carpenter). Risks and challengesThe world makes making stuff look easy. But manufacturing a highly engineered kinetic object at scale is complex and requires a trusted team, vetted vendors, and a fastidious grasp of the product (if one aspires to quality and safety, at least).Challenges and unforeseen obstacles can always arise when trying to introduce a new product. There is simply so much to manage at times. However, we are confident in our abilities, knowledge, and work ethic to get the job done right. We believe in being completely transparent with our backers. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile. Thank you so much for your support and for believing in us!

story:
Meet MyCanoe POP!

14.5-foot canoe that weighs just 50 pounds, folds into a 3-foot carrying case, and takes just 5 minutes to assemble. 

 

 

Check out the video below to see just how easy it is to assemble MyCanoe POP

 
Designed for every type of paddler, POP allows for easy transition in and out of the water and has built-in keels on the bow and stern for improved stability and tracking – which benefits even the least experienced adventurer. 

 

Canoes are a great way to enjoy the outdoors from a unique vantage point - on your own, with a friend, or with your dogs. Unfortunately, canoes can be hard to transport and store, simply because of their size.

MyCanoe POP solves for that. It is a two-person, 50-pound, 14-foot canoe that folds and unfolds like origami in a matter of minutes. It comes with two seats and a carrying case, which doubles as the canoe floor.

 

 

 

Intense research, planning, testing and design went into POP and it’s carrying case. The case itself becomes the canoe’s floor, adding structural support.

Each MyCanoe POP is made entirely of marine-grade UV-treated custom double-layer polypropylene composite which is able to withstand 20,000 fold cycles. Even with daily canoe outings, the folded segments were constructed to last over 10 years.

 

With an already successful Kickstarter campaign under our belt, we’re ready to bring you the new and improved version of MyCanoe - POP.  We currently have over 1,000 happy MyCanoe owners and couldn't be more excited to now launch our new POP directly to you.

 

 

Check out MyCanoe in Action:

 

"The benefits of having a light folding canoe are tremendous, the more time you paddle the MyCanoe, the more you appreciate them." See full review here.
 
*MyCanoe group outing
 

What others are saying about MyCanoe:

 

 

We’ve developed MyCanoe POP based on the previous MyCanoe model and then kicked it up a notch with many game-changing improvements that paddlers will appreciate.

 

So what makes MyCanoe POP so unique?

Simple & Fast Set-Up.

We’ve reduced the assembly time for MyCanoe POP to 5 minutes so you can spend less time on land, and more time exploring. The lightweight polypropylene (PP) composite is engineered for optimum flexibility and strength to support frequent assembly and withstand various usage options. 

Thanks to the origami folding technique, POP can be stored in your closet, garage or under your bed and can be transported in the back of a small sedan, instead of attached to your car roof.

POP takes just 5 minutes to assemble and 3 minutes to disassemble.  We even eliminated cumbersome metal rods and accessory bags for a seamless experience.

It's as simple as 1 - 2 - 3 ...  

 

Tight Tracking & Stability

The deep 7.6-inch keel greatly enhances stability and tracking to allow POP to glide smoothly when paddling. And the broad bottom improves stability in rough waters. 

 

New Improved Seats

Our POP seats are secure, sturdy and even allow you to kneel while paddling.

 

 

POP Extras

We've listened to customer feedback and maximized POP performance for all types of trips and adventures. That translates to added storage for camping & fishing gear and oarlocks that turn POP into a rowing boat. Available add-ons include rowing kit, stabilizer kit, and paddle.

 

Check out MyCanoe rowing:

 
 
In addition to the above highly respected media sources, MyCanoe has received several awards including Core 77 Design Award, Boat of the Year (International Boat & Sailing Expo), Top 5 Innovative Product Award (GK International Boat Show), Coolest Gear of the Show (the Paddle Expo), Good Design Award and Top Products (Boating Industry) and many other honors for design and ingenuity.
 
  • Read what Paddling Magazine is saying about POP.
  • Read a Field Test review by Canoe & Kayak.

 

 

Q. How do I care for MyCanoe POP?

A. We recommend treating your MyCanoe POP as you would a fiberglass, wood, or skin-on-frame canoe: don’t drag it or bump into sharp things, store out of direct sunlight, and rinse the canoe thoroughly with fresh water after each use.

Q. How stable is a MyCanoe POP?

A. MyCanoe POP is quite stable and difficult to capsize. However, we recommend that inexperienced paddlers go with a companion, and don't attempt to use POP in conditions beyond their skill level.

Q. Does POP float?

A. Yes, the POP is buoyant and will float even if it capsizes. However, we recommend taking every safety precaution, including personal flotation devices and equipping bow and stern with floating bags.

Q. Will repeated folding weaken the hull?

A. The body of POP is manufacturer rated for 20,000 fold cycles - that's a lot of folds!

Q. Can I take POP on a plane?

A. Yes, POP can be checked as luggage, and the best way to protect POP during transport is to cover with a protective material (e.g. blanket).

Q. Can It Be Used For Fishing?

A. Yes. With minor modifications POP can be outfitted with a rod holder. Another great choice for outfitting your POP is with one of RAM's mounts— RAM Mounts makes a Tough Claw, that works perfectly on the POP. Clamps down tight without drilling any holes, and you can then attach a rod holder, or cup holder,camera mount, fish finder, etc. The RAM Mount can then be paired with a YakAttack or RAM rod holder. We recommend a stabilizer kit for added stability when fishing.

Q. Can I attach a trolling motor to the MyCanoe POP?

A. Yes. We recommend a small lightweight motor to properly protect the hull and gunwales from damage. You will need either a DIY mount (e.g., see YouTube) or buy one from online - search for "Canoe trolling motor mount".

Q. Can I take MyCanoe POP in salt water?

A. Salt water will not damage POP. Just make sure to rinse the inside and outside of the hull, all joints, parts and accessories after each use. Dry before folding.

Q. What if I hit a rock?

A. Avoid rocks. However, if you do hit one, you and your POP should be fine. We’ve tested it on rocky beaches and even attempted to crack the hull with a hammer.

Q. What if I made a hole?

A. While the hull is extremely durable and unlikely to get a hole, if that happened, simply contact us for a free repair kit.

Q. Can I store MyCanoe POP as assembled for an extended period?

A. Yes. POP can be stored either assembled or folded for months. Just avoid direct sun exposure and store in dry, cool storage space.

Q. Can I setup sailing rig with MyCanoe POP?

A. Yes. As long as you can find correct hardware (clamps, support, hooks, etc.), MyCanoe should be fun with a light sailing set up.

Q. What are the buckles & straps on the inside of canoe for?

A. You need to buckle them to give a proper tension and shape of canoe.

Q. Are there different colors to choose from?

A. No. MyCanoe POP will be available with only one color - white w/ aqua blue print.

Q. Does paddle float?

A. Yes, MyCanoe paddles are buoyant and will float.

Q. How do I attach stabilizers and rowing kit?

A. Your package will have instructions and we will have videos in near future.

 For more information, visit our FAQ at the top of the page.

story:
Lets Bring the kingdom together!

 

We are a passionate group of young people also known as 'the A team' from Discovery Church who have the call of God on our lives to go on a two week mission trip to India in January 2014, for the purpose of spreading the gospel and bringing the Kingdom of God to earth.

We have been praying and participating in training together in different aspects of using our spiritual gifts, including prophesy, testimony and soaking in the presence of God for the purpose of being able to overflow with the Holy Spirit and see many people baptized in the spirit and have real encounters with God. We will be travelling to villages and cities around the south of India as a team, partnering with local pastors through an outreach ministry called C.O.M (Christian Outreach Ministries).  

We would love you to join with us in making this happen, by donating to our cause generously, as we cant do it on our own, but in partnership with others and with God, anything is possible. We need the money simply to pay for the expenses of the trip, as not all of us are in a place to support ourselves, but together we feel that we can really make a difference in the lives of the many people we will be ministering to, and the value of each person being there is paramount. It will go directly into a trip account, with every bit of it contributing to things such as accommodation, food and travel expenses.

You can also help by praying for us, which would be amazing, that God would go with us and that we would be protected and supported both in the lead up to the trip and while we are away.

Thankyou so much for getting on-board and being involved in something that is so much bigger and more important than we can even imagine, I'm confident that you will be blessed because of it.

story:
The Magellan vacuum bags allow you to neatly pack your belongings into the luggage case, and protect them from moisture and odors. Thanks to its special triple valve, it’s extremely easy to pump the air out the bag, and the compressed zipper won’t let it get back in - the vacuum seal lasts up to 45 days.

Every traveler knows that there are two states when packing up:

Looks familiar? Tired of bouncing on your bags to make them close? We have the solution - with Magellan, you’ll pack all your luggage easily, quickly and neatly, without the extra stress and effort.

One Magellan bag easily fits 7 M-sized men’s t-shirts, a pair of pants and shorts. 2-3 Magellan bags and all your luggage is packed! 

Thanks to its special turbo-valve and optimal design, the Magellan allows you to remove practically all air from the bag in just a few seconds. By using our bags, you'll be able to pack thrice the number of goods than before! 

The main problem with ordinary vacuum bags is that they let the air in from the start, and just a few days later, there's no trace of "vacuum" left. We've solved this problem by designing new clasps that reliably keep the air out at least for 45 days. And the bag is made of antibacterial materials that protect clothing from mold and prevent foul odors.

Cheap plastic bags make up ordinary vacuum bags that tear even from careful use. For Magellan bags, we are using specialized, extra sturdy materials - your bag will serve for many years.

Pack your clothes in the bag, fasten the edges using the plastic clasps, close the zipper and pump the air out using a special turbo-valve in just 5 seconds! The whole process takes no longer than half a minute - it's so easy, even a child can do it!

If you pack your clothing into the luggage case without any protection, they'll quickly end up wrinkled from vibrations. Vacuum seals compress clothes, so most of the vibration is absorbed by the vacuum bag itself, while clothing remains in perfect order.

No spare space in the closet? Bedclothes, blankets, pillows and clothes that you rarely use start smelling? The Magellan packing bags solve these problems - they’re perfect for packing even relatively large items!

The story of Magellan began a few years ago when I was packing for a trip and attempted to stuff a lot of necessary and important goods into a small carry on suitcase.

Initially, I had the idea of lightweight compression cubes. I tried multiple samples from various factories, came up with my design and tested them on my trips.

 I was certain that this would be my product until I saw the vacuum bags that my mother bought to pack her pillows and blankets, which she's got plenty of.

 That was the moment I realized they would be a lot more effective and compact than even the thinnest packing cubes I could produce. 

So imagine my disappointment when I received several samples, and they all turned out terrible! Some kept vacuum for just a couple hours, others had their locks open from slightest touch, and one held vacuum for a while without issues, but I couldn't get the air out even after pushing with all my weight.

 Having samples from every possible factory and knowledge of industrial design, I began experimenting and testing.

 The most complicated and time-consuming task was to design a high-quality valve. Magellan's valve keeps the air out perfectly, and even a minor can use it effortlessly!

I have also used the highest quality and sturdiest material.

Having partaken in design courses, I came up with the Magellan's style myself and gave it a spirit of travel.

 Many of my friends have already put the Magellan's durability to the test on various trips (2-10 hours long flights), and they all were very happy with the results and asked for more bags.

This is how I've managed to design top quality vacuum bags for travel.

 At the sampling and production stage, I've selected the highest quality and most communicative factory with excellent English skills. 

I really need your help to launch the Magellan's first batch of mass production. Thank you very much!

Having partaken in design courses, I came up with the Magellan's style myself and gave it a spirit of travel.

 Many of my friends have already put the Magellan's durability to the test on various trips (2-10 hours long flights), and they all were very happy with the results and asked for more bags.
This is how I've managed to design top quality vacuum bags for travel. At the sampling and production stage, I've selected the highest quality and most communicative factory with excellent English skills. 



I really need your help to launch the Magellan's first batch of mass production. Thank you very much!

story:
Grade 5 Titanium Mini Tool: CHIX

CHIX is a simple, handy, versatile keyring tool made of the world's strongest metal: Grade 5 Titanium. It acts as an opener, a pry, a screwdriver, a bit or even a spanner and keeps you from using and breaking your keys. CHIX only weighs five grams (0.17 oz), but it is stronger than you can imagine!​

A simple, handy versatile keyring tool​!

This handy little tool helps save you from using (and damaging) your keys or a pocket knife for things they aren't meant to do. It is especially useful when you don't have access to a full-sized tool and you want to maintain a low-pocket profile.

Designed to be smaller than your fingers. Pretty handy!

Practical Daily Uses

 Acts as both a flathead and a six angle screwdriver.

Opens can lids easily!

Opens packages.

Use for light-duty prying.

Works as a spanner. 

Opens bottles.

Made of Solid Ti6Al4V Grade 5 aerospace Titanium. 

EDM construction with precision from a single piece of Titanium. Sandblast finish.

39 x 14.5 x 2.6mm. Weighs only five grams (0.17 oz).

Pledge now and help us bring the CHIX Mini Tool to life!

story:
Let's get light where it's needed and make sure that no one is left in the dark again.  

20% of your purchase will go towards providing free Solar Lanterns for people affected by worldwide disasters & refugees.   

We will also donate another 1,000 Inflatable Solar Lights if our campaign reaches $200,000.

Choose from 4 different solar lighting products for yourself:

This July 4 is a day for celebrating and lighting up the skies.  And yet, somewhere out there, huge numbers of people are left in the dark when the sun goes down; due to disasters - natural or man-made.  Blackouts, power outages, evacuations - that's not our problem, right? 

My name is Douglas.  Last summer,  we had no power in New York for just a few days of darkness and dead phones.  For my family, that was inconvenient and a little scary, but it made me think about the suffering of other people here in the USA, and the refugees in other lands.  So we started Lights for Humanity * with the mission of providing free off-grid (solar powered) lights and power to people in-need. 

We know that many campaigns have given out solar lamps already, but we wanted to carefully research until we found the perfect one - a Solar Lantern + Phone Charger made for emergencies and disasters. 

For some people, their phones are their lifeline and keeping them charged is critical to their survival. 


The waterproof bottle keeps valuables safe and dry. 



It's bright enough for indoors and outdoors, and lasts up to 20 hours per charge.



Hang it to light up a tent or carry to light up a path.



Perks Available

(20% of your purchase will go towards providing free Solar Lanterns for people affected by worldwide disasters).  These perks will start shipping within 14 days after the campaign ends and the funds are transferred to us. 

Foldable Solar Lantern with Phone Charger $28

It Lights, Folds, Charges, and Stores; and is a must have for camping, hiking, fishing, emergencies.  Recharges via solar panel or USB Input - and charges phones too. 

Solar Lightbulb $18

The photovoltaic solar panel can be fixed on the roof or a place with sufficient sunlight, and the power cord is plugged in the charging port of the light bulb (a USB 5V charger can be used for charging as well).  The lightbulb can be hung from the metal hook or carried around.

Solar Power Bank + Flashlight $30

10 in 1 Solar Flashlight + Phone Charger + Rescue Tool $38


 

20% of your purchase will go towards providing free Foldable Solar Lanterns and we will also donate another 1,000 Inflatable Solar Lights if our campaign reaches $200,000.

We will purchase and warehouse the Foldable Solar Lanterns to be ready to ship as soon as they are needed, instead of waiting weeks and months to raise the funds and then purchase them AFTER disaster strikes.  The labor will be provided by our staff on a volunteer basis. 

What We Will Do
We will get them to the people who need them either directly ourselves or through local governmental or relief organizations.  That means that if Puerto Rico or another place in America needs them for light and power, we will have them delivered to a distribution partner or set up ourselves there.  We have already contacted Boys and Girls Clubs in Puerto Rico as the first go to option. 

With refugees, we will work with NGO's that are already on the ground there.  Unfortunately,  the list of refugees is rather long:

Here is a list of the top four countries of origin that account for the most refugees in the world today.

Syria — 6.3 million refugees. ...
Afghanistan — 2.6 million refugees. ...
South Sudan — 2.4 million refugees. ...
Myanmar – 1.2 million refugees. ...

What Makes Us Qualified
I am the father of two young boys, so I know how it feels when they are scared; although I cannot even imagine what the people in Puerto Rico suffered through or refugees are struggling with.  So all I can do to help now is make sure that no one is left in the dark again.  As the logistics manager of an importer, I have overseen the shipment of several thousand orders so we are well prepared to handle the process here.  

What You Can Do to Help
If you can contribute even $1, that's great.  If not, please share our campaign with your friends and family.  Either way, we appreciate you taking the time to look this over.

Transparency

This campaign is 3 days because hurricane season is already here, and we need to get started right away.  

Sponsors We Want to Thank:

BookVIP.com for providing free luxury resort stay (Mexico, Las Vegas, Orlando) vouchers to all our donors in the USA and Canada - just leave a comment of where you'd like to go.

ViVeH2O.com for providing free warehouse space and shipping support

story:
World’s smartest modular padlock.

How to fully enjoy life? Being carefree! That’s why we have created the smartest lock ever designed. 360lock is a smart, modular padlock. It’s fully customizable using the same technological core and it can be adapted to everyday action.

All in One!

Stop buying different locks for different scenarios. Now it’s time to go green! With one core, you can have multiple applications. It’s a universal solution for all your possible needs. You can use it as a standard padlock or you can plug our accessories: for locking your bike or keep your small objects safe!
 
 
 
 
 

HOW IT WORKS

360lock is smart! You can lock it and unlock it wireless through:  

  • our dedicated app for Android and iOS (Bluetooth 4.0) for smart phones and watches;
  • RFID/NFC wristband;
  • RFID/NFC tag;

Beyond free

We know you want to have complete control: through the app you’ll be able to check the logs of your lock and to share the access with your colleagues, guests or clients!

 

Topnotch specifics

 

360lock is sophisticated and designed for the best experience. 

Strong and resistant. The shackle is made of hardened steel and the body of aluminium alloy specific for smartlocks. 

Water and dust proof. We wanted a full protection from atmosferic agents, so no sand or water will ever be able to make its way inside the lock! IP65.

Long-lasting Battery. We guarantee over 1000 openings and closings. You can check the status on a LED light on the lock or through the app and then simply charge it by USB. 

Double Antenna. The device can be used by BLE 4.0 and RFID depending on the specific needs to use it by mobile app or smart card/key.

Blockchain integration. Thanks to a Blockchain system and advanced crypto codes the level of security is maximum: the lock is completely hacking proof and the operation will be certified on Ethereum!

Ethereum Blockchain, Incorruptibility and Certification

The cloud platform introduce a certification of the activities supported by the blockchain Ethereum. Locking/unlocking, sharing, introduction of new NFC Keys. The smart contract that we have developed permits to publish all the activities done by the users to guarantee it’s consistency and incorruptibility. The data are encrypted and the privacy of users is guaranteed as well and the communication protocol is supported by a tamperproof engineering.

Keywords: Modular and Convenient  

You buy one core and you get multiple applications! It’s a universal solution for all your possible needs.

Module#1 – The classic lock. You can use it everyday as a standard lock with remote sharing features. It’s simply smarter! ;)

 

Module#2 – The Security Case. You want to keep safe your phone while surfing? Or you just want to store the keys for your AirBnb apartment? You can do that with our Keycase: all your small belongings – credit cards, wallet, car keys – will be safe.

 

Module#3 – The Folding Bike Lock. The bike accessory is foldable, durable and it can be used both with bicycles and motorbikes.

 

Accessories included

Inside every 360Lock bundles you will find:

Weights

Lock: 310gr
Case: 310 gr
Folding Bike: 760gr

Development

We started from scratch, we studied and iterated the project till perfection. And finally we brought our dream all the way to the other side of the world, at the site for mass production engineering.

Now everything’s done: the molds are ready and tested, and 360lock is about to take off! We are ready to launch the production.

Rewards

Add-ons

Pledge a little extras and personalize your 360 Lock! *Laser Watermark and Woodland Paint may be performed on the same piece (just add 35€ + 40€ to the pledge and point it out on notes when campaign ends!)

 

Coming soon extension module

The project will be empowered with a further extension module. The LTE alarm module will guarantee an higher safety standard due to its movement detection system and GPS. As soon as any hacking attempt comes, the module will send an alert by the SIM Card to the mobile numbers put in the app. The module will be also provided with a loud alarm system to discourage robbers. The module can be used stand alone or on doors or on cars or on any other place where unexpected movements have to be detected and communicated.

 

Dimensions

 

Supported Devices

Android App is already available:   

Download Android App from "Google Play"

 

Team

We are 4storm, a team of engineers and designers. As entrepreneurs we feel the responsability of improving our experience of life and we’ve always wanted to create products that enhance the way we interact with everything we love.

That’s why 360lock is born. We are professionals and we won’t let you down: if you support us, we’ll deliver to you the smartest locking device in the world.

story:
Introducing The Duffle Backpack Set

Like our last creation, we at Wool & Oak set out to completely overhaul every function and design element of the modern backpack. The result is an interchangeable bag system that offers maximum flexibility and versatility. In creating the best backpack we created the world's best bag, ever. It is packed with over 20 features that adapts to your lifestyle and is built to last.

 
 

 

 

 Choose Your Favorite Color

Zip Pack Go

 

 

The Pro 

The Pro is the base of our Duffle Backpack Set. Use it alone or zip it onto the Duffle add-on or to the traditional Backpack add-on to expand its function.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Weekender Set

The Pro + Duffle. Use both bags individually or zipped together as the Weekender. Carry as much or as little as needed.

 

 

 

 

 

The Overnighter Set

Pro + Backpack. Use both bags individually or zipped together. Whether you're headed to the city, gym, to work to on a short road trip, organize your adventure equipped with a backpack as diverse as you

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Voyager Set

The ultimate traveling set. You get all 3 bags (The Pro, Backpack and Duffle). Travel Pouch not included. Use them all individually or zipped up into the The Weekender & The Overnighter. With up to 6 carrying combinations, this set offers unrivaled versatility, access, organization and expansion. 

 

Travel Pouch

This multi-functional pouch is perfect for personal organization and quick access to essentials while on the go. Usable as a travel pouch, clutch, toiletry kit, shaving dopp kit, or as a cosmetic case. Snap it onto your bag, stow it away or use individually.

 

 

The Mini Backpack

A surprise item for our backers. Beautiful, smart & compact- made from fine Italian leather, it is the perfect everyday bag. Great as a gift for yourself or your loved ones. Available for individual purchase or as an add-on. Optionally in special edition color- Ruby Red

 

 

 

 

How to Pre-Order

1. Choose a reward level.

Indiegogo only allows you to choose one reward level at a time. 

2. If you want to add something, check out the Rewards Menu at the top.

If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Reward menu at the very top. If it's in the Reward Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Reward Menu.

3. Relax, you're done for now.

All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey.

Dimensions

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Our Story

Wool & Oak launched as a brand through crowdfunding in early 2016 with a spectacular debut: The World’s First Duffle Suitcase. Close to 3000 backers rooted for it to succeed. This high demand and overwhelming support validated that Wool & Oak offered a product that travelers around the world want and need.

Wool & Oak is a lifestyle brand specializing in leather travel goods. As a company born through crowdfunding, Wool & Oak thrives to deliver meaningful innovation to stagnant product categories. The brand’s design philosophy is about the marriage of classic design aesthetic with maximum functionality needed in today’s modern world.

Founded in 2015 by Johnathan Webster, in his studio apartment in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, Wool & Oak separates itself from other brands by offering extremely well made products at a price point that represents aspiration- a step above fast fashion quality and a step below luxury price. Wool & Oak is also unique because the founder, Johnathan Webster, was formally trained in fashion design in Rome, Italy. This brand was founded by an actual designer.

Meet The Team 

 

 

 Thank you for your support!

The reason we exist and can create beautifully made bags is because of your support and excitement for our vision!

 

Risks, Challenges & Policy

This is Wool & Oak’s second crowdfunding campaign. Our first campaign, “The World’s First Duffle Suitcase”, was wildly successful with over $800k in pledges (to date) across all crowdfunding platforms. The Duffle Suitcase has been successfully delivered to satisfied backers in over 73 countries–and counting!

Wool & Oak has gained an extraordinary amount of knowledge from the Duffle Suitcase crowdfunding campaign, all of which is being applied to further streamlining the entire experience for backers of The DuffleBackpack.

***

Wool & Oak is led by three experienced entrepreneurs that are dedicated to making The DuffleBackpack a reality for our backers.

Johnathan, the Founder/CEO of Wool & Oak and The DuffleBackpack’s designer, is a fashion industry insider with deep connections to a network of global manufacturers and significant experience with industry supply chain and logistics management. Johnathan’s fashion industry expertise covers design, technical design, and production development (to name but a few of his talents) and he’s worked for some of the world’s foremost fashion houses such as Helmut Lang and Theory. The DuffleBackpack is–literally–a designer travel set.

Gizem is Wool & Oak's Director of Marketing. Gizem graduated from The Berlin School of Economics and Law.  With a focus on marketing, unlimited creativity, and a keen eye for details, she provides innovative ideas, creative insight, and the skills to deliver.

Ryan is Wool & Oak’s Director of Operations, and a seasoned entrepreneur with business management expertise across a diverse cross section of industries. He is responsible for ensuring our campaign’s operations run as efficiently as possible. Ryan is an engineer that’s passionate about high quality, functional product design. 
***

We have secured our manufacturers, shippers and fulfillment centers, all of whom are waiting for us to give them the green light! All of our partners have over 5 decades of experience. Our manufacturers are professional, precise and ethical.

*** 
Our freight forwarders move tons of product daily and are ready for our business. We have partnered up with one of the industry's leading fulfillment center so our backers will get their DuffleBackpacks in pristine condition and on time.

*** 
With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The DuffleBackpack will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.

Wool & Oak has a keen understanding of the fact that delays in the fashion industry are sometimes inevitable, so our anticipated delivery dates are conservative estimates. If all runs smoothly there is a chance you will receive your bag earlier than expected!

Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this campaign or by Wool & Oak.

Wool & Oak “DuffleBackpack” Indiegogo Shipping Policy

U.S. SHIPMENTS:

Most domestic shipments are sent through USPS, UPS, or FedEx. The exact service depends on the size and weight of your order. U.S. Delivery Times: Handling time is generally 1-3 business days, and once shipped packages usually reach their destination in 2-5 business days.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS:

Wool & Oak leverages a network of international shipping hubs that provide various services, depending on the destination. Prior to shipping an order we cannot guarantee which shipping hub or service or warehouse will be used. We can guarantee that our system is optimized to find the fastest ground service possible.

International Delivery Times: Orders typically take 4-10 business days to reach international destinations; however, some shipments can take up to 3-4 weeks to reach certain destinations due to complexities associated with international shipping and local customs.

Customs & Duties: Our international shipping hubs are purposed to help reduce complexities and duties (where applicable) associated with international shipments. Wool & Oak is not responsible for any customs, duties or import fees associated with receiving your Wool & Oak order.

Wool & Oak “DuffleBackpack” Indiegogo Warranty & Return Policy

While all of our products include a warranty against any manufacturer defects, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards. We will consider exchanges on a case-by-case basis.

If you want to add something, check out the Rewards Menu at the top.If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Reward menu at the very top. If it's in the Reward Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Reward Menu.3. Relax, you're done for now.All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey. 
 Dimensions               Our StoryWool & Oak launched as a brand through crowdfunding in early 2016 with a spectacular debut: The World’s First Duffle Suitcase. Close to 3000 backers rooted for it to succeed. This high demand and overwhelming support validated that Wool & Oak offered a product that travelers around the world want and need.Wool & Oak is a lifestyle brand specializing in leather travel goods. As a company born through crowdfunding, Wool & Oak thrives to deliver meaningful innovation to stagnant product categories. The brand’s design philosophy is about the marriage of classic design aesthetic with maximum functionality needed in today’s modern world.Founded in 2015 by Johnathan Webster, in his studio apartment in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, Wool & Oak separates itself from other brands by offering extremely well made products at a price point that represents aspiration- a step above fast fashion quality and a step below luxury price. Wool & Oak is also unique because the founder, Johnathan Webster, was formally trained in fashion design in Rome, Italy. This brand was founded by an actual designer.Meet The Team     Thank you for your support!The reason we exist and can create beautifully made bags is because of your support and excitement for our vision! Risks, Challenges & Policy
This is Wool & Oak’s second crowdfunding campaign. Our first campaign, “The World’s First Duffle Suitcase”, was wildly successful with over $800k in pledges (to date) across all crowdfunding platforms. The Duffle Suitcase has been successfully delivered to satisfied backers in over 73 countries–and counting!
Wool & Oak has gained an extraordinary amount of knowledge from the Duffle Suitcase crowdfunding campaign, all of which is being applied to further streamlining the entire experience for backers of The DuffleBackpack.
***
Wool & Oak is led by three experienced entrepreneurs that are dedicated to making The DuffleBackpack a reality for our backers.
Johnathan, the Founder/CEO of Wool & Oak and The DuffleBackpack’s designer, is a fashion industry insider with deep connections to a network of global manufacturers and significant experience with industry supply chain and logistics management. Johnathan’s fashion industry expertise covers design, technical design, and production development (to name but a few of his talents) and he’s worked for some of the world’s foremost fashion houses such as Helmut Lang and Theory. The DuffleBackpack is–literally–a designer travel set.
Gizem is Wool & Oak's Director of Marketing. Gizem graduated from The Berlin School of Economics and Law.  With a focus on marketing, unlimited creativity, and a keen eye for details, she provides innovative ideas, creative insight, and the skills to deliver.
Ryan is Wool & Oak’s Director of Operations, and a seasoned entrepreneur with business management expertise across a diverse cross section of industries. He is responsible for ensuring our campaign’s operations run as efficiently as possible. Ryan is an engineer that’s passionate about high quality, functional product design. ***
We have secured our manufacturers, shippers and fulfillment centers, all of whom are waiting for us to give them the green light! All of our partners have over 5 decades of experience. Our manufacturers are professional, precise and ethical.
*** Our freight forwarders move tons of product daily and are ready for our business. We have partnered up with one of the industry's leading fulfillment center so our backers will get their DuffleBackpacks in pristine condition and on time.
*** With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The DuffleBackpack will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.
Wool & Oak has a keen understanding of the fact that delays in the fashion industry are sometimes inevitable, so our anticipated delivery dates are conservative estimates. If all runs smoothly there is a chance you will receive your bag earlier than expected!
Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this campaign or by Wool & Oak.
Wool & Oak “DuffleBackpack” Indiegogo Shipping Policy
U.S. SHIPMENTS:
Most domestic shipments are sent through USPS, UPS, or FedEx. The exact service depends on the size and weight of your order. U.S. Delivery Times: Handling time is generally 1-3 business days, and once shipped packages usually reach their destination in 2-5 business days.
INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS:
Wool & Oak leverages a network of international shipping hubs that provide various services, depending on the destination. Prior to shipping an order we cannot guarantee which shipping hub or service or warehouse will be used. We can guarantee that our system is optimized to find the fastest ground service possible.
International Delivery Times: Orders typically take 4-10 business days to reach international destinations; however, some shipments can take up to 3-4 weeks to reach certain destinations due to complexities associated with international shipping and local customs.
Customs & Duties: Our international shipping hubs are purposed to help reduce complexities and duties (where applicable) associated with international shipments. Wool & Oak is not responsible for any customs, duties or import fees associated with receiving your Wool & Oak order.
Wool & Oak “DuffleBackpack” Indiegogo Warranty & Return Policy
While all of our products include a warranty against any manufacturer defects, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards. We will consider exchanges on a case-by-case basis.

The flow rate of MAX PUMP2 can reach 300L/min and the pressure can reach 2100PA, you can inflate an airbed within 4mins, and buggy bag within 30 seconds. It can last long after one charging.  

 Not only can it be adapted to a variety of products, like swimming ring, yoga ball, rubber boat, vacuum bag, air bed and so on, but also it easily cleans the corners that a vacuum cleaner cannot reach. 

Due to super electric quantity and high efficient circuit. One charging and you can inflate 50 swimming rings, or ten airbeds, plus 20 buggy bags, offering you a real carefree travel. 

ABS engineering plastics+ rigid mechanic structures+ Ultrasonic. After numerous drop, squeeze and durability tests, it can withstand a drop of 2 meters. 

Children can use it safely without any dangerous. Meantime, it can also prevent other objects to entering and damaging the product.

Want to sell MAX PUMP2 at your stores? Awesome! Just email us with your info.  

leon@flextailgear.com  

Leon( Flextail's Co-Founder)

A real outdoor gadget is able to deal with various severe environment.

 ABS engineering plastics+ rigid mechanic structures+ Ultrasonic. After numerous drop, squeeze and durability tests, it can withstand a drop of 2 meters. 
 
A new mode of operation. More intelligent, more easy. It can prevent accidental contact in the bag, avoid non-necessory disturbance and trouble.Children can use it safely without any dangerous. Meantime, it can also prevent other objects to entering and damaging the product.

story:
Castle Bagging is a small start-up looking to make a big impact on Scottish tourism. We are currently raising funds to develop our application (and website). Both our app and website will be designed as both an information hub as well as a fun, competitive game which will encourage users to visit more than 300 castles around Scotland and ‘bag’ them. Users will be able to check off their progress on an interactive map/list, share their progress through social media, and get interesting information about the castles they visit. Castles will be categorised into type (Public, Private, Ruined, etc) and users will be able to earn points for each castle they visit and can then increase their ranking/titles based on points earned.. Additionally, the ‘page’ of each castle will offer unique historical information/stories. There will also be optional push notifications to alert users when they are passing within 5 miles of an unbagged castle.  

The inspiration behind Castle Bagging came from the popular Scottish sport of Munro Bagging (climbing the 282 mountains in Scotland). We decided to adapt this fun and competitive activity into a more family/visitor friendly adventure. Our hope is to help visitors explore the spectacular and hidden gems often missed by the average visitor.  

Price: Castle Bagging will be a free app and available in apple and android stores  

Product Positioning/Brand Values: Authentic, Undiscovered/off the beaten path, friendly, exploration, welcoming, learn, discover  

Big Idea: Explore in a fun/competitive way  

Funds: 100% of money profited on kickstarter will go into the development process of the App and website  

Long-term Future Opportunities: As Castle Bagging grows, we would like to eventually hold an annual event each year where a scavenger race is set up. Contestants will follow clues, race across the country visiting different castles where they will be required to complete a specific task before getting the next clue.  

Evaluation: Quantitative analysis 6mo after initial launch, assess trends and modify where needed.
