story:
Other great ideas you can do with ReveaLED

 

Intentionally engineered ReveaLED makes the perfect device for frequent travelers and avid photographers when exploring the hidden worlds.  

ReveaLED is the world's only UV light that is especially designed for travelers and photographers. ReveaLED is a great tool when traveling anywhere in the world. It gives peace of mind when you stay in a hotel after scanning your room from beds to toilet seats with ReveaLED. 

ReveaLED vs Others

ReveaLED team has tested different UV wavelengths with different combinations on more than dozens of materials and fluid samples in order to finalize the best portable UV lamp. Right combination of different wavelength UV chips allow ReveaLED to glow the fluids instantly and powerfully.

Travelers have become increasingly aware of cleanliness, hygiene and health while travelling is vital to them. Who would want to sleep on the dirty sheets anyways. Sleeping on used sheets means you are sharing it with an other person that you don’t know. And if the dirty sheets are infected, you can get acne, allergies, eczema, asthma, cold and flu right away.  

Infectious Diseases Physician Dr. Leong confirmed that some STDs can indeed be transferred to another person who used contaminated bed-linen, pillow cases and towels. An infectious diseases expert claimed in the report that some sexually transmitted diseases may actually be passed on to others via contaminated towels. He also noted that the bacteria left on bed sheets may even lead to gastrointestinal issues such as diarrhea.

ReveaLED helps you to find body fluids on the bed sheets, pillow cases and towels for closer inspection of hotel room bedding before crawling between the sheets and using the towels.  

With ReveaLED the hotel guests can make sure that their sheets don't have any stains and body fluids from previous guests. Using UV light any stains such as urine or semen (Gross!) glow up in the dark and what you have been told are fresh sheets can clearly be seen as not. Because ReveaLED is so specialized in combination of the right UV wavelengths, things that cannot be seen can now be seen. 

ReveaLED is a “Mini Rechargeable UV and White Light” that switches between ultra bright white light and UV light at the press of a button. The same button when pressed for 5 seconds also acts as the on and off switch. The very lightweight and portable UV light is charged using a conventional USB charger. 

Compact in size, easily transportable and made using the high quality LED chips, ReveaLED is robust, light weight and fits into any small bag or even a pocket. ReveaLED is an UV and White Light LED light combined in one unit that is rechargeable, portable and bright for any purposes. 

Our story with Kickstarter starts about 3 years ago. The first versions of ReveaLED was born with the help of the Kickstarter community in 2016 and since then we have shipped around 5000 units on time to our backers. We have received a lot of support and amazing feedbacks from our backers. We continuously developed ReveaLED to make it even better and after three years of testing and prototyping, we finalized the best portable UV light ever. We also wanted to focus more on travelers and photographers so we moved the newer version of ReveaLED to our new Kickstarter page under "StudiOwl" where we will be launching exciting new products that are focusing on travelers & photographers. 

Quality and reliability were two of the most important factors considered in its development. To this end ReveaLED is an exceptionally high quality electronic product that is easy to use and extremely reliable. We also engineered a PCB board that allowed us to have bright white color option in our current version. 

Not only is ReveaLED portable but it was developed with practicality in mind. ReveaLED comes with a strong optional clip that allows this powerful light to be clipped to a mobile phone to enable the phone to take a UV photo serving both a practical and fun purpose.

#1 STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED! 

ReveaLED is now available in Black. Backers will be able to pick their choice of colors in the survey once the campaign is over. 

#2 STRETCH GOAL: Brightness Button 

We asked for your opinion about the next stretch goal idea in our first update and received a lot of requests for an adjustable brightness option for photography purposes. We accepted this challenge as our next “ $75K Stretch Goal ” and already started to make a sample with an adjustable brightness button. We also confirmed it with our manufacturers that this new feature will not effect our promised shipping date. 

 

We managed to design a compact PCB and install 55 pieces of very high quality, extremely powerful LED chips that emit both white and UV light on a single PCB board. 

Another distinguishing factor about ReveaLED is that the unit uses multi wavelengths of UV light. The vast majority of entry level UV light sources only use one UV light wavelength.  By using multiple different wavelengths of UV light ReveaLED finds hidden fluids that other UV light tools can easily miss. 

UV Wavelength Test Results

By using multi-wavelength UV chips and 180 degree wide angle, ReveaLED finds hidden fluids that most of the other UV lights can easily miss.   

Another important challenge ReveaLED overcomes is portability. On TV shows such as CSI and Inside Edition, teams are used to seeing large UV lamps or cumbersome UV torches that are quite heavy. Or if you have one those UV flash lights with a single wavelength, you have to scan all the bed inch by inch as the light only points at one spot while ReveaLED has 180degree wide angle that allows you to scan the bed completely at one look. Bringing portability with brightness and reliability together is what sets ReveaLED apart in the market place. 

ReveaLED is a powerful UV and White Light that is something every traveler, photographers, research scientist and home should have. A practical and entertaining device that serves a multitude of purposes. ReveaLED also has a tremendous educational purpose.

White Light Mode Test

Fluorescent molecules tend to have rigid structures and delocalized electrons. Here are the some of the examples: hidden watermarks(money and checks), minerals, tonic water, some vitamins and drugs ,scorpions, toothpaste, antifreeze, fluorescent gems and minerals, body fluids, bank notes, laundry detergent, some animals, plants, fungi, highlighter pens, and much more.

Photographers

Many animals, minerals and plants give off a glow that is unseen by the naked eye and even conventional camera equipment. With ReveaLED a powerful UV light can now be clipped onto a camera or camera equipment to light up a space or object with bright UV light allowing any hidden “glow” to be captured in an instant.  Furthermore, more there are other objects that give off a UV glow that can make amazing photographs.  

We are here to raise enough funds to bring ReveaLED to life. We need your support to establish production of this customized UV light in sufficient quantities to reduce the retail price to make the product more affordable for our backers. In supporting this campaign, you will be playing your part in bringing a unique and useful UV+White light to market and making life easier for travelers and photographers. We have the suppliers and skilled manufacturers lined up and ready to go, we just need your support to bring ReveaLED UV+White light to life with a special price for Indiegogo backers!

story:
(Para ver la version en Español buscar mas mas abajo)

IMPORTANT UPDATE: I Have found a good place for printing here in India, so I will change the perks you will receive  for better ones, but Indiegogo does not let me edit them, so I will see how I write it in a clear way. I am now running to photograph cnstrucion workers and i need time to update the gifts, but for example the picture size is not 30x20 cm but A3 (30x50cm) and I will send one children photobook for orders of 20 euro and more, and where it says 1 photo 30x20 I will add one extra and the size is not 30x20 but A3. Also for orders of 30 or more, I will add a huge size photo in black and white printed on plastic (similar to canvas)Orders of 50 or mor, will have a 64 photo book.  There is only 3 days left, so we need all your support. Also, as I am not sure of reaching the target, I have decided that if we dont collect more than 1000 Euro, then all the money will go to the school, I mean I will spend all moey in digital cameras, film for photos, a printer, ink and so on

 

For those of you who don´t know me or dont have me as a contact, you can see my photos here
www.gerardoangiulli.com

http://www.facebook.com/gerardoangiulli

and this is a sanmple of the pictures that contributors to th eproject will be receiving
http://india-third-eye-gallery.posterous.com/photos-you-will-receive-when-contributing

 

 

 

India Third Eye     a photography project that focuses in using travel and photography towards helping others

My name is Gerardo, I am a photography lover who decided it is time for my photos to go further than my computer screen. I like to use WE instead of I, as WE are never alone - people will always come in our way to offer a helpful hand when we have a genuine goal. WE decided to nickname our Camera as our Third Eye. When an image is captured with the Third Eye, it goes beyond time and space and becomes immortal.

With India Third Eye (ITE) we intend to promote the use of travelling and photography not just for self-satisfaction, but also in order to help others. On our previous visit to India we observed many disadvantages that people go through, especially women and children; therefore ITE is focused on helping them. When we photographed people, we noticed that they became very happy. We felt disappointed that we were unable to print an instant copy for them, or email a copy later.

The ITE Project

WE have contacted Kati and Siobhan from the Jeevan School here in Varanasi. They currently work in a school and home with 150 children in the school and 33 living in the home. We would love to help them to buy some materials for the school and If you like the project, we will need you to get involved as well.

In the next few days, we will teach kids how to build an inexpensive pinhole camera using cardboard from a shoebox. When the cameras are made, the kids can have great fun taking portraits of each other. Afterwards, ITE will print a photo for each child to take home and we will also print a number of very large photos that will be publically exhibited on the school walls in order to raise awareness of our action. The children will also receive a photo book each with the photos made by them.

By getting involved you will be helping the kids to have fun and learn how to make a photo camera with almost no money. We hope to awaken in them a passion for photography or at the very least to provide them with a new and exciting experience. ITE invites anyone who cares to become involved in the project. So far, many people we have met have shown great interest and offered help in the project. We hope you can also help us.

How to Get Involved

  1. You can participate by choosing one of the unique gifts on the right of the screen. We will send you big thanks, a photo of the kids signed by them, a photo book with photos made by them and a photo book with my photos from India. We will produce them with love and this is has more value than anything else.
  1. You can also help by getting the word out and making some noise about our project by using Indiego share tools, post on Facebook, Twitter, Nasia Klasia, VKontact and other social networks

The money raised will be used in three ways:

Stage 1:           To buy camera film, paper, glue, scissors, tape, paintbrushes, buckets and anything else we may need for the children to make and use their cameras. The large poster photograph will also be constructed and hung using these funds.

Stage 2:           To donate photographic equipment and materials to the school home. For example one or two digital cameras, a printer, printer toner, printing paper and photography books for the kids to learn and play.

Stage 3:   (only if we collect more than 1000 Euro)        To fund a photo documentary exhibition of the ITE Project in Europe with all funds raised through the exhibition used directly to start a new international project.

There is a second part of this action that involves an investigation about women working in the construction sector. ITE will update this part later as we have still to contact an organization that works with them. The idea is to link the pain suffered by women in Indian society where they do not have access to the same education and jobs as men with the strong impact on their children. Many times these women are seen working almost as slaves with their children next to them, instead of the children going to school. Also, on our arrival to India the country was in shock over the death of a student who was brutally raped and killed by 6 men. We will try to report also on this issue, as we think there is a strong connection between the 3 topics.

How We Will Use the Money

ITE estimates that 1500 Euro will be needed to complete all three stages of this project.

For example: Stage 1 will cost around 200-300 Euro (there are 150 children!!).  The remaining money will be split 60% for Stage 2 and 40% for Stage 3. These are estimates only.

All our tickets are covered and travel expenses, food, and personal expenses are already included in our personal budget. ALL money coming from your help will be used ONLY for ITE. We will be as transparent as we can, updating in the money that is being used, for you to be able to keep a track of it.

By buying a photo or a book you will making a huge help towards ITE project and you will contribute to the most important Goal of the project: to put a smile in someone´s face (or 150 little smiles)

The Impact

By buying just one photograph you will not only be supporting the work of the WE, but you will be directly involved in bringing a smile to a child’s face. You will be providing opportunities to these kids that they might never have had - It might even awaken a child´s interest in photography.

ITE is our first international project.  ITE has a vision to continue raising awareness of international human right issues through the use of photography. Our aim is not only to help the people who are being photographed, but also to empower the traveller to become more aware and mindful so it isn’t just about what a place and the people can give to them, but rather what WE can contribute to the communities visited.

The next ITE project will probably be in Cambodia working with landmine victims and continuing to work with underprivileged women and children. We are also hoping to get more people involved especially known photographers who can contribute by giving free photography workshops to travellers.  

Many thanks to all of you for reading. We will be updating on a daily basis.

For more info you can see our Blog, Website, Facebook page and the Indiego Fundraising page.

www.gerardoangiulli.com

http://www.facebook.com/gerardoangiulli

https://twitter.com/GAngiulli

 

VERSION EN ESPAÑOL   (he puesto antes la version en Ingles no porque tenga preferencia por este Idioma, sino poruqe es el mas hablado internacionalmente no solo por Anglosajones, sino Tambien por el resto del Mundo, incluso muchos hispanohablantes)

India Third Eye (Tercer ojo de India)     un proyecto de fotografía que se centra en el uso de los viajes y la fotografía para ayudar a los demás

Mi nombre es Gerardo, soy un amante de la fotografía, que decidió que es tiempo de que mis fotos lleguen más allá de la pantalla de mi ordenador. Prefiero utilizar NOSOTROS en luger de YO, ya que nunca estamos solos – siempre aparece en nuestro camino la persona indicada para ofrecer una mano cuando tenemos un objetivo genuino. Decidimos apodar nuestra Cámara como nuestro “tercer ojo”. Cuando una imagen se capta con el tercer ojo, va más allá del tiempo y del espacio y se convierte en inmortal.

 

Con el Tercer ojo de INDIA (ITE en Ingles) tenemos la intención de promover el uso de los viajes y la fotografía no sólo para la satisfacción personal, sino también con el fin de ayudar a los demás. En nuestra anterior visita a la India observamos muchas desventajas que las personas atraviesan, especialmente mujeres y niños, por eso ITE se orienta en ayudarlos. Cuando fotografiamos personas en India, nos dimos cuenta de que estos se ponen muy felices. Nos sentimos decepcionados de que no pudimos imprimir una copia instantánea para ellos, o enviar una copia por correo electrónico.

 

El Proyecto ITE

 

Hemos contactado con Kati y Siobhan de la Escuela Jeevan aquí en Varanasi. En la actualidad trabajan en una escuela- hogar con 150 niños en la escuela 33 niños en el hogar. Nos encantaría ayudarles a comprar algunos materiales para la escuela y si te gusta el proyecto, esperamos que te involucres. Tambien organizaremos una exposicion al aire libre aqui en Varanasi y otra en Europa, para que otros viajeros y locales entren en conciencia del Proyecto.

En los próximos días, vamos a enseñar a los niños cómo construir una cámara estenopeica de cartón de bajo costo utilizando una caja de zapatos. Cuando las cámaras estén hechas, los niños podrán divertirse haciendo retratos entre ellos. Posteriormente, ITE  imprimirá una foto de cada niño para que pueda llevar a su casa y también vamos a imprimir una serie de fotos-poster de gran tamaño que se exhibirá públicamente en las paredes de la escuela con el fin de aumentar la conciencia de nuestra acción. Los niños también recibirán un libro de fotos cada uno con las fotos hechas por ellos con sus compañeros

Al participar estarás ayudando a los niños a divertirse y aprender cómo hacer una cámara de fotos con muy poco dinero. Esperamos despertar en ellos la pasión por la fotografía o por lo menos proporcionarles una experiencia nueva y emocionante. ITE invita a todo aquel que quiera participar en el proyecto. Hasta ahora, muchas personas que hemos conocido han mostrado gran interés y ofredido ayuda en este proyecto. Esperamos que vos también nos puedas  ayudar.

Cómo participar?

Puedes participar eligiendo uno de los regalos únicos de la derecha de la pantalla, a cambio de una donación. Nosotros te enviaremos las gracias, una foto de los niños firmados por ellos, un libro de fotos hechas por ellos y un libro con mis fotos de la India. Vamos a producir todos estos regalos con amor y esto se tiene más valor que cualquier otra cosa.

También puedes ayudar haciendo correr la voz y hacer algo de ruido sobre nuestro proyecto utilizando las herramientas para compartir de Indiego, publicar en Facebook, Twitter, Klasia Nasia, VKontact y otras redes sociales

El dinero recaudado será utilizado de tres maneras:

  • Etapa 1: Para comprar película fotográfica, papel, pegamento, tijeras, cinta adhesiva, brochas, cubos y cualquier otra cosa necesitarias para que los niños construyan sus cámaras. Tambien se utilizara el dinero para producir las foto-poster de gran tamaño.
  • Etapa 2: Para donar material fotográfico y los materiales para la casa de la escuela. Por ejemplo, una o dos cámaras digitales, una impresora, tóner de impresora, papel de impresión y de libros de fotografía para que los niños aprendan y jueguen. Mientras mas dinero se recaude, más material podra ser donado a la escuela.
  • Etapa 3: Para financiar una exposición documental foto del proyecto ITE en Europa. En el caso de que esta exposición genere mas recaudaciones serán utilizadas directamente para iniciar un nuevo proyecto internacional.

Hay una segunda parte de esta acción que implica una investigación acerca de las mujeres que trabajan en el sector de la construcción. ITE actualizará esta última parte ya que tenemos todavía que contactar con la organización que trabaja con ellos. La idea es relacionar el dolor que sufren las mujeres en la sociedad india en la que no tienen acceso a la misma educación y el empleo que los hombres con el fuerte impacto que produce en sus hijos. Muchas veces estas mujeres pueden ser vistas trabajando casi como esclavas con sus hijos junto a ellas, en lugar de los niños ir a la escuela. Además, al tiempo de nuestra llegada a la India el país estaba en estado de shock por la muerte de una estudiante que fue brutalmente violada y asesinada por seis hombres. Vamos a tratar de informar también sobre este tema, ya que creo que hay una fuerte conexión entre los tres temas.

¿Cómo vamos a utilizar el dinero?

ITE estima que se necesitaran por lo menos 1500 Euro para completar las tres etapas de este proyecto.

Por ejemplo: La Etapa 1 tendrá un costo de alrededor de 200-300 euros (hay 150 niños!).A esto hay que sumarle el dinero necesario para producir los regalos para la gente que nos apoya y los gastos de envio. El resto del dinero se repartirá el 60% para la Etapa 2 y el 40% para la Etapa 3. Estos son sólo estimaciones.

Todas nuestros tickets, pasajes de avion están cubiertos y los gastos de viaje, comida y gastos personales ya están incluidos en nuestro presupuesto personal. TODO el dinero que viene de tu ayuda se utilizará únicamente para ITE. Vamos a ser tan transparente como sea posible, actualizando en el dinero que se está utilizando, para que tu seas capaz de mantener un seguimiento del mismo.

 

Al comprar una foto o un libro estarás dando una gran ayuda al proyecto ITE y contribuirás a cumplir la meta más importante del proyecto: poner una sonrisa en la cara de alguien (o 150 pequeñas sonrisas)

El impacto

Al comprar una sola fotografía no sólo vas a apoyar nuestro trabajo, sino que también estarás directamente involucrado en darle una sonrisa a un niño. Le otorgarás a estos niños una oportunidad que tal vez nunca han tenido - Incluso podría despertar el interés de los niños en la fotografía.

ITE es nuestro primer proyecto internacional. ITE tiene la visión de seguir generando conciencia en las cuestiones internacionales de derechos humanos mediante el uso de la fotografía. Nuestro objetivo no es sólo ayudar a las personas que están siendo fotografiadas, sino también darle a otros viajeros el poder de ser más conscientes y atentos ya MINDFUL Travelling no se trata sólo de lo un lugar y la gente puede dar al viajero, sino más bien lo que el viajero puede contribuir hacia las comunidades visitadas.

El próximo proyecto ITE será probablemente en Camboya trabajando con víctimas de minas terrestres y por supouesto seguir trabajando con las mujeres y los niños desfavorecidos. También deseamos poder involucrar a más personas, especialmente fotógrafos conocidos que pueden contribuir dando talleres gratuitos de fotografía para viajeros.

Muchas gracias a todos ustedes por leer. Estaremos actualizando a diario.

Para más información puedes ver nuestro blog, sitio web, página de Facebook.

www.gerardoangiulli.com

http://www.facebook.com/gerardoangiulli

https://twitter.com/GAngiulli/GAngiulli

(Para ver la version en Español buscar mas mas abajo)
IMPORTANT UPDATE: I Have found a good place for printing here in India, so I will change the perks you will receive  for better ones, but Indiegogo does not let me edit them, so I will see how I write it in a clear way. I am now running to photograph cnstrucion workers and i need time to update the gifts, but for example the picture size is not 30x20 cm but A3 (30x50cm) and I will send one children photobook for orders of 20 euro and more, and where it says 1 photo 30x20 I will add one extra and the size is not 30x20 but A3. Also for orders of 30 or more, I will add a huge size photo in black and white printed on plastic (similar to canvas)Orders of 50 or mor, will have a 64 photo book.  There is only 3 days left, so we need all your support. Also, as I am not sure of reaching the target, I have decided that if we dont collect more than 1000 Euro, then all the money will go to the school, I mean I will spend all moey in digital cameras, film for photos, a printer, ink and so on
 
For those of you who don´t know me or dont have me as a contact, you can see my photos here www.gerardoangiulli.com
http://www.facebook.com/gerardoangiulli
and this is a sanmple of the pictures that contributors to th eproject will be receivinghttp://india-third-eye-gallery.posterous.com/photos-you-will-receive-when-contributing
 
 
 
India Third Eye     a photography project that focuses in using travel and photography towards helping others
My name is Gerardo, I am a photography lover who decided it is time for my photos to go further than my computer screen. I like to use WE instead of I, as WE are never alone - people will always come in our way to offer a helpful hand when we have a genuine goal. WE decided to nickname our Camera as our Third Eye. When an image is captured with the Third Eye, it goes beyond time and space and becomes immortal.
With India Third Eye (ITE) we intend to promote the use of travelling and photography not just for self-satisfaction, but also in order to help others. On our previous visit to India we observed many disadvantages that people go through, especially women and children; therefore ITE is focused on helping them. When we photographed people, we noticed that they became very happy. We felt disappointed that we were unable to print an instant copy for them, or email a copy later.
The ITE Project
WE have contacted Kati and Siobhan from the Jeevan School here in Varanasi. They currently work in a school and home with 150 children in the school and 33 living in the home. We would love to help them to buy some materials for the school and If you like the project, we will need you to get involved as well.
In the next few days, we will teach kids how to build an inexpensive pinhole camera using cardboard from a shoebox. When the cameras are made, the kids can have great fun taking portraits of each other. Afterwards, ITE will print a photo for each child to take home and we will also print a number of very large photos that will be publically exhibited on the school walls in order to raise awareness of our action. The children will also receive a photo book each with the photos made by them.
By getting involved you will be helping the kids to have fun and learn how to make a photo camera with almost no money. We hope to awaken in them a passion for photography or at the very least to provide them with a new and exciting experience. ITE invites anyone who cares to become involved in the project. So far, many people we have met have shown great interest and offered help in the project. We hope you can also help us.
How to Get Involved

You can participate by choosing one of the unique gifts on the right of the screen. We will send you big thanks, a photo of the kids signed by them, a photo book with photos made by them and a photo book with my photos from India. We will produce them with love and this is has more value than anything else.

You can also help by getting the word out and making some noise about our project by using Indiego share tools, post on Facebook, Twitter, Nasia Klasia, VKontact and other social networks
The money raised will be used in three ways:
Stage 1:           To buy camera film, paper, glue, scissors, tape, paintbrushes, buckets and anything else we may need for the children to make and use their cameras. The large poster photograph will also be constructed and hung using these funds.
Stage 2:           To donate photographic equipment and materials to the school home. For example one or two digital cameras, a printer, printer toner, printing paper and photography books for the kids to learn and play.
Stage 3:   (only if we collect more than 1000 Euro)        To fund a photo documentary exhibition of the ITE Project in Europe with all funds raised through the exhibition used directly to start a new international project.
There is a second part of this action that involves an investigation about women working in the construction sector. ITE will update this part later as we have still to contact an organization that works with them. The idea is to link the pain suffered by women in Indian society where they do not have access to the same education and jobs as men with the strong impact on their children. Many times these women are seen working almost as slaves with their children next to them, instead of the children going to school. Also, on our arrival to India the country was in shock over the death of a student who was brutally raped and killed by 6 men. We will try to report also on this issue, as we think there is a strong connection between the 3 topics.
How We Will Use the Money
ITE estimates that 1500 Euro will be needed to complete all three stages of this project.
For example: Stage 1 will cost around 200-300 Euro (there are 150 children!!).  The remaining money will be split 60% for Stage 2 and 40% for Stage 3. These are estimates only.
All our tickets are covered and travel expenses, food, and personal expenses are already included in our personal budget. ALL money coming from your help will be used ONLY for ITE. We will be as transparent as we can, updating in the money that is being used, for you to be able to keep a track of it.
By buying a photo or a book you will making a huge help towards ITE project and you will contribute to the most important Goal of the project: to put a smile in someone´s face (or 150 little smiles)
The Impact
By buying just one photograph you will not only be supporting the work of the WE, but you will be directly involved in bringing a smile to a child’s face. You will be providing opportunities to these kids that they might never have had - It might even awaken a child´s interest in photography.
ITE is our first international project.  ITE has a vision to continue raising awareness of international human right issues through the use of photography. Our aim is not only to help the people who are being photographed, but also to empower the traveller to become more aware and mindful so it isn’t just about what a place and the people can give to them, but rather what WE can contribute to the communities visited.
The next ITE project will probably be in Cambodia working with landmine victims and continuing to work with underprivileged women and children. We are also hoping to get more people involved especially known photographers who can contribute by giving free photography workshops to travellers.  
Many thanks to all of you for reading. We will be updating on a daily basis.
For more info you can see our Blog, Website, Facebook page and the Indiego Fundraising page.
www.gerardoangiulli.com
http://www.facebook.com/gerardoangiulli
https://twitter.com/GAngiulli

story:
" The first social platform where creative minds organize dream experiences, find ideal co-travelers to share their dreams & get rewarded "

      Unique travel experiences organized by creative users!

      Get matched with the ideal buddies based on your interests!

      Meet your travel buddies and make real friendships!

      Book as a group, easily and safely, in a click!

      Organize your life-trip and travel for FREE!





" It is a fact that people do not live the life they were wishing for. A fast moving society and excessive liabilities lead to unfulfilled dreams and hopes to travel and experience more. "

Lifekiy is a breakthrough to all restrictions. The solution to all things keep-ing you away from your dreams. With Lifekiy there are no excuses such as “no money, no like-minded friends” to live your dreams. The only barrier standing between you and the life you want to live is yourself. Lifekiy gives you the key to a whole new world.

Lifekiy’s community includes two different roles for its users. The Leader’s role and the Life-Buddy’s role. A leader organizes a travel experience, life-buddies join and finally the leader and his life-buddies live the travel experience together. A user can be a leader, a life-buddy or both in different travel experiences. Both leader and life-buddy relay on each other and build an actual relationship.


Why to be a Leader?

Dream fulfilment. Creating and living unique travel experiences

Find ideal life-buddies to share unique travel experiences.

Fund the organized experience & travel for free.


Why to be a Life-buddy?

Extremely unique (niche) travel experiences based on specific interests, com-bined in a single journey.

Travel group of like-minded co-travelers, instead of a group of strangers with-out common interests.

Ability to meet up and choose the ideal co-travelers before the actual travel experience.


What’s the process?

Leaders organize travel experiences for small groups and achieve group dis-counts from providers (airfare, accommodation, transportation etc.)

Life-buddies get to choose between thousands of travel experiences and travel groups.

Life-buddies pay through Lifekiy’s patented payment process, easily & safely.

Leader’s fund their travel experience, benefiting from the group booking dis-counts.



Our goal is to create a community in which everyone could join and fulfil their dream travel experiences, all very easy and safe. Even if you are someone who feels too different, is used to getting called eccentric or even a weirdo, Lifekiy is here to prove that there are ideal groups with like-minded people for you, to share the most awesome travel experiences. All you have to do is follow the steps bellow:

STEP 1   SIGN UP                                                                                                          Create an account and tell us your story. You will be asked to fill in data, such as your interests.
STEP 2   EVENTS & GROUPS                                                                                 Explore and discover thousands of events, organized by us-ers like you. Get matched with events and people that fit you the most. Lifekiy will suggest you the ideal events and groups based on your story.
STEP 3   MEET THEM                                                                                                

Get to know the people, matched as ideal for you, interact with them. Choose to attend the perfect event and share it with your favorites.

STEP 4   IN A CLICK                                                                                                  
Book as a group and share the experience, easily and safely, in a click!

" And it gets even more awesome… Feeling inspired?  Be

’s leader, create the most amazing experience & travel for free!  "



    1. Sign up:

Create an account & tell us about you. The procedure would be the same even if you would not want to organize an experience, but just willing to join a life-trip.

    2. Capture the Idea:

You already know how an ideal experience sounds. Tell Lifekiy’s world. Explain the experience in details.

" For example, let’s say you would love to spend 15 days in Germa-ny, during October, when many beer festivals are taking place and attend as many as possible. In addition, you would like to move around Germany these days with a motorcycle. It would be great to find 5 guys, and create a group of 6 travelers, sharing the same interests and live the experience together. "

    3. Quest Offers:

You are ready to seek for the best deals and get offers from pro-viders, like hotel owners, renters, festival ticket sellers etc. Strike a great bargain, get lower prizes and better deals because of the significant amount of the package.

" For example, in a package of 6, you will get a 10% discount and the one participant enjoys free services. "

    4. Set Budget & Criteria for Buddies:

You have collected the offers and you have chosen the best ones. So you already know how much the experience will cost for a group of 6 travel buddies. It’s time to decide who would make an ideal travel-buddy, set your criteria and let Lifekiy suggest your perfect matches.

    5. Meet Buddies:

Meet the potential co-travelers and interact with them through Lifekiy’s platform. Find out if they are the perfect buddies to share this experience. If so, you are ready to book the experience as a group.

    6. Payment procedure:

Lifekiy ensures you about the payment procedure’s safety. That’s why we have built a complex system explained below:

The system could be characterized as a contractual arrangement in which a trusted 3rd party receives and disburses money or documents for the primary transacting parties, with the disbursement dependent on conditions agreed to by the transacting parties.

In particular, let’s assume we are organizing the experience described in the example above.


STEP 1:

When the best offers, for a 6-member group, are on table from our providers, the organizer has what he needs to set the budget. The providers accord the organizer’s attendance as a part of the deal. The organizer has to sum the prices, calculate a 3% commission for Lifekiy’s services and divide the budget, so that his 5 co-travelers pay the same amount of money.


STEP 2:

The providers give the chance to the organizer to join the travel ex-perience for free and the final travel buddies to pay a specific amount of money. The trusted 3rd party, holds each one’s funds till the organizer has decided his 5 co-travelers and the experience is ready to take place.


STEP 3:

When all co-travelers are found and the budget has been gathered, the 3rd party releases the funds and pays the providers.


    7. Get Rewarded:

The organizer is ready to enjoy the reward for his creativity, travel for free and live his dream experience with the most amazing people.

                                                                                     UK Patent Application No. 1604186


Our team is a collection of diverse individuals with the common aim of inspiring people to live their dreams. This is what drives us on a daily bases and helps us cre-ate a world where living your desires and finding friends has no barriers.







A business model that facilitates the transaction of products or services between nonprofessionals has been disrupting industries since the 1990s. An evolution offering widespread access to tools, such as technology, knowledge and the chance to small businesses and even nonprofessionals to approach and engage consumers.

Retail, Accommodation, Transportation Industries

Giant marketplaces such as the retail industry, the accommodation industry and even the transportation industry have been affected due to this evolution.

Travel industry

It seems like a great opportunity for Lifekiy to present the successful business model to the travel industry. A giant market, with great potential to penetrate into powerful niche markets.



Global travel is now set to grow at a significant fast rate. Shaping the future of the travel industry, macro trends driving industry growth over the next decade predict an optimistic outlook for global travel over the next years, with the industry pro-jected to outstrip global GDP by some 2%, growing 5.4% per annum.

We are planning to continue Lifekiy’s web platform development, test it and finally release the product. However, there is a risk that further updates will be required after the formal testing and before the final release. In order to minimize this risk, we will work with the developers to ensure weekly feedback and make certain that updates are incorporated to the platform.

We have a marketing and promotion plan involving partnerships and working with traveling networks. In order to ensure efficient and effective promotion we will lev-erage off our networks and encourage your support in spreading the word.




Q: What does an Unlimited Free Traveling package contain? Does the package contain airfare, or will I need to purchase tickets separately?

A: The package contains whatever could be included in the budget given. It is on us to create your dream experience, collaborate with you, advice you if something would exceed that budget and try our best to adapt. Yes, airfare is contained into the package, unless the rest of the experience is estimated to exceed your given budget. In this case we could collaborate closely and find the best solution.

Q: Is there ever a deadline in which I must have started using the package?

A: All packages must have started their fulfillment before May 31st, 2017, a year after Lifekiy’s official launch, so if you wish you have the time to wait for a year before planning your first dream experience. Lifekiy’s official launching date is on May 31st, 2016. However, the planning process may start before that date because the Alpha Version is going to be on air soon after the end of the campaign.

Q: Having potential new friends along for the ride is yet another great idea. Does Lifekiy use the user database to determine who should go on the trips? How is Lifekiy going to find ideal co-travelers?

A: When creating a Lifekiy account you will be asked to fill in some questions, such as your interests, personality, preferences etc. Additionally, during the planning process you will be asked who would make an ideal travel buddy, we will use our databases and make suggestions. The final choose is yours.

Q: Would my co-travelers need to pay for the trips in their entirety?

A: Your co-travelers need to pay for their experience, but Lifekiy will get the best deals from its providers for them as well. Your co-travelers won’t be charged for your participation. Your reward comes from discount’s Lifekiy has reached from providers.

Q: What do you mean when you mention providers?

A: When talking about providers we mean airfare, accommodation, transportation, car of bike rentals, event, festival or activity ticket sellers etc.

Q: What if you cannot find ideal co-travelers to join me?

A: Lifekiy ensures you that you will find the ideal travel buddies and live your dream experience. The team will promote the planned experience and you don’t have to worry about it! In case your experience is niche and people won’t find it interesting, we might have to adapt and make it more attractive to your potential co-travelers.

Q: Am I allowed to bring my own friends along?

A: Yes, you are. During the planning process you will be asked who would make an ideal travel buddy, we will use our databases and make suggestions. The final choose is yours, so if you please to travel with your friends it’s fine.

Q: Can my friends use my “discount” on a given trip?

A: Only the person rewarded with an unlimited or discount package is allowed to use it, you can’t pass your package to anyone else.

Q: Should I buy the unlimited package, or any package, is there any security in knowing that if something were to happen where I could not receive the said package in its entirety, that a refund would be issued?

A: Let us clarify that the packages or discounts won’t be payed from the crowdfunding, either the company’s launch is based on the campaigns success. It’s more of a way for us to find out people’s support, get feedback and answer helpful questions before our launch like finding our audience. The platform is ready and we have the funds to fulfil and support all your rewards and experiences.

Q: Are funds collected immediately after I pledge, or after the campaign is over?

A: Funds are collected after the campaign is over. As you might have noticed our campaign is flexible, that means that Indiegogo won’t refund backers if the target isn’t reached. However, we have chosen the flexible funding because we don’t depend on the campaigns success as mentioned before.

Q: How much planning on my end is necessary to make a trip happen?

A: Your involvement depends on you. You could just answer some basic questions like what ideal experiences, co-travelers, destinations, activities etc. are to you, we will plan it, you can approve, make chances or ask us to make changes. During the planning process the team, will always be available to answer your questions either through an email or a skype call. However, if you would like to have a bigger role in the planning process, it’s possible as well. You could meet the team and make your suggestions and join. It is 100% on your hand to decide your involvement.

Q: Can I say, here’s where I want to go and this is how I want to do it and make it happen?

A: Yes, let’s say that’s the way we work! However, your expectations need to be reasonable based on your given budget. If the team believes your dream experience might exceed the budget they will work on a solution, for instance they can either suggest an activity replacement.

Q: How is Lifekiy able to provide discounts?

A: Lifekiy converts its profit margin to a discount. The discount given is basically the commission Lifekiy would have gotten normally for an organized experience.

Q: It sounds too good to be true. How can Lifekiy provide unlimited free traveling?

A: It is all about discount’s given by providers because of the group booking. We convert them into free participations to the organized travel experiences. No one is charged for the free participation as mentioned before.

Q: If a Leader gets the chance to travel for free, wouldn’t everyone choose to be a Leader?

A: Being a Leader means creating value! As a Leader you need to spend time organizing a unique travel experience and making it desirable for your travel buddies as well. You need to contact providers and achieve great deals. Your effort with get rewarded with your free participation to the travel experience, benefiting from the group booking discount.

Q: How many discount coupons could be used per planned experience?

A: It depends on the discount coupons value, the experience’s budget and the number on travel buddies joining the experience.

Q: Could me and my friends get Unlimited Free Traveling packages and travel all for free joining the same travel experience?

A: Each travel experience allows only one Unlimited Free Traveling Package.
story_txt:
" The first social platform where creative minds organize dream experiences, find ideal co-travelers to share their dreams & get rewarded "
      Unique travel experiences organized by creative users!      Get matched with the ideal buddies based on your interests!      Meet your travel buddies and make real friendships!      Book as a group, easily and safely, in a click!      Organize your life-trip and travel for FREE!
" It is a fact that people do not live the life they were wishing for. A fast moving society and excessive liabilities lead to unfulfilled dreams and hopes to travel and experience more. "




Lifekiy is a breakthrough to all restrictions. The solution to all things keep-ing you away from your dreams. With Lifekiy there are no excuses such as “no money, no like-minded friends” to live your dreams. The only barrier standing between you and the life you want to live is yourself. Lifekiy gives you the key to a whole new world.
Lifekiy’s community includes two different roles for its users. The Leader’s role and the Life-Buddy’s role. A leader organizes a travel experience, life-buddies join and finally the leader and his life-buddies live the travel experience together. A user can be a leader, a life-buddy or both in different travel experiences. Both leader and life-buddy relay on each other and build an actual relationship.

Why to be a Leader?

Dream fulfilment. Creating and living unique travel experiences

Find ideal life-buddies to share unique travel experiences.

Fund the organized experience & travel for free.

Why to be a Life-buddy?

Extremely unique (niche) travel experiences based on specific interests, com-bined in a single journey.

Travel group of like-minded co-travelers, instead of a group of strangers with-out common interests.

Ability to meet up and choose the ideal co-travelers before the actual travel experience.

What’s the process?

Leaders organize travel experiences for small groups and achieve group dis-counts from providers (airfare, accommodation, transportation etc.)

Life-buddies get to choose between thousands of travel experiences and travel groups.

Life-buddies pay through Lifekiy’s patented payment process, easily & safely.

Leader’s fund their travel experience, benefiting from the group booking dis-counts.





Our goal is to create a community in which everyone could join and fulfil their dream travel experiences, all very easy and safe. Even if you are someone who feels too different, is used to getting called eccentric or even a weirdo, Lifekiy is here to prove that there are ideal groups with like-minded people for you, to share the most awesome travel experiences. STEP 2   EVENTS & GROUPS                                                                                 Explore and discover thousands of events, organized by us-ers like you. Get matched with events and people that fit you the most. Lifekiy will suggest you the ideal events and groups based on your story.

STEP 3   MEET THEM                                                                                                Get to know the people, matched as ideal for you, interact with them. Choose to attend the perfect event and share it with your favorites.

STEP 4   IN A CLICK                                                                                                  Book as a group and share the experience, easily and safely, in a click!

story:
We stand for bikes.

After successfully developing a multi bicycle bike stand for city municipalities, Dutch cyclist Maurice Paulssen is back.

This time with an innovative bike stand for personal use. The idea for BikeClip came to me after a bike trip with friends. We concluded that we needed a stand to easily park our bikes in while cleaning the bike, pumping tires, doing small repairs and lube chains. 

A stand as strong and safe as the ones I created in the past for city municipalities, but then for personal use and affordable. A great idea was born. We only need the funding to start production. 

Our goal on Kickstarter was: € 20,000 for the first flight. Fellow cyclists, make a stand and pre order now via Indiegogo!”

Meet BikeClip

BikeClip Bottom Bracket

In the first week, we received many questions if it is possible to lift the rear wheel off the ground. Maurice went straight back to his drawing table and designed the BikeClip Bottom Bracket in addition to use with the BikeClip so you can lift the rear wheel off the ground. This way you can change your derailleur settings, clean and lube your chain or do small repairs. The Bottom Bracket will be designed like the BikeClip; solid, easy and no nonsense. The product will be available in two lengths for different bikes.

 

One great stand for 7 good reasons.

1. Holds any bike on its front or rear fork.  

2. Protects your bike’s derailleurs or disc brakes.  

3. Keeps your bike neatly in an upright position.  

4. Prevents your bike from falling into other vehicles.  

5. Can be used for all wheel sizes.  

6. Avoids a tangled mess of bikes in your garage.  

7. Build durable in sturdy and solid quality. 

BikeClip specs 

BikeClip dimensions

Easy to assemble

In 4 quick steps. So plug, play & ride your bike with pride and take good care of it. Then we’ll take care of you and your bike with many more inventions to come!  

Lightweight yet strong and sturdy

BikeClip will be produced with fibre reinforced plastics and lightweight aluminium to keep the stand portable. The BikeClip only weighs 3.5 KG so you can take it wherever you want, using the special BikeClip travel bag. Filled with water or sand the BikeClip keeps your bike steady, providing maximum stability weighing up to 13.5 KG. 

One size fits all

  

Provides you with the BIKECLIP and its TRAVEL BAG, so you can park, clean and protect your bike, wherever you go.  

You get the BIKECLIP and its TRAVEL BAG so you can even park, clean and protect your bike in style with the fancy DESIGN COVER.

Meet Maurice Paulssen 

The idea for BikeClip came to me a year ago. I was involved in the developing of bike stands for city municipalities and I discovered that people didn’t want to park their bikes in ugly, non-functional stands that are damaging their bikes. 

I created a multi bicycle bike stand that people would love to park their bikes in. It was functional and safe for all different types of bikes, from race bikes and mountain bikes till mummy bikes and even electric bikes. The multi bicycle bike stand for city municipalities became a great success in the Netherlands and the rest of Europe. It has won many prices and awards and the design is even patented.

Then my friends and I thought that we actually needed such a stand for our own use as well. As true bike maniacs, we cycle many miles together. Racing over the concrete, or beating the forces of nature on steep hills and muddy roads. We concluded that we needed a stand to easily park our bikes in while cleaning the bike, pumping tires, doing small repairs and lube chains. A bike stand as safe as the multi bicycle bike stand for city municipalities, but in a light, easy to transport and easy to assemble version. And of course, it had to be affordable.

Together with the guys from LUMO labs I started to create the first prototypes. We used fibre reinforced plastics and lightweight aluminium to keep the stand lightweight and created a system that can hold every type of bike.

Maurice in the Media

 

Partners in Quality

It has won many prices and awards and the design is even patented.Then my friends and I thought that we actually needed such a stand for our own use as well. As true bike maniacs, we cycle many miles together. Racing over the concrete, or beating the forces of nature on steep hills and muddy roads. We concluded that we needed a stand to easily park our bikes in while cleaning the bike, pumping tires, doing small repairs and lube chains. A bike stand as safe as the multi bicycle bike stand for city municipalities, but in a light, easy to transport and easy to assemble version. And of course, it had to be affordable.Together with the guys from LUMO labs I started to create the first prototypes. We used fibre reinforced plastics and lightweight aluminium to keep the stand lightweight and created a system that can hold every type of bike.Maurice in the Media Partners in Quality

story:
"When you're smilin', the whole world smiles with you." Ever heard this song by Louis Armstrong? Well, it's true! Research shows that smiling is contagious. Ever been around someone who just had something fantastic happen to him or her? Isn't it almost impossible not to feel good, too? Studies show that something as simple as seeing a friend smile can activate the muscles in your face to make that same expression, without you even being aware that you are doing it. Crazy, right? 

Hi! My name is Sean, I'm a 28-year-old Israeli business-man and artist. Like many born Israelis, I also went through the regular Israeli road of life – studies, military service, working for a minimum wage – and then with some connections and luck I also found a good permanent job with a fine salary, but unfortunately it wasn't enough to keep the smile on my face.

As opposed to many young people here, I did not travel to South-America after the army and I did not take a big trip abroad because I believed in making money and investing it, and the country seemed big enough at the time to enjoy. After serving my country, graduating from university and managing a couple of start-ups, I still felt like something is missing. I tried to find what makes me truly free and happy. Somehow,somewhere in this mix, my spirit knew what it needed – ART.

I have discovered Photoshop when I was 14, photography when I was 15 and painting when I was 16. since then, I always loved the combination between thees media.

My work is always a reflection of my life. What I love is how poetic, evocative and intuitive art can be, how it can resonate with my deepest self, my soul, my chore.

Sometimes I need to break away from tradition to uncover new exciting art. There are no rules, the artist's interpretation of its subject in whatever media they choose is what translates in the emotion of the spectator. One of the greatest things about mixed media is this sense of endless possibility. But it can become a bit overwhelming too, especially at the beginning, and make it hard to find your own style or favorite techniques. To me the key is to keep experimenting at my own pace and to stick with a few techniques that I have truly made my own.

My art is intimate, from my deepest, personal feelings and memories. It’s very emotional. This way, everything has an impact, in every part of my life. The things that you think have disappeared sometimes show up again and again. This is like therapy for me, this work. It’s all playing a role, even if I am not aware of it.

story:
DE-CAP-ATURTLE

My Name is Chris Watkins and I am a active duty US military enlisted man and owner of WWW.GUNN-FIGHTER.COM. I teach tactical self defense classes mostly using firearms but in reality you cant always have a firearm with you. When I leave home one thing I always have with me is my keys. On my keyring was a bottle opener but that was the only purpose it served. I have developed a bottle opener that can be used for self defense purposes while fitting in with the other trinkets hanging from your key ring.

The best thing about the DE-CAP-ATURTLE is that it doesnt look like a weapon and serves a practical purpose. My wife works late at night frequently and her job wont allow her to carry a firearm. Ive always worried about her on the way to her car after she gets off work at night. Any weapon inside her purse would take too long to get to. With the DE-CAP-ATURTLE all she has to do is carry her keys in her hand a certain way and she has a game changer in hand. It makes me feel alot better that I have provided her with protection and I want this feeling of security for all my contributors.

SPECS

The DE-CAP-ATURTLE will open twist caps, bend off caps, soda can flip tabs and Fore-Heads, It is made from aluminum and weighs next to nothing. It will come with a 550 cord tail and intial offerings will be in black and pink. The edge is actually a BESH wedge style tip made to be exceptionally strong and doesnt have a cutting edge. They can be purchased with a pointed or blunt tip. For my miltary brothers the Tip can be used to adjust windage and elevation on red dot optics such as EoTechs. The final design will be be waterjet cut at precise dimensions. The prototypes shown are made by myself for family members, I have 10 prototypes that will also be offered. 

WHERE THE FUNDING WILL GO 

Funding recieved from contributors will be used to have the initial batch of waterjetted DE-CAP-ATURTLES and to make a run of titanium DE-CAP-ATURTLES. It will also be used for having the finishes applied to the product. If I dont recieve all the funding I will still press forward with the project and contributors will get what they pay for. This is a awesome product if you are serious about you or your loved ones personal safety.

By contributing to this project you will directly influence the outcome of a potential attack on a loved one. I hate to be harsh but this is a harsh world we live in. Please take advantage of this oppurtunity to place security in the hands of your loved ones. And if the attack never comes, DE-CAP, your favorite beverage with this awesome little turtle.

GET THE WORD OUT

Even if this product isnt for you "for some crazy reason" please use the share button here and get it to your friends who may want one. Thanks in advanced for your support, I hope to put a DE-CAP-ATURTLE on your keychain soon.

story:
Our Story

September of 2007 I broke my neck. Diagnosed with a C7 vertebrae fracture I took some time off my feet, but ultimately recovered with only a minor scar retaining a titanium cage. I continued on with life and found a new passion for adventure travel. There are many individuals that do not get to have the same opportunity to restart life values such as I have.

I met one of these individuals in 2010 prior to the paralympics and he shed light into a new perspective for me. Matt is a mirror of myself; he is adventurous, confident and infected with what people call “the travel bug”. We are the same age, share the same humor and bear the same titanium cages and scars. The only real physical difference between us is his wheelchair.

We began to travel together and documented every stroke of the wheel, essentially creating a motivational tool for others (able-bodied, or not) to learn from. In one year we successfully explored two continents, written reviews on over 38 tours, received international press coverage, skydived with Australia's first paraplegic skydiver, surfed with a two-time world champion and, most importantly, lived by the limitless example we sought to create and share. One year. One amazing journey.

Upon our arrival back from Australia, we have been recognized by the Rick Hansen Foundation as "difference makers" and featured as a highlighted medal-bearer for the upcoming 25th anniversary relay across Canada in which we will be participating. Our story can be seen here: http://www.rickhansenrelay.com/en/about-the-rel...


Now that we have shown proof of overcoming barriers and obstacles, gained public awareness and raised many eyebrows, we would like to become the first tour operator in the world to offer this experience to other adventure seekers alike. Fully accessible. Transportation, accommodation, food, nightlife and daytime adrenalin sport all included! A weekend getaway which will truly bring life to any individual soul. 


We plan to launch out first test-run tour in August where we will conduct a survey to build on our potential. This project will highlight British Columbia as the most accessible place in the world and potentially bring this type of awareness on a global scale. All we seek is funding for our transportation to get these wheels rolling!


The Impact

We thrive to become the motivational tool of our generation. Through group travel with no segregation of mobility needs, we will help each other in attaining personal self-worth and bring back the confidence buried within. This project will ultimately erase the barriers previously set by an old mentality, and allow others to question their limitation. To prove that every individual has different ability but together we represent an able movement.

We thrive to represent Whistler, Canada as the most adventurous, accessible place in the world and potentially create a wave of awareness/ change to other countries abroad. This will not only assist in mentality of someone with limited mobility, but also able-bodies who seek to push their personal boundaries, together!

To create excitement and confidence to those who lack these particular values in life.

What We Need & What You Get

9Lives Adventures is on the path to success with awareness, we have created a care-free tour itinerary for the west-coast of BC, and have a launch date this coming August! All we seek from you, the audience, is assistance with funding for a wheelchair accessible shuttle bus. This is the last speed-bump in our path.

Once we get a shuttle bus under the 9lives name, we will be running a shuttle service departing from Vancouver to Whistler. We will create a unique vibrant look to the bus, adding character and attitude to our vision.

If we reach our goal with attaining the transportation we seek, we will give back to our community with a direct wheelchair accessible path to surrounding areas of British Columbia. Furthermore, opening the opportunity for people to get out and experience the life beyond their doorstep. Together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread our good word and direct people to http://www.9livesadventures.com (new website to be launched end of June)

Encourage a change in mentality, and embrace the beautiful differences we all relate to :)

story:
Qui sommes nous ?

Aksel Nielsen Kolding, agé de 28 ans et originaire de la France, a grandi dans un petit village près de Lyon. Ayant parcouru plusieurs pays, ce grand voyageur et aventurier a choisi de s'installer ici, au Québec, depuis environ 10 ans. Menuisier de métier, son intérêt pour la forêt et la nature a toujours été grandissante. Cela l’a entrainé à être guide de chasse et pêche dans une pourvoirie de la région. Instigateur et concepteur de ce rêve, il a su recruter et s'entourer de partenaires fiables et passionnés qui partagent sa vision et ses valeurs.


Alexandra Bérard Rioux, âgée de 31 ans, est née au cœur même de Val-d’Or, ville où prendra forme ce fabuleux projet. Elle y a vécu toute son enfance, phase durant laquelle elle passait les périodes estivales dans un chalet familial en pleine nature de l'Abitibi-Témiscamingue. Femme active, elle pratique encore aujourd’hui différentes activités plein air. Afin d’exercer sa carrière d'ambulancière et d'étendre ces horizons, elle quitta la région. Cela lui a permis de développer un sens accru des relations humaines. Quelques années plus tard, le rappel aux sources s’est fait sentir. Enfin, son retour lui permet de retrouver un équilibre entre son travail et ses valeurs.


Alex Duchainy, également de souche abitibienne et âgé de 30 ans, s’éloigna de cette merveilleuse région à l’âge de 16 ans. Le bénéfice de cette soif de connaissance et de curiosité sans limite l’oriente à étudier en sciences de la nature à Rimouski. Pour terminer son aventure, il se dirige vers une formation en gestion hôtelière à Québec. Le contact avec les gens à travers ses expériences lui ont permis de le faire grandir et d'évoluer. Il souhaite mettre à profit son écoute, sa patience ainsi que sa sagesse afin de faire vivre à tous une aventure d'harmonie et d'équilibre avec la nature.

 

En quoi consiste notre projet ?

Entre Lemoine et l’Arbre a pour raison d’être d’offrir un lieu d’hébergement alternatif. Un endroit pour s’arrêter et se recueillir dans des cabanes montées sur des pilotis, en pleine nature, au travers des arbres. En sortie de couple ou en groupe de 4,8 ou 10 personnes, elles vous fourniront une expérience unique, un mélange entre le confort, la vie rustique et écologique. Poêle à bois, douche au propane, toilette au composte, panneau solaire, une petite cuisinette, sont quelques-uns des éléments clés. Ils vous permettront un confort et un soin personnalisé même en pleine forêt, tout cela a 10 minutes du centre-ville de Val-d’or en Abitibi-Témiscamingue.  Chacune de ces petites maisons, possédant sa propre thématique et son décors enchanteur, vous partagera les valeurs d’un petit village à l’esprit communautaire avec une ambiance chaleureuse et accueillante.

L’équipe d’Entre Lemoine et l’Arbre souhaite faire vivre un rêve, celui qu’on a, étant enfant, d’avoir notre cabane dans l’arbre et d’y invité nos amis.  Nous invitons les gens à faire partis de cette réalisation afin que des souvenirs et des moments mémorables puissent être créés, que des liens et des connections se produisent entre nous.

 

Notre intention derrière le "Crowdfunding"

Le socio-financement est une excellente idée pour amasser des fonds. Cependant, pour nous, il s'agit surtout d'un moyen pour faire connaître et partager notre projet.
Pour être bien honnête, un montant de 50 000$ est indiqué dans notre plan d'affaire sous le titre d’investisseur privé. À la base, nous voulions trouver un particulier ou une entreprise, une quelconque entité externe, qui aurait cru et embarqué dans notre rêve. Notre décision finale fût de laisser tomber la recherche de cet investisseur et ainsi offrir cette opportunité à tout le monde.

Bien que quelque unes des contreparties proposées illustrent des possibilités futures de forfait ou service, la plupart de celles-ci sont des offres uniques pour la durée de la campagne.

Comme il s'agit d'une campagne dîtes flexible, même si l'objectif n'est pas atteint, la totalité amassée sera investi dans l'entreprise. Également cette option nous permettra d'utiliser ces fonds même pendant la campagne pour les coûts reliés au développement du projet déjà en cours depuis plus d'un an.

 

La réalité VS le rêve

Il est vrai que nous ferons face à plusieurs obstacles et réalisons les risques reliées à un tel projet. Cela est déjà le cas d'un aspect administrative. Ce produit étant inexistant en région et peu présent dans la province, cela fais en sorte que la règlementation sur plusieurs points est ambigus ou non-défini.

Malgré ces embûches et certaines contraites, jusqu'à maintenant nous avons le soutient et l'appui des gens que nous rencontrons, y compris la municipalité. Le sérieux de notre implication et investissement font en sorte qu'il y a une grande ouverture d'esprit et les solutions se présentent rapidement.

L'impact

Nous voulons mettre en valeur nos expériences de vie et notre perception du monde à travers ce projet, c'est pourquoi il repose sur des bases de partage, d'esprit de rencontre, de la découverte de soi ainsi que d'une symbiose entre la Terre et l'être humain.

Que ce soit en contribuant ou en partageant, vous devenez des ambassadeurs et des investisseurs de notre entreprise, et donc vous intégrez la grande famille que nous souhaitons créer.

story:
After creating two of the most backed flashlight projects EVER on Kickstarter, with over 20,000 backers, we set out to create more awesome, minimal EDC products. 

 

We wanted to step-out of our comfort zone and test our abilities to create the best, most premium products. From that, WOLVERINE was born. 

The brand that set the EDC standard has just raised the bar.

 

 

We focused on a premium, lightweight, and minimal design, providing water-resistant seams and an ultra-durable FuseFabric™ shell. For optimum carry capabilities, we added a removable cross shoulder strap to simply throw over your shoulder. 

Simple, easy and effortless, we see things from a different perspective.

 

Our FuseFabric™ technology vastly improves upon traditional Nylon Ripstop. It’s a revolutionary weaving process that blends thicker, more-durable threads with lighter, lower-density fibers all coming together with a polyurethane coating. This effectively reduces overall weight and creating a seamless experience over all.

REGENERATIVE - Self healing & repairing when small cuts or punctures occur. No tools needed - simply rub the fabric with your bare hands. 

 

 

COLLAPSIBLE / EXPANDABLE - The roll top bag design allows for flexible storage capability. No longer will you have a floppy nor overstuffed bag.

PACKABLE - The Wolverine packs down to the size of a cell phone at half the weight. Perfect add-on for more rigorous traveling that requires a flexible utility bag. 

WEATHER RESISTANT - Holds up in all weather conditions and can be submerged at 1 ATM. Protected against accidental exposure to water; for example, splashes, perspiration or accidental immersion.

The simplest solutions solve the biggest problems. What makes us different? We eliminate weight, bulk, and hassle from standard everyday carry bags. We've created an effortless experience between you, and your EDC. 

The outdoors have never been so close. We designed Wolverine to be perfect for hiking, going to the beach, surfing, or climbing- you name it. Get out of town with the buddies, or explore the the endless trails of the outdoors, all with the convenience of your Wolverine.

We combined a sharp, elegant design with breakthrough fabric technology to bring you a perfect day-to-day use Utility Bag. We believe that the shape, and size keep the design minimal, functional, easy to carry, and completely hassle-free in any situation. You can sport it on the subway to your office just as easily as you can take it on a blissful day hike.

 

Designed by combining our break-through Regenerative FuseFabric™ Technology, with the traditional roll/clip bag design, we bring you an ultra durable, easy to carry utility pack for your everyday use. 

 

 

We added a 6 inch tall double layered base to help with durability as well as support for those heavier situations.

Though the bag is quite simple, it has details where it matters. We even opted for a solid silicone logo for water resistance and durability.

OUR MANUFACTURING PARTNERS

We chose our manufacturing partners based on a couple factors. The first and foremost was experience- our partners have had 30+ years of experience manufacturing bags for various big name brands. Once we saw their successful track record with these household names, we were confident in their ability to deliver. 

Secondly, their R&D department was the most advanced we had seen. The FuseFabric was a new development they were able to tweak an customize to our needs. Though self-healing fabrics have been around for a couple years now, they haven't been refined to the point of being fully production ready and field-testable. We needed something strong and durable, but also lightweight and water resistant. 

Quality and attention to detail were other factors that contributed to their long history of success. We noticed this on full display when we visited in Summer 2017. They were fully transparent and communicative in all steps of the manufacturing process. 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Weight w/ strap: 5.2 Oz 
  • Weight w/o strap: 2.8 Oz 
  • Length: 56 cm 
  • Diameter: 18 cm 
  • Top Opening: 30 cm 
  • Materials: Regenerative FuseFabric™ & Nylon Straps
  • Colors Available: Burnt Orange & Slate Gray

Slughaus is a small company based out of San Francisco with the sole mission of helping you stay minimal and functional, all at the same time. We believe that your everyday carry essentials influence your lifestyle.

story:
Our mission for the past few months was to design the greatest EDC pen ever by combining the functions of a standard tactical pen and a solid pocket knife. This may sound like an easy task but getting all three features to fit on a standard sized pen without making it too top heavy was quite difficult. After many design iterations and prototype productions we came up with this final patent-pending design you see here. 

The design of the TriTac EDC Pen cuts no corners in design or materials. Using the highest grade of aluminum or titanium for the body, the Fisher Space ink cartridge for the best writing experience, a 440c stainless steel blade and a tungsten carbide window punch this lightweight pen is easy to carry around and extremely functional. 

 

SHIPPING NOW!!
